T02TD2014E:1b-1: shr'i ya m'anta ka badzra pra bhe da n'a ma m'u la mantr'artha /
T02TD2014E:1b-3: dpal gshin rje gshed po'i rtsa ba'i sngags don rdo rje rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2014E:1b-5: 'jam rgyal khro bo'i gsang sngags gang //
T02TD2014E:1b-6: rgyud gzhan kun du sbas byas shing //
T02TD2014E:1b-8: rgya mtsho rgya dang rdo rje ltar //
T02TD2014E:1b-9: brtag dang 'da' dka' mi phyed pa //
T02TD2014E:1b-10: ded dpon nyi ma bcud len bzhin //
T02TD2014E:1b-12: dri za'i grong dang sangs rgyas bzhin //
T02TD2014E:1b-13: sgo dang byin rlabs mtha' yas pa //
T02TD2014E:1b-14: ji ltar nam mkha' lding gi rigs ;
T02TD2014E:1b-15: / gcig kyang skye ba'i bye brag gis //
T02TD2014E:1b-16: rigs kyi bye brag rnam pa bzhi //
T02TD2014E:1b-17: de dag nang gi dbye ba yis //
T02TD2014E:1b-18: stong phrag nyi shu gcig la sogs //
T02TD2014E:1b-19: mtha' yas bshad pa ji lta bar //
T02TD2014E:1b-20: rtsa ba'i snying po la sogs pa'i //
T02TD2014E:1b-21: gsang sngags gang yin rigs gcig kyang //
T02TD2014E:1b-22: yi ge bsdu dang gtor ba dang //
T02TD2014E:1b-23: de bzhin rab tu gtor ba dang //
T02TD2014E:1b-24: yan lag so sor phye ba yis //
T02TD2014E:2a-2: / sngags don de dag re re yang //
T02TD2014E:2a-3: rnam grangs sgo zhes bya ba yis //
T02TD2014E:2a-4: sgo mtha' yas par gyur pa ni //
T02TD2014E:2a-5: ye shes chags pa mi mnga' ba'i //
T02TD2014E:2a-6: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis mkhyen pa las //
T02TD2014E:2a-7: nyan thos rnams kyis mi shes na //
T02TD2014E:2a-8: 'jig rten pa yis sgos ci dgos //
T02TD2014E:2a-9: 'di ltar sngags don mtha' yas shing //
T02TD2014E:2a-10: byin rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab kyang //
T02TD2014E:2a-11: thub pa bdag nyid chen po yis //
T02TD2014E:2a-12: gang gi don du gang sbyar ba'i ;
T02TD2014E:2a-13: / gleng gzhi'i dbang du mdzad pa bzhin //
T02TD2014E:2a-14: gang gis de ltar sbyar byas pa //
T02TD2014E:2a-15: de la de yi dngos grub dag / ngo bo nyid kyis myur bar gsungs //
T02TD2014E:2a-16: de phyir rgyal ba'i bstan pa la //
T02TD2014E:2a-17: bdud rnams 'dul bar byed pa yi //
T02TD2014E:2a-18: khro bo'i mchog ni gshin rje gshed //
T02TD2014E:2a-19: las rnams grub par byed pa la //
T02TD2014E:2a-20: 'khor lo sbyor ba rnams kyi mchog / sngags kyi nang na rtsa ba ste //
T02TD2014E:2a-21: khro bo nyid yin mnyes byed cing //
T02TD2014E:2a-22: de yi bka' bzhin grub byed pa'o //
T02TD2014E:2a-23: gsang sngags yi ge sum cu gnyis //
T02TD2014E:2a-24: bcu bdun yin te lngar yang shes //
T02TD2014E:2a-25: 'di dag rab tu gtor tshul bshad //
T02TD2014E:2a-27: khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed //
T02TD2014E:2a-28: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje thugs //
T02TD2014E:2a-29: ye shes rab tu mi g-yo ba //
T02TD2014E:2b-2: zhing khams rnam par dag pa na //
T02TD2014E:2b-3: tshogs mchog gnyis las grub pa'i sku //
T02TD2014E:2b-4: mchog tu snang bas snang mdzad de //
T02TD2014E:2b-5: lus dang gnas gzugs dag pa'o //
T02TD2014E:2b-7: sa chen gter gyi 'byung khungs bzhin //
T02TD2014E:2b-8: yon tan zad med gter gyur pas //
T02TD2014E:2b-9: rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ste //
T02TD2014E:2b-10: longs spyod tshor ba rnams dag pa'o //
T02TD2014E:2b-12: lhun po bzhin du bstan pa yi //
T02TD2014E:2b-13: chos mchog mi g-yo brnyes pa yang //
T02TD2014E:2b-14: chos 'od dpag med ston mdzad de //
T02TD2014E:2b-17: spyin dang snyan smra la sogs pa //
T02TD2014E:2b-18: 'gro don spyod pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02TD2014E:2b-19: bde gshegs mdzad don grub pa ste //
T02TD2014E:2b-20: 'du byed dag pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD2014E:2b-21: dus gsum 'byung ba'i rgyal ba kun //
T02TD2014E:2b-22: thugs sogs chos kyi bdag nyid de //
T02TD2014E:2b-23: de phyir mi bskyod rdo rje sogs //
T02TD2014E:2b-24: rgyal ba rnam pa lngar 'dod do //
T02TD2014E:2b-26: gzung dang 'dzin pa spong byed pa'i //
T02TD2014E:2b-27: ye shes zung mthar phyin pa ste ;
T02TD2014E:2b-28: / lta dman spong ba'i dran pa ni //
T02TD2014E:2b-29: bde gshegs kun kyang 'gugs par byed //
T02TD2014E:2b-31: dpyod pa rnam par bral ba yi //
T02TD2014E:2b-32: ye shes shes rab mthar byed yin //
T02TD2014E:2b-33: yang dag spong ba'i brtson 'grus ni //
T02TD2014E:2b-34: rgyal ba'ang sems can don du 'jug / ni /
T02TD2014E:2b-35: nges tshig brjod pa mtha' yas pa //
T02TD2014E:2b-36: brjod pa bral ba pad mthar 'byin //
T02TD2014E:2b-38: rgyal ba'ang sems can don du 'ching //
T02TD2014E:2b-40: rdul bral rnam par mi rtog pa'i //
T02TD2014E:2b-41: ye shes bgegs mthar 'byin pa ste //
T02TD2014E:2b-42: dad sogs dbang du gyur pa ni //
T02TD2014E:2b-43: rgyal ba'ang sems can dbang du byed //
T02TD2014E:2b-44: byang chub phyogs chos rang bzhin ni //
T02TD2014E:2b-45: thar pa'i grong khyer sgo yin te //
T02TD2014E:2b-46: sgrib pa spong ba'i ye shes ni //
T02TD2014E:2b-47: khro bo sgo skyong zhes bshad do //
T02TD2014E:2b-50: byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid //
T02TD2014E:2b-51: gzigs pa rnam dag spyod yul phyir //
T02TD2014E:2b-52: sangs rgyas spyan zhes brjod pa yin //
T02TD2014E:2b-54: sems can kun du sdud byed pa //
T02TD2014E:2b-55: snying rjes brlan pa chu yi khams //
T02TD2014E:2b-56: 'gro ba bdag gir byed pa na //
T02TD2014E:2b-57: rgyal ba'i yum mchog m'a ma k'i //
T02TD2014E:2b-59: nyes pa sel byed shes rab me //
T02TD2014E:2b-60: dga' ba chen po'i bdag nyid de //
T02TD2014E:2b-61: dri ma kun nas dag pa'i phyir //
T02TD2014E:2b-62: gos dkar mo zhes 'dod pa yin //
T02TD2014E:3a-2: btang snyoms ye shes chags bral rlung //
T02TD2014E:3a-4: sgrol ma zhes su rnam par bshad //
T02TD2014E:3a-5: stong nyid dang ni snying rje dang //
T02TD2014E:3a-6: shes rab dang ni thabs rnams las //
T02TD2014E:3a-7: rgyal ba 'byung phyir spyod yul phyir //
T02TD2014E:3a-10: sna tshogs rnam par spras pa'i gzugs //
T02TD2014E:3a-11: phyag rgya'i mchod pa bla med pa //
T02TD2014E:3a-12: byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid //
T02TD2014E:3a-13: rgyal ba mnyes byed dam pa'o //
T02TD2014E:3a-15: gang zhig rab tu gdangs snyan glu //
T02TD2014E:3a-16: sgra yi mchod pa bla med de //
T02TD2014E:3a-17: bstan pa dam pa'i dngos nyid chos //
T02TD2014E:3a-18: mchod pa rgyal ba mnyes par byed //
T02TD2014E:3a-20: dri med rnam par dag pa'i dri //
T02TD2014E:3a-21: tshul khrims dag pa'i bdag nyid de //
T02TD2014E:3a-22: bla med dri yi mchod pa 'dis //
T02TD2014E:3a-23: sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed //
T02TD2014E:3a-25: khu ba bcud len ro yi mchog / ting 'dzin rab tu mi g-yo ba //
T02TD2014E:3a-26: bde gshegs mdzad pa'i bdag nyid de //
T02TD2014E:3a-27: rgyal ba mnyes byed dam pa'o //
T02TD2014E:3a-28: gzugs sogs 'dod pa'i bdag nyid ni //
T02TD2014E:3a-29: byang chub sems sogs 'dod pa'i mchog / longs spyod mchod pa'i rang bzhin 'di //
T02TD2014E:3a-30: bud med gzugs su rnam par brtags //
T02TD2014E:3a-31: lus dang gnas dang longs spyod las //
T02TD2014E:3a-32: sgrib pa kun du 'byung bas na //
T02TD2014E:3a-33: 'di dag tsam gyis zag bcas kyi //
T02TD2014E:3a-34: chos kun yongs su bsdus par 'dod //
T02TD2014E:3a-35: de dag nyid las bzlog pa'i chos //
T02TD2014E:3a-36: 'bras bu dang ni don dam dang //
T02TD2014E:3a-37: lam dang bstan pa dam pa yis //
T02TD2014E:3a-38: zag pa med chos bsdus pa yin //
T02TD2014E:3a-39: gtso bo yum dang mchod pa dang //
T02TD2014E:3a-40: de bzhin sgo skyong bcas pa yi //
T02TD2014E:3a-41: zag bcas zag med dbyer med pa'i //
T02TD2014E:3a-42: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus //
T02TD2014E:3a-43: gang zhig yi ge phreng ba'i don //
T02TD2014E:3a-44: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bdag nyid du //
T02TD2014E:3a-45: bsgom dang bzlas la brtson byed pa //
T02TD2014E:3a-47: de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i rgyud de //
T02TD2014E:3a-48: ya ni rdo rje gshin rje dgra'o //
T02TD2014E:3a-49: kshe ni rdo rje zhing ngo //
T02TD2014E:3a-51: me ni rdo rje lhun po'o //
T02TD2014E:3a-52: da ni rdo rje spyin pa'o //
T02TD2014E:3a-53: ya ni rdo rje zung ngo //
T02TD2014E:3a-54: tstsha ni rdo rje dpyod pa'o //
T02TD2014E:3a-55: ni ni rdo rje nges tshig go //
T02TD2014E:3a-56: r'a ni rdo rje rdul bral lo //
T02TD2014E:3b-0: sa @3b ni rdo rje kun sdud do //
T02TD2014E:3b-1: do ni rdo rje nyes sel lo //
T02TD2014E:3b-2: ru ni rdo rje gnas med do //
T02TD2014E:3b-3: na ni rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs so //
T02TD2014E:3b-4: yo ni rdo rje gdangs so //
T02TD2014E:3b-5: ni ni rdo rje dri med do //
T02TD2014E:3b-7: de la 'di ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rgyud de //
T02TD2014E:3b-8: rdo rje gshin rje'i sgra ni zhing dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2014E:3b-9: rdo rje'i zhing ni zhing dag pa'i gzugs so //
T02TD2014E:3b-10: rdo rje sa ni zhing dag pa'i yon tan gyi bdag nyid do //
T02TD2014E:3b-11: rdo rje lhun po ni zhing dag pa'i chos so //
T02TD2014E:3b-12: rdo rje spyin pa ni zhing dag pa'i dpyod pa'o //
T02TD2014E:3b-13: rdo rje zung ni sgo dag pa'i dang po ste 'jug pa dang 'byung ba'i sgo'o //
T02TD2014E:3b-14: rdo rje dpyod pa ni sgo dag pa gnyis pa ste btang ba dang len pa'i sgo'o //
T02TD2014E:3b-15: rdo rje nges tshig ni sgo dag pa gsum pa ste dpyod pa dang brtson pa'i sgo'o //
T02TD2014E:3b-16: rdo rje rdul bral ni sgo dag pa bzhi pa ste sbyong ba dang sbyor ba'i sgo'o //
T02TD2014E:3b-17: rdo rje 'gro 'dzin ni gnas dag pa bzhi'o //
T02TD2014E:3b-18: rdo rje kun sdud ni gnas dag pa'i bla gab bo //
T02TD2014E:3b-19: rdo rje nges tshig ni sgo dag pa'i gdan no ;
T02TD2014E:3b-20: / rdo rje gnas med ni gnas dag pa'i snang ba'o //
T02TD2014E:3b-21: rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs ni longs spyod dag pa dang po ste /
T02TD2014E:3b-22: rab tu spro ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs so //
T02TD2014E:3b-23: rdo rje gdangs ni longs spyod dag pa gnyis pa ste rab tu spro ba'i dbyangs dang tshig dag go //
T02TD2014E:3b-24: rdo rje dri med ni longs spyod dag pa gsum pa ste rab tu spro ba'i dri sna tshogs so //
T02TD2014E:3b-25: rdo rje ro ni longs spyod dag pa bzhi pa ste /
T02TD2014E:3b-26: rab tu spro ba'i ro sna tshogs so //
T02TD2014E:3b-27: de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi yan lag gi rgyud de /
T02TD2014E:3b-28: rdo rje gshin rje'i dgra ni lus dang snying ga'i gnas byin gyis rlob pa ste /
T02TD2014E:3b-29: nag po dang rdo rje ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o ;
T02TD2014E:3b-30: / rdo rje'i zhing ni mtshog ma byin gyis rlob pa ste /
T02TD2014E:3b-31: dkar po dang 'khor lo ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2014E:3b-32: rdo rje'i sa ni lte ba'i gnas byin gyis rlob pa ste /
T02TD2014E:3b-33: ser po dang rin po che ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2014E:3b-34: rdo rje lhun po ni mgrin pa'i gnas byin gyis rlob pa ste /
T02TD2014E:3b-35: dmar po dang padma ni kha dog dang mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2014E:3b-36: rdo rje byin pa ni rkang pa'i gnas byin gyis rlob pa ste /
T02TD2014E:3b-37: ljang gu dang ral gri ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2014E:3b-38: rdo rje zung ni lag pa g-yas byin gyis rlob pa ste /
T02TD2014E:3b-39: dkar po dang tho ba ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2014E:4a-0: rdo rje dpyod pa ni lag pa g-yon byin gyis rlob pa @4a * //
T02TD2014E:4a-2: sngon po dang dbyug pa ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2014E:4a-3: rdo rje nges tshig ni kha byin gyis rlob pa ste dmar po dang padma ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2014E:4a-4: rdo rje rdul ni gsal ba'i gnas byin gyis rlob pa ste /
T02TD2014E:4a-5: ljang gu dang ral gri ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2014E:4a-6: rdo rje 'gro 'dzin ni mtshog ma'i gnas su g-yas phyogs byin gyis rlob pa ste /
T02TD2014E:4a-7: dkar mo dang 'khor lo ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2014E:4a-8: rdo rje kun sdud ni lte ba'i gnas su g-yon phyogs byin gyis rlob pa ste /
T02TD2014E:4a-9: mthing ga dang rdo rje ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2014E:4a-10: rdo rje nyes sel ni mgrin pa'i gnas su g-yon phyogs byin gyis rlob pa ste /
T02TD2014E:4a-11: dmar mo dang padma ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2014E:4a-12: rdo rje gnas med ni rkang pa'i gnas su g-yon phyogs byin gyis rlob pa ste /
T02TD2014E:4a-13: ljang gu dang autpala ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2014E:4a-14: rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs ni mig byin gyis rlob pa ste /
T02TD2014E:4a-15: dkar mo dang me long ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2014E:4a-16: rdo rje gdangs ni rna ba byin gyis rlob pa ste /
T02TD2014E:4a-17: dmar mo dang gling bu ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2014E:4a-18: rdo rje dri med ni sna byin gyis rlob pa ste /
T02TD2014E:4a-19: mthing ga dang spos phor ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2014E:4a-20: rdo rje ro ni lce byin gyis rlob pa ste /
T02TD2014E:4a-21: ljang gu dang ro snod ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2014E:4a-22: de la 'di ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi gsang sngags kyi rgyud de /
T02TD2014E:4a-23: ya rdo rje gshin rje dgra'i sa bon no //
T02TD2014E:4a-24: aom badzra ya m'a ri rdo rje gshin rje dgra'i gsang sngags so //
T02TD2014E:4a-25: kshe rdo rje zhing gi sa bon no //
T02TD2014E:4a-26: aom badzra kshe tra rdo rje zhing gi gsang sngags so //
T02TD2014E:4a-27: ma rdo rje sa'i sa bon no //
T02TD2014E:4a-29: rdo rje sa'i gsang sngags so //
T02TD2014E:4a-30: me rdo rje lhun po'i sa bon no //
T02TD2014E:4a-31: aom badzra me ru rdo rje lhun po'i gsang sngags so //
T02TD2014E:4a-32: d'a rdo rje spyin pa'i sa bon no //
T02TD2014E:4a-33: aom badzra d'a na rdo rje spyin pa'i gsang sngags so //
T02TD2014E:4a-34: ya rdo rje zung gi sa bon no //
T02TD2014E:4a-35: aom badzra ya ma rdo rje zung gi gsang sngags so //
T02TD2014E:4a-36: tstsha rdo rje dpyod pa'i sa bon no //
T02TD2014E:4a-37: aom badzra tsartsa na rdo rje dpyod pa'i gsang sngags so //
T02TD2014E:4a-38: ni rdo rje nges tshig gi sa bon no //
T02TD2014E:4a-39: aom badzra me rukti rdo rje nges tshig gi gsang sngags so //
T02TD2014E:4a-40: r'a rdo rje rdul bral gyi sa bon no //
T02TD2014E:4a-41: aom badzra r'a dza rdo rje rdul bral gyi gsang sngags so //
T02TD2014E:4b-0: dza rdo rje 'gro 'dzin gyi sa bon @4b no ;
T02TD2014E:4b-1: / aom badzra dza gham dha ra rdo rje 'gro 'dzin gyi gsang sngags so //
T02TD2014E:4b-2: sa rdo rje kun sdud kyi sa bon no //
T02TD2014E:4b-3: aom badzra sam ha ra ni /
T02TD2014E:4b-4: rdo rje kun sdud kyi gsang sngags so //
T02TD2014E:4b-5: do rdo rje nyes sel gyi sa bon no //
T02TD2014E:4b-6: aom badzra do ra hi da rdo rje nyes sel gyi gsang sngags so //
T02TD2014E:4b-7: ru rdo rje gnas med kyi sa bon no //
T02TD2014E:4b-8: aom badzra ru ni la rdo rje gnas med kyi gsang sngags so //
T02TD2014E:4b-9: na rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs kyi sa bon no //
T02TD2014E:4b-10: aom badzra na na r'u pa /
T02TD2014E:4b-11: rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs kyi gsang sngags so //
T02TD2014E:4b-12: yo rdo rje gdangs kyi sa bon no //
T02TD2014E:4b-13: aom badzra yo ya ge yam rdo rje gdangs kyi gsang sngags so //
T02TD2014E:4b-14: ni rdo rje dri med kyi sa bon no //
T02TD2014E:4b-15: aom badzra ni ra ma la rdo rje dri med kyi gsang sngags so //
T02TD2014E:4b-16: ra rdo rje ro'i sa bon no //
T02TD2014E:4b-17: aom badzra r'a sa rdo rje ro'i gsang sngags so //
T02TD2014E:4b-18: gsang sngags kyi yi ge chig 'di dag la brten nas /
T02TD2014E:4b-19: rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang /
T02TD2014E:4b-20: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi yan lag rnams legs par byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:4b-21: de ni yi ge rab gtor ba //
T02TD2014E:4b-22: mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin //
T02TD2014E:4b-23: de nas yi ge gtor ba yi //
T02TD2014E:4b-24: sbyor ba tshul bzhin bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:4b-25: gsang sngags yi ge sum cu gnyis //
T02TD2014E:4b-26: bsdu ba bcu bdun dag tu shes //
T02TD2014E:4b-27: gdug pa 'dul ba'i las rnams la //
T02TD2014E:4b-28: gtor ba 'di ni bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:4b-29: dang por ya zhes gang gsungs pa //
T02TD2014E:4b-30: gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par byed //
T02TD2014E:4b-31: kshe zhes bya bas dgra rnams kun //
T02TD2014E:4b-32: zad par byed par gdon mi za //
T02TD2014E:4b-33: ma zhes bya bas de bzhin du //
T02TD2014E:4b-34: de dag myur du gsod par byed //
T02TD2014E:4b-35: me zhes bya ba'i ngo bo yis //
T02TD2014E:4b-36: kun nas gnon par byed par bshad //
T02TD2014E:4b-37: da zhes bya ba 'joms pa ste //
T02TD2014E:4b-38: lus dang yan lag ma rung byed //
T02TD2014E:4b-39: de nas phyi rol bshad bya ste //
T02TD2014E:4b-40: ya zhes bya bas de bzhin du //
T02TD2014E:4b-41: 'jig cing rnam par g-yeng bar byed //
T02TD2014E:4b-42: tstsha zhes bya bas pags pa nas //
T02TD2014E:4b-43: snying gi mthar yang za bar byed //
T02TD2014E:4b-44: ni zhes bya bas lhag ma nas //
T02TD2014E:4b-45: cung zad lus par mi byed do //
T02TD2014E:4b-46: r'a zhes bya bas gzugs rnams kun //
T02TD2014E:4b-47: rdul bzhin du ni bsnyil bar byed //
T02TD2014E:4b-48: dz'a zhes bya bas dbang po rnams //
T02TD2014E:4b-49: rmugs par byed par gdon mi za //
T02TD2014E:4b-50: sa zhes bya bas yi dvags bzhin //
T02TD2014E:5a-2: do zhes bya bas bzang po yang //
T02TD2014E:5a-3: dman pa dag tu byed par 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:5a-4: ru zhes bya bas khrag rnams kun //
T02TD2014E:5a-5: sbu gu'i gnas nas rmongs par 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:5a-6: na zhes bya bas thams cad du //
T02TD2014E:5a-7: rnams par 'dren par byed par bshad //
T02TD2014E:5a-8: yo zhes bya bas las dag la //
T02TD2014E:5a-9: kun nas sbyor bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2014E:5a-10: ni zhes bya bas de bzhin du //
T02TD2014E:5a-11: dbang po nyams par byed pa ste //
T02TD2014E:5a-12: ra zhes bya ba dran pa'i gnas //
T02TD2014E:5a-13: bral bar byed par bshad pa'o //
T02TD2014E:5a-14: sgrub par byed pas tshul bzhin du //
T02TD2014E:5a-15: rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog bsgoms te //
T02TD2014E:5a-16: gsang sngags yi ge bcu bdun 'di //
T02TD2014E:5a-17: tshul bzhin sbyor ba gang shes pa //
T02TD2014E:5a-18: de ni ring po mi thogs par //
T02TD2014E:5a-19: gdug pa 'dul ba gdon mi za //
T02TD2014E:5a-20: gzhan yang gsang sngags yi ge ni //
T02TD2014E:5a-21: dpag bsam shing dang nor bu bzhin //
T02TD2014E:5a-22: dgos pa thams cad sgrub byed de //
T02TD2014E:5a-23: sgra dang yid la byed pa yis //
T02TD2014E:5a-24: rjes su mthun par 'gro ba yin //
T02TD2014E:5a-25: ya zhes bya bas 'gugs pa dang //
T02TD2014E:5a-26: bskrad dang dbye ba sogs kyang byed //
T02TD2014E:5a-27: kshe zhes bya bas bsrung ba dang //
T02TD2014E:5a-28: gtong dang 'khrug pa'i las kyang byed //
T02TD2014E:5a-29: ma zhes bya bas rmongs pa dang //
T02TD2014E:5a-30: bskyed dang shes pa'i las kyang byed //
T02TD2014E:5a-31: me zhes bya bas bdag nyid la //
T02TD2014E:5a-32: gang dag dgos pa de sbyor byed //
T02TD2014E:5a-33: da zhes bya bas 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD2014E:5a-34: spyin dang 'dul ba'i las kyang byed //
T02TD2014E:5a-35: ya zhes bya bas de bzhin du //
T02TD2014E:5a-36: gang dag bstan pa de sbyor byed //
T02TD2014E:5a-37: tstsha zhes bya bas g-yo ba dang //
T02TD2014E:5a-39: ni zhes bya bas 'gog pa dang //
T02TD2014E:5a-40: ma lus gdon mi za bar byed //
T02TD2014E:5a-41: r'a zhes bya bas dga' ba dang //
T02TD2014E:5a-42: chags dang grags la sogs pa'ang byed //
T02TD2014E:5a-43: dz'a zhes bya bas mig 'phrul dang //
T02TD2014E:5a-44: bskyed dang bsgyur ba la sogs byed //
T02TD2014E:5a-45: sa zhes bya bas bde ba dang //
T02TD2014E:5a-46: rdzogs dang sdud pa'i las kyang byed //
T02TD2014E:5a-47: do zhes bya bas ring 'gro zhing //
T02TD2014E:5a-48: sman la sbyor dang sel bar byed //
T02TD2014E:5a-49: ru zhes bya ba khro ba dang //
T02TD2014E:5a-50: chags dang kun nas sgra sgrogs byed //
T02TD2014E:5a-51: na zhes bya ba thob byed cing //
T02TD2014E:5a-53: yo zhes bya ba gang dang gang //
T02TD2014E:5a-54: rigs pa kun la sbyor bar byed //
T02TD2014E:5b-0: ni zhes bya ba @5b snga ma bzhin //
T02TD2014E:5b-1: 'gog pa la sogs sbyor bar byed //
T02TD2014E:5b-2: ra zhes bya ba de bzhin du //
T02TD2014E:5b-3: dga' dang chags la sogs pa byed //
T02TD2014E:5b-4: sgra yi rjes su zhugs pa yis //
T02TD2014E:5b-5: las rnams gang dang gang byed pa //
T02TD2014E:5b-6: yi ge gtor ba'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2014E:5b-7: de dag mdor bsdus bshad pa yin //
T02TD2014E:5b-8: de nas bshad par bya ba ni //
T02TD2014E:5b-9: kun nas bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i //
T02TD2014E:5b-10: gsang sngags sbyor ba'i tshul gang yin //
T02TD2014E:5b-11: mdor bsdus 'dir ni bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:5b-12: tho mar brjod pa'i yi ge ni //
T02TD2014E:5b-13: ya ma r'a zhes gang gsungs pa //
T02TD2014E:5b-14: yi dvags bdag po bod pa ste //
T02TD2014E:5b-15: las la skul bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2014E:5b-16: dz'a sa zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis //
T02TD2014E:5b-18: rgyas btab nas ni rmongs 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2014E:5b-19: de nyid myur du bskul ba ni //
T02TD2014E:5b-20: do me ya zhes brjod pa ste //
T02TD2014E:5b-21: gshin rje dgra yi gsang sngags 'dis //
T02TD2014E:5b-22: 'bad nas bskul ba byas pa ste //
T02TD2014E:5b-23: rgyas 'debs rnams kyis rgyas btab na //
T02TD2014E:5b-25: gsang sngags tshig rkang dang po 'di //
T02TD2014E:5b-27: gnyis pa dag tu brjod pa'i sngags //
T02TD2014E:5b-28: ya me do zhes gang gsungs pa //
T02TD2014E:5b-29: ma gdon bdag po bod pa ste //
T02TD2014E:5b-30: las la skul bar byed par bshad //
T02TD2014E:5b-31: ru na zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis //
T02TD2014E:5b-32: lus kyi gnas rnams thams cad kyi //
T02TD2014E:5b-33: spu gu'i gnas rnams thams cad nas //
T02TD2014E:5b-34: khrag kun yongs su 'dren par bshad //
T02TD2014E:5b-35: de nyid myur du skul byed pa //
T02TD2014E:5b-36: yo da ya zhes brjod pa ste //
T02TD2014E:5b-37: gang zhig gshin rje gshed kyi sngags //
T02TD2014E:5b-38: 'bad nas zlos par byed pa des //
T02TD2014E:5b-39: ma gdon bzhin du 'gro kun gyi //
T02TD2014E:5b-40: khrag rnams 'dren par gdon mi za //
T02TD2014E:5b-41: gsang sngags tshig rkang gnyis pa 'dis //
T02TD2014E:5b-42: khrag 'dren rnams kyis khrag drangs nas //
T02TD2014E:5b-43: rmongs par bya ba la sbyor ba //
T02TD2014E:5b-44: gshin rje gshed kyi bka' yis so //
T02TD2014E:5b-45: gsum pa dag du gsungs pa yi //
T02TD2014E:5b-46: ya da yo zhes gang brjod pa //
T02TD2014E:5b-47: 'joms byed bdag po bod pas te //
T02TD2014E:5b-48: las la skul bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2014E:5b-49: ni ra zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis //
T02TD2014E:5b-50: dbang po gnas rnams thams cad du //
T02TD2014E:5b-51: nus pa nyams shing 'gog pa yis //
T02TD2014E:6a-2: de nyid myur du bskul ba ni //
T02TD2014E:6a-3: ya kshe ya zhes brjod pa ste //
T02TD2014E:6a-4: gang zhig gshin rje gshed po'i sngags //
T02TD2014E:6a-5: 'bad nas zlos par byed pa des //
T02TD2014E:6a-6: 'joms byed rnams kyis bcom nas ni //
T02TD2014E:6a-7: brgyal bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za //
T02TD2014E:6a-8: gsang sngags tshig rkang gsum pa 'dis //
T02TD2014E:6a-9: shin tu rmongs par byas par 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:6a-10: bzhi pa dag tu gsungs pa'i sngags //
T02TD2014E:6a-11: ya kshe ya zhes gang gsungs pa //
T02TD2014E:6a-12: za byed bdag po bod pa ste //
T02TD2014E:6a-13: las la skul bar byed par bshad //
T02TD2014E:6a-14: tstsha ni zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis //
T02TD2014E:6a-15: pags pa mig dang snying gi mthar //
T02TD2014E:6a-16: gzhib dang myang dang bza' ba yis //
T02TD2014E:6a-17: lhag ma cung zad ma lus byed //
T02TD2014E:6a-18: de nyid myur du bskul ba ni //
T02TD2014E:6a-19: r'a ma ya zhes brjod pa ste //
T02TD2014E:6a-20: gang zhig gshin rje gshed po'i sngags //
T02TD2014E:6a-21: 'bad nas zlos par byed pa des //
T02TD2014E:6a-22: gdug pa za bar bya ba la //
T02TD2014E:6a-23: za byed rnams kyis za bar 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:6a-24: gsang sngags tshig rkang bzhi pa 'dis //
T02TD2014E:6a-25: gdug pa za ba'i mchog tu bshad //
T02TD2014E:6a-26: bstan pa dag la gnod byed pa'i //
T02TD2014E:6a-27: gdug pa tshar gcod bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2014E:6a-28: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD2014E:6a-29: gsang sngags tshul bzhin gang zlos pa //
T02TD2014E:6a-30: de yis gdug pa 'jig pa la //
T02TD2014E:6a-31: gsang sngags bsdu ba bshad pa'o //
T02TD2014E:6a-32: gzhan yang rgyal ba'i bstan pa la //
T02TD2014E:6a-33: kun nas dang ba'i 'gro ba rnams //
T02TD2014E:6a-34: de la phan gdags bskyab pa'i phyir //
T02TD2014E:6a-35: yi ge bsdu ba tshul bzhin bshad //
T02TD2014E:6a-36: gsang sngags yi ge sum cu gnyis //
T02TD2014E:6a-37: tshul bzhin phreng ba bkod pa la //
T02TD2014E:6a-38: gang dang gang du ya dang ni //
T02TD2014E:6a-39: ni zhes bya ba'i yi ge dag / bsal nas lhag ma brjod byas nas //
T02TD2014E:6a-41: ma r'a dz'a zhes gang smos pa //
T02TD2014E:6a-42: 'chi bdag las la gso bar bshad //
T02TD2014E:6a-43: sa do me zhes smos pa ni //
T02TD2014E:6a-44: de la de nyid spyin byed pa'o //
T02TD2014E:6a-45: dang por brjod pa'i gsang sngags 'dis //
T02TD2014E:6a-47: gnyis par brjod pa'i gsang sngags gang //
T02TD2014E:6a-48: me do ru zhes smos pa dag / bdag la nyes par brjod pa las //
T02TD2014E:6a-49: gang dang gang ni med byed pa //
T02TD2014E:6a-50: na yo da zhes brjod pa ste //
T02TD2014E:6b-0: @6b gsang sngags gnyis pa 'di yis ni //
T02TD2014E:6b-1: grags pa nyams pa gso bar byed //
T02TD2014E:6b-2: gsum pa dag tu gsungs pa'i sngags //
T02TD2014E:6b-3: da yo ra kshe zhes brjod pas //
T02TD2014E:6b-4: gang dag ji snyed yod pa yi //
T02TD2014E:6b-5: nor rnams kun du srung byed pa'o //
T02TD2014E:6b-6: gsum par gyur pa'i gsang sngags 'dis //
T02TD2014E:6b-7: longs spyod nyams pa gso bar byed //
T02TD2014E:6b-8: bzhi par gyur pa'i gsang sngags gang //
T02TD2014E:6b-9: kshe tstsha ra ma zhes brjod pa //
T02TD2014E:6b-10: dga' ba'i spyod yul phun sum tshogs //
T02TD2014E:6b-11: yongs su srung bar byed pa ste //
T02TD2014E:6b-12: gsang sngags bzhi par gyur pa 'dis //
T02TD2014E:6b-13: dga' ba'i spyod yul thams cad la//
T02TD2014E:6b-14: spyod par rang dbang thob pa ste //
T02TD2014E:6b-15: rgyal po chom rkun me la sogs //
T02TD2014E:6b-17: dad ldan sems can bsrung ba'i phyir //
T02TD2014E:6b-18: gsang sngags bsdu ba bshad pa'o //
T02TD2014E:6b-19: de dag tsam gyis rtsa ba yi //
T02TD2014E:6b-20: sngags don kun nas bsdu ba bshad //
T02TD2014E:6b-21: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02TD2014E:6b-22: yan lag so sor phye ba yi //
T02TD2014E:6b-23: sngags don cung zad bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:6b-24: gsang sngags kun gyi thog ma ru //
T02TD2014E:6b-25: phyag 'tshal yi ge gang bzhag pa //
T02TD2014E:6b-26: aa ni gdod nas skye ba med //
T02TD2014E:6b-27: au ni byang chub sems bskyed pa //
T02TD2014E:6b-28: de dag zung du 'byor pa yi //
T02TD2014E:6b-30: aom ni mngon par rdzogs byang chub //
T02TD2014E:6b-31: de bas yi ge aom zhes bya //
T02TD2014E:6b-32: bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir //
T02TD2014E:6b-33: phyag 'tshal yi ge zhes bya ste //
T02TD2014E:6b-34: gsang sngags gang dag brjod pa yi //
T02TD2014E:6b-35: thog mar yi ge 'di bzhag na //
T02TD2014E:6b-36: rab tu bsngags zhes bshad pa yin ;
T02TD2014E:6b-37: / tha mar phyag 'tshal brjod pa las //
T02TD2014E:6b-38: ha ni mi phyed rdo rje ste //
T02TD2014E:6b-39: au ni byang chub sems bskyed pa //
T02TD2014E:6b-40: aam ni mngon par rdzogs byang chub //
T02TD2014E:6b-41: de phyir yi ge h'um zhes pa //
T02TD2014E:6b-42: thugs kyi rdo rje rten byed pa'o //
T02TD2014E:6b-43: gzhan yang bkra shis yi ge ni //
T02TD2014E:6b-44: sa ni yang dag mnyam pa nyid ;
T02TD2014E:6b-45: / ba ni sgra snyan yid 'ong ba //
T02TD2014E:6b-46: aa ni skye ba med pa'o //
T02TD2014E:6b-47: ha ni sdig pa sel ba la //
T02TD2014E:6b-48: aa ni de bzhin skye ba med //
T02TD2014E:6b-49: de phyir sv'a h'a zhes bya ba //
T02TD2014E:6b-50: bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa ste //
T02TD2014E:6b-51: sv'a zhes bya ba sva sti ka / h'a zhes bya ba ro ru ha //
T02TD2014E:6b-52: bkra shis gzhi tshugs zhes brjod pa'o //
T02TD2014E:7a-0: @7a * // de phyir sngags rnams thams cad kyi //
T02TD2014E:7a-1: mjug tu tshig 'di bsngags pa yin //
T02TD2014E:7a-2: de la sogs pa'i sngags tshig la //
T02TD2014E:7a-3: yi ge yan lag gang ldan pa //
T02TD2014E:7a-4: de dag bye brag rnam phye ste //
T02TD2014E:7a-5: chos don lha dang las rnams dag / bye brag so sor sbyar byas pa //
T02TD2014E:7a-6: yan lag so sor phye ba yi //
T02TD2014E:7a-7: sngags don bshad pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2014E:7a-8: de la 'di ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa'i cho ga'i rgyud de /
T02TD2014E:7a-9: thog ma nyid du rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i sa bon du gyur pa /
T02TD2014E:7a-10: yam mam ram dzam zhes bya ba'i yi ge bzhi /
T02TD2014E:7a-11: byang dang shar dang lho dang nub rnams su rim pa bzhin du sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po'i kha dog dang ldan pa /
T02TD2014E:7a-12: 'od dang ldan pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:7a-13: de nas yi ge mam de las aom badzra mam spha ra na zhes bya bas bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:7a-14: yi ge mam de las ye shes kyi rdo rje byung nas 'jigs rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab ste /
T02TD2014E:7a-15: 'gro ba thams cad kyi ma rig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nga rgyal dang bcas pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /
T02TD2014E:7a-17: nang gis thams cad la phog pas /
T02TD2014E:7a-18: de dag gi dri ma thams cad yongs su dag par byas te dbyer med par gyur nas /
T02TD2014E:7a-19: ye shes kyis rdo rje de nyid dang dbyer med par gyur te rdo rje de nyid kyang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
T02TD2014E:7a-20: de nas yi ge dzam de las aom badzra dzam sva ra na zhes bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:7a-21: yi ge dzam de las ye shes kyi chu byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab ste /
T02TD2014E:7a-22: 'gro ba thams cad kyi ma rig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /
T02TD2014E:7a-23: phyi rol dang nang gi chu thams cad la phog pas dri ma thams cad dag par byas te /
T02TD2014E:7a-24: ye shes kyi chu dang dbyer med par gyur te /
T02TD2014E:7a-25: ye shes kyi chu de yang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
T02TD2014E:7a-26: de nas yi ge ram de las aom badzra ram sba ra na zhes bya bas bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:7a-27: ram de las ye shes kyi me byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab ste /
T02TD2014E:7b-0: 'gro ba thams cad kyi ma rig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang phyi @7b rol dang nang gi me thams cad la pog pas dri ma thams cad dag par byas te /
T02TD2014E:7b-1: ye shes kyi me dang dbyer med par gyur nas /
T02TD2014E:7b-2: ye shes kyi me de yang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
T02TD2014E:7b-3: de nas yi ge yam de las aom badzra yam sba ra na zhes bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:7b-4: de las ye shes kyi rlung byung nas /
T02TD2014E:7b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab ste /
T02TD2014E:7b-6: 'gro ba thams cad kyi ma rig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phrag dog dang bcas pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang phyi rol dang nang gi rlung thams cad la phog pas dri ma thams cad dag par byas te /
T02TD2014E:7b-7: ye shes kyi rlung dang dbyer med par gyur nas /
T02TD2014E:7b-8: ye shes kyi rlung de yang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
T02TD2014E:7b-9: de nas dri ma thams cad yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud kyi dbyer med pa'i ngo bo nyid ye shes rang rig pa tsam sgyu ma lta bu chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid du ro gcig par gyur pa ji ltar nus pa de tsam du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:7b-10: de nas snying rje chen po'i sems skyes pas /
T02TD2014E:7b-11: de ma thag tu byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin de nyid nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig tu gyur to //
T02TD2014E:7b-12: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de yang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bzhin du dbus sa'i cha dgu dang ldan pa /
T02TD2014E:7b-13: gru bzhi sgo dang ldan pa'i phyi rol 'khor yug kun nas zlum pa /
T02TD2014E:7b-14: 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD2014E:7b-15: dbus kyi cha la yi ge ya kha dog mthing ga 'od zer gyi phreng bas kun nas bskor ba bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:7b-16: shar phyogs kyi cha la yi ge kshe kha dog dkar po 'od zer gyi phreng bas kun nas bskor ba bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:7b-17: lho phyogs kyi cha la yi ge ma kha dog ser po 'od zer gyi phreng bas kun nas bskor ba bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:7b-18: nub phyogs kyi cha la yi ge me kha dog dmar po 'od zer gyi phreng bas kun nas bskor ba bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:7b-19: byang phyogs kyi cha la yi ge da kha dog ljang gu 'od zer gyi phreng bas kun nas bskor ba bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:7b-20: 'od zer gyi phreng ba de dag kyang dang po rang rang gi kha dog dang 'dra ba'i 'od las /
T02TD2014E:7b-21: phyi rol nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bu rab tu gsal bar 'phro ba'o //
T02TD2014E:8a-0: de nas shar lho'i cha la yi ge dz'a kha dog dkar po 'od @8a * //
T02TD2014E:8a-1: zer gyi phreng ba can no //
T02TD2014E:8a-2: lho nub kyi cha la yi ge sa kha dog sngon po 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no //
T02TD2014E:8a-3: nub byang gi cha la yi ge dza kha dog dmar po 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no //
T02TD2014E:8a-4: byang shar kyi cha la yi ge ru kha dog ljang gu 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no //
T02TD2014E:8a-5: de'i phyi rol gyi grva rnams la //
T02TD2014E:8a-6: shar lhor yi ge na kha dog dkar po 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no //
T02TD2014E:8a-7: lho nub tu yi ge yo kha dog mthing ga 'od zer kyi phreng ba can no //
T02TD2014E:8a-8: nub byang du yi ge ni kha dog dmar po 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no //
T02TD2014E:8a-9: byang shar du yi ge r'a kha dog ljang gu 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no ;
T02TD2014E:8a-10: /'od zer gyi phreng ba brgyad po de dag kyang /
T02TD2014E:8a-11: dang po rang rang 'dra ba'i 'od zer las phyi rol zla ba'i 'od zer lta bur gyur pa'o //
T02TD2014E:8a-12: shar gyi sgor yi ge ya kha dog dkar po //
T02TD2014E:8a-13: lho phyogs kyi sgor yi ge tsa kha dog mthing ga / nub phyogs kyi sgor yi ge ni kha dog dmar po //
T02TD2014E:8a-14: byang phyogs kyi sgor yi ge r'a kha dog ljang gu de dag kyang 'od zer phreng ba can sha stag ste /
T02TD2014E:8a-15: 'od zer gyi phreng ba de dag kyang dang po rang rang gi 'od zer las phyi rol me'i 'od lta bur gyur pa'o //
T02TD2014E:8a-16: de ltar ji ltar nus pa zhig bsam par byas nas //
T02TD2014E:8a-17: de nas yi ge ya la dmigs te /
T02TD2014E:8a-18: aom badzra ya m'a ri zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:8a-19: ya las ya'i 'od zer byung nas /
T02TD2014E:8a-20: nam mkha'i khams thams cad du gang bar gyur to //
T02TD2014E:8a-21: yi ge de dag bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po'i sku sha stag tu gyur te nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang bar bsam mo //
T02TD2014E:8a-22: de nas sku de dag thams cad 'od du gyur pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi rang bzhin chos 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya shel lta bur dkar zhing dangs pa gru gsum pa gyen du gnas pa /
T02TD2014E:8a-23: nang padma dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa zhig tu gyur par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:8a-24: sna tshogs rdo rje las kyang ye shes kyi rlung gi phung po chen por gyur te /
T02TD2014E:8a-25: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brtan par nus so //
T02TD2014E:8a-26: de nas yi ge kshe la dmigs te /
T02TD2014E:8a-27: aom badzra kshe tra zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:8b-0: kshe las kshe 'i 'od zer @8b byung nas chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya thams cad gang bar byas te /
T02TD2014E:8b-1: yi ge de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku sha stag tu gyur nas /
T02TD2014E:8b-2: chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yongs su gang bar byas so //
T02TD2014E:8b-3: de nas sku de dag kyang 'od du zhu bar gyur pa las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che padma 'dab ma dang ge sar dang snying por bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:8b-4: de nas yi ge ma la dmigs te /
T02TD2014E:8b-5: aom badzra ma h'i ndri zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:8b-6: ma las ma'i 'od zer byung bas padma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ster thams cad yongs su gang bar byas so //
T02TD2014E:8b-7: de nas yi ge de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ba'i sku sha stag tu gyur nas padma'i snying po la 'dus par gyur pas 'og tu zhu bar gyur nas /
T02TD2014E:8b-8: rin po che gser gyi rang bzhin du kun nas 'khrigs par gyur par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:8b-9: de nas yi ge me la dmigs te /
T02TD2014E:8b-10: aom badzra me ru zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:8b-11: me las me'i 'od zer byung nas padma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yongs su gang bar byas so //
T02TD2014E:8b-12: de nas yi ge de dag bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi sku sha stag tu gyur te padma'i snying po gser gyi rang bzhin gyi gzhi la 'dus par gyur pas 'od du gyur nas rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'i ri'i rgyal po lhun po rab tu brtan par gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:8b-13: de nas yi ge da la dmigs te /
T02TD2014E:8b-14: aom badzra da na zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:8b-15: da las da'i 'od zer byung nas phyogs kun du gang bar byas so //
T02TD2014E:8b-16: de nas yi ge de dag bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa'i sku sha stag tu gyur te de dag ri rab kyi rtse mor 'dus pa las /
T02TD2014E:8b-17: 'od du gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi longs spyod sna tshogs kyi gzhir gyur pa ni 'di lta ste dpag bsam gyi shing dang /
T02TD2014E:8b-21: spos kyi shing dag kyang kha dog dang dbyibs dang gnas pas khyad par du byas pa'o //
T02TD2014E:9a-1: la sogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyang kha dog dang /
T02TD2014E:9a-3: reg bya dang gnas pas khyad par du byas pa'o //
T02TD2014E:9a-6: khrus kyi chu dag kyang kha dog dang dbyibs dang dri dang ro dang yan lag dang gnas pas khyad par du byas pa'o //
T02TD2014E:9a-8: bza' ba'i bye brag dag kyang de bzhin du yon tan gyis khyad par du byas pa ste /
T02TD2014E:9a-9: de lta bu la sogs pa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:9a-10: de nas yi ge dza la dmigs te /
T02TD2014E:9a-11: aom badzra dz'a gaddha ra zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:9a-12: dza las dza'i 'od zer byung ste /
T02TD2014E:9a-13: phyogs kun du gang bar byas nas de dag kyang sangs rgyas spyan gyi sku sha stag tu gyur te slar 'dus nas 'od du gyur pa las gzhal med khang gi gzhir gyur pa ni /
T02TD2014E:9a-15: gzhi sna tshogs rdo rje las grub cing ;
T02TD2014E:9a-16: phyogs kun du yang sna tshogs rdo rje ra ba dang /
T02TD2014E:9a-17: dra ba 'ang 'khrigs par gyur pa de'i nang du /
T02TD2014E:9a-18: rin po che sna bzhi'i rgyu las grub pa'i gzhal med khang gi gzhi grub par bsam mo //
T02TD2014E:9a-19: de nas yi ge sa la dmigs te /
T02TD2014E:9a-20: aom badzra sam ha ra ni zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags gyis bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:9a-21: sa las sa'i 'od zer byung nas phyogs kun gang bar byas te /
T02TD2014E:9a-22: de dag kyang m'a ma k'i'i sku sha stag tu gyur nas slar 'dus te 'od du gyur pa las gzhal yas khang gi bla gab tu gyur pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD2014E:9a-23: rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdung dang /
T02TD2014E:9a-27: lan kan gyi dra ba dang /
T02TD2014E:9a-29: gzer mig la sogs pas spras pa'i dbus na gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnas pa /
T02TD2014E:9a-30: phyi rol rdo rje gur gyis yongs su 'khrigs par gtams pa'o //
T02TD2014E:9a-31: de nas yi ge do la dmigs te /
T02TD2014E:9a-32: aom badzra do ra hi ta zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:9a-33: do las do'i 'od zer byung nas /
T02TD2014E:9a-34: phyogs kun du gang bar byas te /
T02TD2014E:9a-35: de dag kyang na bza' dkar mo sha stag tu gyur nas /
T02TD2014E:9a-36: slar 'dus te 'od du gyur pa las gzhal yas khang gi gdan du gyur pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD2014E:9b-2: de nas yi ge ru la dmigs te /
T02TD2014E:9b-3: aom badzra ru ni la zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:9b-4: ru las ru'i 'od zer byung nas phyogs kun du gang bar byas te /
T02TD2014E:9b-5: de dag kyang sgrol ma'i sku sha stag tu gyur nas slar 'dus te 'od du gyur pa las gzhal yas khang gi rnam par gyur pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD2014E:9b-6: phyogs mtshams rnams su rin po che snang bar gyur te shin tu 'od gsal bar gyur pa'o //
T02TD2014E:9b-7: rin po che snang ba de dag kyang gzhi rten pa med cing 'od sgrib pa dang chod pa med de /
T02TD2014E:9b-8: 'dod dgur 'phrul ba snang ba sha stag go //
T02TD2014E:9b-9: de nas yi ge ya la dmigs te /
T02TD2014E:9b-10: aom badzra ya ma zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:9b-11: ya las ya'i 'od zer byung nas shar phyogs su 'phros te de dag kyang gshin rje mthar byed kyi sku sha stag tu gyur nas shar phyogs kyi sgor 'dus te 'od du gyur nas shar phyogs kyi sgo phun sum tshogs par gyur pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD2014E:9b-12: sgo de yang sgo khang dang bcas pa /
T02TD2014E:9b-14: them skas dang rta babs dang bcas pa /
T02TD2014E:9b-15: 'gro ba 'jug pa dang thugs rje 'byung ba'i mthu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i sgor gyur pa'o //
T02TD2014E:9b-16: de nas yi ge tsa la dmigs te ;
T02TD2014E:9b-17: aom badzra tsar tsan zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:9b-18: tsa de las tsa'i 'od zer byung nas /
T02TD2014E:9b-19: lho phyogs su 'phros te de dag kyang khro bo shes rab mthar byed kyi sku sha stag tu gyur nas lho phyogs kyi sgor 'dus pa las /
T02TD2014E:9b-20: 'od du gyur nas lho phyogs kyi sgo de yang phun sum tshogs par gyur pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD2014E:9b-21: gtong ba dang len pa'i mthu phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo'o //
T02TD2014E:9b-22: de nas yi ge ni la dmigs te /
T02TD2014E:9b-23: aom badzra ni ru ka ti zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:9b-24: ni las ni'i 'od zer byung nas nub phyogs su 'phros te de dag kyang padma mthar byed kyi sku sha stag tu gyur nas nub phyogs kyi sgor 'dus pa las 'od du gyur nas nub phyogs kyi sgo de yang phun sum tshogs pa'i sgor gyur pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD2014E:9b-25: dam pa'i chos sna tshogs bstan pa la spyod cing rtsen pa'i mthu phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo'o //
T02TD2014E:10a-2: aom badzra r'a dza zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:10a-3: r'a las r'a'i 'od zer byung nas byang phyogs su 'phros te /
T02TD2014E:10a-4: de yang bgegs mthar byed kyi sku sha stag tu gyur nas byang phyogs kyi sgor 'dus pa las 'od du gyur nas byang phyogs kyi sgo de yang phun sum tshogs pa'i sgor gyur pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD2014E:10a-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang /
T02TD2014E:10a-6: sems can yongs su sgrol ba la sbyor ba'i mthu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i sgo'o //
T02TD2014E:10a-7: de nas yi ge na la dmigs te /
T02TD2014E:10a-8: aom badzra na na r'u pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:10a-9: na las na'i 'od zer byung nas phyogs thams cad du 'phros te de dag kyang gzugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i lha mo'i sku sha stag tu gyur te slar gzhal yas khang gi 'khor yug tu 'dus nas gzugs kyi mchod pa thams cad byin gyis rlob par mdzad par gyur to //
T02TD2014E:10a-10: de nas yi ge yo la dmigs te /
T02TD2014E:10a-11: aom badzra yo ya ge yam zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:10a-12: yo las yo'i 'od zer byung nas phyogs thams cad du 'phros te de dag kyang sgra'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i lha mo'i sku sha stag tu gyur nas /
T02TD2014E:10a-13: slar gzhal yas khang gi 'khor yug tu 'dus te /
T02TD2014E:10a-14: sgra'i mchod pa thams cad byin gyis rlob par mdzad par gyur to //
T02TD2014E:10a-15: de nas yi ge ni la dmigs te /
T02TD2014E:10a-16: aom badzra ni ra ma la zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:10a-17: ni las ni'i 'od zer byung nas phyogs thams cad du 'phros te de dag kyang di'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i lha mo'i sku sha stag tu gyur nas /
T02TD2014E:10a-18: slar gzhal yas khang gi 'khor yug tu 'dus te dri sna tshogs kyi mchod pa byin gyis rlob par mdzad par gyur to //
T02TD2014E:10a-19: de nas yi ge r'a la dmigs te /
T02TD2014E:10a-20: aom badzra r'a sa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
T02TD2014E:10a-21: ra las ra'i 'od zer byung nas phyogs thams cad du 'phros te de dag kyang ro'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i lha mo'i sku sha stag tu gyur te /
T02TD2014E:10a-22: slar gzhal yas khang gi 'khor yug tu 'dus nas ro sna tshogs kyi mchod pa byin gyis rlob par gyur to //
T02TD2014E:10a-23: de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i bsgom pa bshad pa yin /
T02TD2014E:10b-0: @10b de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD2014E:10b-1: yan lag bsgom pa bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:10b-3: sa bon bcu bdun gyis gang ba'i //
T02TD2014E:10b-4: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas pa las //
T02TD2014E:10b-5: cung zad tsam zhig bltas nas ni //
T02TD2014E:10b-6: de las 'od zer spro bya ste //
T02TD2014E:10b-7: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kun du //
T02TD2014E:10b-8: rgyal ba kun dang de yi sras //
T02TD2014E:10b-9: rigs sngags rgyal po rgyal mor bcas //
T02TD2014E:10b-10: yi ge'i 'od kyis spyan drangs nas //
T02TD2014E:10b-11: snga ma'i gnas su thim par gyur //
T02TD2014E:10b-12: de yi nyi ma sa bon bcas //
T02TD2014E:10b-14: ye shes 'od kyi gong bur gyur //
T02TD2014E:10b-15: chos sku dag pa'i rang bzhin du //
T02TD2014E:10b-16: gnyis med ye shes brtan pa las //
T02TD2014E:10b-17: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bskul ba dang //
T02TD2014E:10b-18: snying rje chen po'i mthus bslangs nas //
T02TD2014E:10b-19: gshin rje gshed ni bzhengs par bya //
T02TD2014E:10b-21: yang na char sprin 'dra ba'i mdog / sdo rang dag gam stag zil bzhin //
T02TD2014E:10b-22: yang na las kyi bye brag gis //
T02TD2014E:10b-23: dkar dang dmar dang ser yang rung //
T02TD2014E:10b-24: zhal drug phyag drug zhabs kyang drug / sbrul gyi rgyan gyis bzhugs pa la //
T02TD2014E:10b-25: stag lpags rlon pa na bzar gsol //
T02TD2014E:10b-26: smin ma spyan dang skra yang ser //
T02TD2014E:10b-27: sen mo spu dang pags pa dang //
T02TD2014E:10b-28: lus kyang rdo rje'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD2014E:10b-30: be con ral gri dgra sta rnams //
T02TD2014E:10b-31: g-yas pa'i phyag na bsnams pa ste //
T02TD2014E:10b-32: bhandha sdigs mdzub zhags pa ni //
T02TD2014E:10b-33: g-yon pa'i phyag na bsnams pa la //
T02TD2014E:10b-34: dpa' bo g-yas brkyang stabs kyis ni ;
T02TD2014E:10b-35: / ma he ro dang bcas pa brdzis //
T02TD2014E:10b-36: mi bzad 'bar ba'i skur gyur pa'o //
T02TD2014E:10b-37: yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis te //
T02TD2014E:10b-38: g-yas pas mtshon cha be con gdengs //
T02TD2014E:10b-39: g-yon pas sdigs mdzub thugs kar 'dzin //
T02TD2014E:10b-40: gang dag phyag bzhi 'dod pa na //
T02TD2014E:10b-41: g-yas na be con ral gri ste ;
T02TD2014E:10b-42: / g-yon na bhandha zhags pa bsnams //
T02TD2014E:10b-43: 'di la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan ni //
T02TD2014E:10b-44: bcu gnyis dag gam bco brgyad dam //
T02TD2014E:10b-45: yang na brgya dang stong dag dang //
T02TD2014E:10b-46: 'bum dang bye ba rdu la snyed du //
T02TD2014E:10b-47: ji ltar 'dod par bsgom par bya //
T02TD2014E:10b-48: ji ltar 'dod pa de nyid kyis //
T02TD2014E:11a-1: grub thob par gdon mi za //
T02TD2014E:11a-2: de nas snying ga'i gnas dag la //
T02TD2014E:11a-3: sa bon bcu bdun gyis gang ba'i //
T02TD2014E:11a-4: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin //
T02TD2014E:11a-5: 'dir yang gnas par blta bar bya //
T02TD2014E:11a-6: de nas sa bon yam yig la //
T02TD2014E:11a-7: sngon bzhin gsang sngags gis bskul bas //
T02TD2014E:11a-8: gshin rje'i dgra ru gyur nas ni //
T02TD2014E:11a-9: slar 'dus thugs kyi rdo rje ra gyur //
T02TD2014E:11a-10: sngon po rdo rje mtshon cha can //
T02TD2014E:11a-11: snying ga'i gnas phyogs nyid du ni //
T02TD2014E:11a-12: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gdan la bzhugs //
T02TD2014E:11a-13: de nas sa bon gyis gang ba'i //
T02TD2014E:11a-14: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de nyid kyang//
T02TD2014E:11a-15: thugs kyi rdo rje thugs kar gnas //
T02TD2014E:11a-18: de nas kshe yi sa bon de //
T02TD2014E:11a-19: snga ma bzhin du sngags kyis bskul //
T02TD2014E:11a-20: rdo rje'i zhing du gyur nas ni //
T02TD2014E:11a-21: dkar po 'khor lo'i mtshon cha can //
T02TD2014E:11a-22: mtshog mar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD2014E:11a-23: sku yi rdo rje bzhugs par gyur //
T02TD2014E:11a-26: de nas sa bon ma las ni //
T02TD2014E:11a-27: rang gi gsang sngags kyis bskul bas //
T02TD2014E:11a-28: rdo rje sa zhes bya bar gyur //
T02TD2014E:11a-29: gser 'dra rin chen mtshan ma can //
T02TD2014E:11a-30: lte bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD2014E:11a-31: mnyam pa'i rdo rje nyid du gyur ;
T02TD2014E:11a-34: de nas me zhes bya ba la //
T02TD2014E:11a-35: gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskul ba yis //
T02TD2014E:11a-36: rdo rje lhun po zhes byar bshad //
T02TD2014E:11a-38: me tog padma'i mtshan ma can //
T02TD2014E:11a-39: mgul bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD2014E:11a-40: gsung gi rdo rje nyid du gyur //
T02TD2014E:11a-43: de nas sa bon da zhes pa //
T02TD2014E:11a-44: de bzhin gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskul //
T02TD2014E:11a-45: rdo rje spyin pa zhes byar gyur //
T02TD2014E:11a-47: ral gri 'bar ba'i mtshon cha can //
T02TD2014E:11a-48: rkang pa g-yas su nyi ma la //
T02TD2014E:11a-49: las kyi rdo rje nyid du gyur //
T02TD2014E:11a-52: de nas dza la bltas nas ni //
T02TD2014E:11a-53: rang gi sngags kyis bskul ba yis //
T02TD2014E:11a-54: rdo rje 'gro 'dzin zhes bya ra gyur //
T02TD2014E:11a-55: dkar mo 'khor lo'i mtshon cha can //
T02TD2014E:11a-56: rdo rje zhing gi g-yon phyogs su //
T02TD2014E:11a-57: zla ba'i gdan la gnas nas ni //
T02TD2014E:11b-0: rdo rje @11b zhing la gzigs par mdzad //
T02TD2014E:11b-3: de nas sa la bltas byas te //
T02TD2014E:11b-4: de bzhin sngags kyis bskul ba yis //
T02TD2014E:11b-5: rdo rje kun sdud ces byar gyur //
T02TD2014E:11b-6: bee d'u ra rdo rje mtshan ma can //
T02TD2014E:11b-7: rdo rje sa yi g-yon phyogs su //
T02TD2014E:11b-8: zla ba'i gdan la gnas nas ni ;
T02TD2014E:11b-9: / rdo rje sa la gzigs par mdzad //
T02TD2014E:11b-11: aom badzra sam ha ra ni /
T02TD2014E:11b-12: yi ge do la dmigs byas te //
T02TD2014E:11b-13: de nyid gsang sngags kyis bskul bas //
T02TD2014E:11b-14: rdo rje nyes sel zhes byar gyur //
T02TD2014E:11b-15: dmar mo lag na padma can //
T02TD2014E:11b-16: rdo rje lhun po'i g-yon phyogs su //
T02TD2014E:11b-17: zla ba'i gdan la gnas nas ni //
T02TD2014E:11b-18: rdo rje lhun po la gzigs mdzad //
T02TD2014E:11b-20: aom badzra do ra hi ta /
T02TD2014E:11b-21: yi ge ru la dmigs byas te //
T02TD2014E:11b-22: de bzhin sngags kyis bskul ba yis //
T02TD2014E:11b-23: rdo rje gnas med ces bya ba //
T02TD2014E:11b-24: ma rgad autpala shes rab mtshan //
T02TD2014E:11b-25: rdo rje spyin pa'i g-yon phyogs su //
T02TD2014E:11b-26: zla ba'i gdan la gnas nas ni //
T02TD2014E:11b-27: rdo rje spyin pa la gzigs mdzad //
T02TD2014E:11b-30: de nas na la dmigs byas te //
T02TD2014E:11b-31: rang gi sngags kyis bskul ba yis //
T02TD2014E:11b-32: rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs su gyur //
T02TD2014E:11b-33: dkar mo lag na me long can //
T02TD2014E:11b-34: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gdan la ni //
T02TD2014E:11b-35: mig gi gnas su bsam par bya //
T02TD2014E:11b-38: yi ge yo la dmigs byas te //
T02TD2014E:11b-39: sngon bzhin gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskul //
T02TD2014E:11b-40: lha mo rdo rje gdangs su gyur //
T02TD2014E:11b-41: dmar mo lag na pi wang 'dzin //
T02TD2014E:11b-42: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par //
T02TD2014E:11b-43: mkhas pas rna ba'i gnas la bsam //
T02TD2014E:11b-45: aom badzra yo ya ge yam /
T02TD2014E:11b-46: yi ge ni la dmigs nas ni //
T02TD2014E:11b-47: de bzhin sngags kyis bskul ba yis //
T02TD2014E:11b-48: rdo rje dri med ces byar gyur //
T02TD2014E:11b-49: sngon mo lag na phreng ba 'dzin //
T02TD2014E:11b-50: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par //
T02TD2014E:11b-51: sna yi gnas la bsam par bya //
T02TD2014E:11b-53: aom badzra ni ra ma la tsa //
T02TD2014E:11b-54: de nas ra la dmigs nas ni //
T02TD2014E:11b-55: rang gi sngags kyis bskul pa yis //
T02TD2014E:11b-56: rdo rje ro zhes bya bar gyur //
T02TD2014E:12a-0: ljang gu ro ldan zas snod @12a * //
T02TD2014E:12a-2: / mkhas pas lce yi gnas la bsam //
T02TD2014E:12a-5: de nas yi ge ya la dmigs //
T02TD2014E:12a-6: sngags kyis bskul bas de bzhin du //
T02TD2014E:12a-7: rdo rje zung du gyur nas ni //
T02TD2014E:12a-8: dkar po rdo rje tho ba can //
T02TD2014E:12a-9: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa //
T02TD2014E:12a-10: dpung pa g-yas pa'i gnas la dgod //
T02TD2014E:12a-13: de bzhin tsa la dmigs nas ni //
T02TD2014E:12a-14: rang gi sngags kyis bskul ba yis //
T02TD2014E:12a-15: rdo rje dpyod pa zhes bya ba //
T02TD2014E:12a-16: sngon po lag na dbyug pa can //
T02TD2014E:12a-17: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa //
T02TD2014E:12a-18: dpung pa g-yon pa'i gnas la dgod //
T02TD2014E:12a-20: aom badzra tsa ra tsa na /
T02TD2014E:12a-21: yi ge ni la dmigs byas te //
T02TD2014E:12a-22: de bzhin sngags kyis bskul ba yis //
T02TD2014E:12a-23: rdo rje nges tshig ces bya ba //
T02TD2014E:12a-24: dmar mo lag na padma can //
T02TD2014E:12a-25: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa//
T02TD2014E:12a-26: mkhas pas rkan la bsam par bya //
T02TD2014E:12a-28: aom badzra ni ru ka ti //
T02TD2014E:12a-29: yi ge ra la dmigs byas te //
T02TD2014E:12a-30: de bzhin gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskul //
T02TD2014E:12a-31: rdo rje rdul bral zhes bya ba //
T02TD2014E:12a-32: ljang gu lag na ral gri can //
T02TD2014E:12a-33: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa //
T02TD2014E:12a-34: gsang ba'i gnas la bsam par bya //
T02TD2014E:12a-37: de ltar dkyil 'khor bsgom byas nas //
T02TD2014E:12a-38: ci nus gsal bar blta bar bya //
T02TD2014E:12a-39: de nas snying rje chen po yis //
T02TD2014E:12a-40: gdug pa 'dul phyir khros nas ni //
T02TD2014E:12a-41: rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan gsum mam ;
T02TD2014E:12a-42: / ba dun nam nyi shu gcig brjod pas //
T02TD2014E:12a-43: khro bo 'bar ba'i ye shes las //
T02TD2014E:12a-44: 'od zer yi ge mtshon cha dang //
T02TD2014E:12a-46: de tshe sangs rgyas zhing yang g-yos //
T02TD2014E:12a-47: gdug pa'i tshogs kun bcom nas ni //
T02TD2014E:12a-48: sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang //
T02TD2014E:12a-49: yan lag mgo yi dum bu dang //
T02TD2014E:12a-50: ro dang yan lag nyams pa'i ro //
T02TD2014E:12a-51: mtshon chas phug pa'i khrag bcas pa //
T02TD2014E:12a-52: kun nas sprin bzhin 'dus par gyur //
T02TD2014E:12a-53: de nas sangs rgyas zhing 'di yang //
T02TD2014E:12a-54: mi bzad dur khrod chen por gyur //
T02TD2014E:12b-0: shin tu rul ba 'bu dang rang / khrag dang zhag dang glang pa @12b dang ;
T02TD2014E:12b-1: / gsar dang rnying dang tshig pa dang //
T02TD2014E:12b-2: dri yang phyogs su ldang bar gyur //
T02TD2014E:12b-3: keng rus dag las me yang 'bar //
T02TD2014E:12b-4: 'bu dang sbrang ma mang po dang //
T02TD2014E:12b-5: kang ka rgod dang bya rog dang //
T02TD2014E:12b-6: sha la dga' ba'i 'dab chags kun //
T02TD2014E:12b-7: kun nas za zhing 'thab par byed //
T02TD2014E:12b-8: seng ge stag dang wa dang khyi ;
T02TD2014E:12b-9: / sha la dga' ba'i srog chags kun //
T02TD2014E:12b-10: de bzhin za zhing 'thab par byed //
T02TD2014E:12b-11: 'byung po yi dvags sha za'i tshogs //
T02TD2014E:12b-12: ma mo srin mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs //
T02TD2014E:12b-14: de nas sprul pa'i tshogs chen kun //
T02TD2014E:12b-15: sangs rgyas kun dang 'dres gyur nas //
T02TD2014E:12b-16: gshin rje gshed la thim par gyur //
T02TD2014E:12b-17: de nas khro bo gshin rje gshed //
T02TD2014E:12b-18: lus ni ri rab lta bu'i tshad //
T02TD2014E:12b-19: sku las khro tshogs rngam pa'i tshogs //
T02TD2014E:12b-21: po nya mangs gzhug mngag gzhug ma //
T02TD2014E:12b-22: mgyogs shing rab tu mi srun pa //
T02TD2014E:12b-23: go cha sra zhing mtshon cha rno //
T02TD2014E:12b-24: sde tshogs dpung gis kun nas bskor //
T02TD2014E:12b-25: 'di ltar gang zhig sgom byed pa //
T02TD2014E:12b-26: de ni gshin rje gshed po dang //
T02TD2014E:12b-27: mtshungs par 'gyur ba gdon mi za //
T02TD2014E:12b-28: de la gshin rje gshed po nyid //
T02TD2014E:12b-29: dgyes nas dngos grub gsol bar byed //
T02TD2014E:12b-30: de la lha'am bdud kyi rigs//
T02TD2014E:12b-31: kun gyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:12b-32: bdud dang gshin rje mang po dang //
T02TD2014E:12b-33: ma mo srin mo mkha' 'gro ma //
T02TD2014E:12b-34: skrag nas thal mo sbyar byas te //
T02TD2014E:12b-35: de yi mngag gzhug byed par 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:12b-36: 'jig rten dag na gang gnas pa'i //
T02TD2014E:12b-40: de nas rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD2014E:12b-41: cho ga kun nas bsdus pa bshad //
T02TD2014E:12b-42: nyi ma yi ge ra las skyes //
T02TD2014E:12b-43: yi ge ya yis mtshan byas pas //
T02TD2014E:12b-45: thog mar rang gi snying gar bsam //
T02TD2014E:12b-46: ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa dang //
T02TD2014E:12b-47: me ni rab tu 'phro ba dag / rdo rje lta bu'i rlung ldang ba //
T02TD2014E:12b-48: 'jig rten yongs su khyab par ni //
T02TD2014E:12b-49: mkhas pas rab tu spro bar bya //
T02TD2014E:12b-50: 'jig rten rab tu bsregs nas ni //
T02TD2014E:12b-51: rdo rje rlung gis gtor byas pas //
T02TD2014E:12b-52: chos kun nam mkha' lta bu yi //
T02TD2014E:13a-0: bdag nyid du ni gyur par @13a * //
T02TD2014E:13a-2: / sngags pas de tshe bsam pa ni //
T02TD2014E:13a-3: chos kun rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
T02TD2014E:13a-4: gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin //
T02TD2014E:13a-5: ming dang mtshan ma bral ba ni //
T02TD2014E:13a-6: blo gros brtan pas bsgom par bya //
T02TD2014E:13a-7: de nas snying rje las byung ba //
T02TD2014E:13a-8: snga ma'i gnas bzhin bsgom bya ba ;
T02TD2014E:13a-9: / nyi ma yi ge ya yis mtshan //
T02TD2014E:13a-10: mkhas pas gsal bar bsgom par bya //
T02TD2014E:13a-11: de nyid yongs su gyur pa las //
T02TD2014E:13a-12: gshin rje gshed du gyur par bya //
T02TD2014E:13a-13: zhal dang phyag sogs sngon bzhin te //
T02TD2014E:13a-15: gdan tsam la ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD2014E:13a-16: yang na sku dang lhan cig tu //
T02TD2014E:13a-17: mkhas pas rdzogs par bskyed par bya //
T02TD2014E:13a-18: rtog pa gzhan las gsungs pa bzhin //
T02TD2014E:13a-19: gdan la yi ge 'am mtshan ma rnams //
T02TD2014E:13a-20: gnyis gnyis dag gam gsum las kyang //
T02TD2014E:13a-21: bskyed kyang nyes par mi 'gyur te //
T02TD2014E:13a-23: phyag zhal kha dog mtshon cha sogs //
T02TD2014E:13a-24: mang dang nyung dang tha dad dang //
T02TD2014E:13a-25: de bzhin go rims 'khrugs pa yang //
T02TD2014E:13a-26: dngos grub 'bras bu mtshungs par bshad //
T02TD2014E:13a-27: 'on kyang bag med le lo yis //
T02TD2014E:13a-28: bka' bzhin byas par ma gyur na //
T02TD2014E:13a-29: dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu yis ni //
T02TD2014E:13a-30: dngos grub nyams pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:13a-31: de dag tsam gyis rdo rje yis //
T02TD2014E:13a-32: dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'i cho ga rnams //
T02TD2014E:13a-33: rgyas dang bsdus pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2014E:13a-34: legs par phye ste bshad zin to //
T02TD2014E:13a-35: de nas las rnams sna tshogs dag / mkhas pas bsgrub par bya ba la//
T02TD2014E:13a-36: dkyil 'khor dag dang mi ldan zhing //
T02TD2014E:13a-37: ri mo la sogs cho ga dang //
T02TD2014E:13a-38: brtul zhugs drag po med kyang rung //
T02TD2014E:13a-39: legs par bsgom dang zlas pa dang //
T02TD2014E:13a-40: spyin sreg 'khor lo'i sbyor ba la //
T02TD2014E:13a-41: sogs pa'i sbyor ba phra mo la //
T02TD2014E:13a-42: brten nas mchod la brtson pa yis //
T02TD2014E:13a-44: mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:13a-45: khro bo'i rgyal po'i gsang sngags gang //
T02TD2014E:13a-46: rgyud gzhan dag du sbas byas pa //
T02TD2014E:13a-47: gshin rje gshed po mnyes byed cing //
T02TD2014E:13a-48: thugs yin thugs las byung ba ste //
T02TD2014E:13a-49: 'di ni bklags pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02TD2014E:13b-0: phra mo'i @13b gdon rnams skrag byed na //
T02TD2014E:13b-1: gang zhig bzlas brjod brtson pa yis //
T02TD2014E:13b-2: gdug pa 'dul ba la sogs pa'i //
T02TD2014E:13b-3: las rnams grub pa smos ci dgos //
T02TD2014E:13b-4: de bas sngags kyi bzlas brjod kyi //
T02TD2014E:13b-5: cho ga tshul bzhin bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:13b-6: thog mar rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dag / snga ma bzhin du bsgom byas nas //
T02TD2014E:13b-7: snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD2014E:13b-8: sa bon bcu bdun gyis gang ba'i //
T02TD2014E:13b-9: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'dra ba dag / snga ma'i bag chags kyis bsgom bya //
T02TD2014E:13b-10: de nas ya la nga dmigs nas ni //
T02TD2014E:13b-11: rang gi sngags kyis bskul ba yis //
T02TD2014E:13b-12: khro bo rdo rje zung zhes pa //
T02TD2014E:13b-13: 'jig rten khyab par spros byas te //
T02TD2014E:13b-14: rgyal ba sras bcas spyan drangs te //
T02TD2014E:13b-15: gshin rje gshed du gyur nas ni //
T02TD2014E:13b-16: 'khor yug yongs su gang bar bsam //
T02TD2014E:13b-17: de nas na yo ni ra yi //
T02TD2014E:13b-18: yi ge bzhi la dmigs byas te //
T02TD2014E:13b-19: rang rang sngags kyis bskul ba yis //
T02TD2014E:13b-20: gzugs sogs lha mo spros nas ni //
T02TD2014E:13b-21: la la gshin rje gshed po yi //
T02TD2014E:13b-22: dbang po rnams la thim par gyur //
T02TD2014E:13b-23: la la phyogs bcu thams cad na //
T02TD2014E:13b-24: mchod pa la sogs cho ga byed //
T02TD2014E:13b-25: la la me tog bdug pa dang //
T02TD2014E:13b-26: mar me dri dang zhal zas dang //
T02TD2014E:13b-27: sil snyan rdzas la thim par gyur //
T02TD2014E:13b-28: spyi ru byin gyis brlabs byas nas //
T02TD2014E:13b-29: khyad par dag tu byin brlab par //
T02TD2014E:13b-30: me tog dang ni mar me la //
T02TD2014E:13b-31: gzugs kyi rdo rje thim byas te //
T02TD2014E:13b-32: gzugs kyis khyad par phye bar bya //
T02TD2014E:13b-33: de bzhin bdug pa byug pa la //
T02TD2014E:13b-34: dri yi rdo rjes phye ba yis //
T02TD2014E:13b-35: yon chab bshos dang gtor ma rnams //
T02TD2014E:13b-36: de bzhin ro yi rdo rjes phye //
T02TD2014E:13b-37: sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs ni //
T02TD2014E:13b-38: sgra yi rdo rjes phye ba'o //
T02TD2014E:13b-39: spyi dang bye brag dbye ba yis //
T02TD2014E:13b-40: rdzas dang de bzhin shes bya ste //
T02TD2014E:13b-41: lha mo'i lus nyid phul ba yis //
T02TD2014E:13b-42: reg bya'i mchod par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2014E:13b-43: de ltar ting 'dzin sa bon dang //
T02TD2014E:13b-44: sngags dang rdzas dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD2014E:13b-45: gshin rje gshed po mnyes byas te //
T02TD2014E:13b-46: rdo rje dpyod pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2014E:13b-47: bdag gi lus la 'jug par bya //
T02TD2014E:13b-48: de nas rdo rje'i nges tshig gi / sbyor bas shin tu brtan par bya //
T02TD2014E:13b-49: rdo rje rdul bral sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2014E:13b-50: shin tu dbang du gyur byas te //
T02TD2014E:13b-51: bzlas pa la ni 'jug par bya //
T02TD2014E:14a-2: rab tu gsal bar dmigs nas ni //
T02TD2014E:14a-3: ji srid brtan par ma gyur tshe //
T02TD2014E:14a-4: gsang sngags spro bar mi bya zhing //
T02TD2014E:14a-6: gsang sngags yi ge sum cu gnyis //
T02TD2014E:14a-7: thog mar aom dang ldan byas te //
T02TD2014E:14a-8: tha mar phat gnyis ldan byas pa //
T02TD2014E:14a-9: gsang sngags kun gyi rgyal po ste //
T02TD2014E:14a-10: ma yengs pa yi yid kyis bzlas //
T02TD2014E:14a-11: dmigs pa brtan par ma gyur tshe //
T02TD2014E:14a-12: lha dang yi ge zhes bya ba //
T02TD2014E:14a-13: dmigs pa gnyis las ma gtogs pa //
T02TD2014E:14a-14: rtog pa thams cad spang bar bya //
T02TD2014E:14a-15: de ltar ci nus bzlas nas ni //
T02TD2014E:14a-16: bzlas pa btong bar 'dod pa na //
T02TD2014E:14a-17: gshin rje gshed po zhes bya ba //
T02TD2014E:14a-18: bdag gi lus las phyung nas ni //
T02TD2014E:14a-19: mdun na dgyes bzhin bzhugs pa la //
T02TD2014E:14a-20: bshags dang smon lam btab byas te //
T02TD2014E:14a-21: de nyid du ni mi snang gyur //
T02TD2014E:14a-22: de nas rang lus la bltas te //
T02TD2014E:14a-23: chos kun skye med dran byas nas ;
T02TD2014E:14a-24: / bdag kyang de bzhin mi snang gyur //
T02TD2014E:14a-25: yang na lha dang mi dbye bar //
T02TD2014E:14a-26: bzod pa yid kyis gsol nas ni //
T02TD2014E:14a-27: lhan cig mi snang gyur par bya //
T02TD2014E:14a-28: de nas stong nyid dran pa yis //
T02TD2014E:14a-29: langs te rang gi spyod lam bya //
T02TD2014E:14a-30: stong nyid blo dang ldan pa na //
T02TD2014E:14a-31: srung ba dag kyang bya mi dgos //
T02TD2014E:14a-32: dngos grub dag kyang myur du 'byung //
T02TD2014E:14a-33: byang chub mchog la nye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:14a-34: gal te sngon gyi bag chags kyis //
T02TD2014E:14a-35: tha mal lus su mthong gyur na //
T02TD2014E:14a-36: gsang sngags yi ge bcu bdun po //
T02TD2014E:14a-37: snying ga mtshog ma la sogs par //
T02TD2014E:14a-39: rang rang gnas su bsam byas te //
T02TD2014E:14a-40: rdo rje 'bar ba'i mig gis kyang //
T02TD2014E:14a-41: bsrung ba'i bsam pa ldan byas te //
T02TD2014E:14a-42: lus dang gnas dang grogs po dang //
T02TD2014E:14a-43: rdzas la bltas nas bsrung bar 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:14a-44: de ltar nyin re cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2014E:14a-45: yang na dus bzhir sbyor ba bya //
T02TD2014E:14a-46: 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2014E:14a-47: gshin rje gshed po mnyes par 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:14a-48: de yi bka' nyan thams cad kyang //
T02TD2014E:14a-49: sgrub pa po la dga' bar 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:14a-50: gal te 'chag gam khrus byed dam //
T02TD2014E:14a-51: kha zas za dang nyal ba dang //
T02TD2014E:14a-52: de bzhin spyod lam kun du yang //
T02TD2014E:14a-53: ji srid g-yeng 'gyur thams cad la //
T02TD2014E:14b-0: stong pa nyid dam bsrung ba'i @14b shugs //
T02TD2014E:14b-1: nam kyang btang bar mi bya ste //
T02TD2014E:14b-2: shugs btang na ni srung ba nyams //
T02TD2014E:14b-3: gal te shugs dang ldan pa na //
T02TD2014E:14b-4: glo pur yid ni g-yeng gyur kyang //
T02TD2014E:14b-5: srung ba bral ba ma yin no //
T02TD2014E:14b-6: nam zhig yid ni brtan gyur na //
T02TD2014E:14b-7: lha dang yig 'bru gsal ba'i tshe //
T02TD2014E:14b-8: de tshe g-yo ba brtsam par bya //
T02TD2014E:14b-9: gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na //
T02TD2014E:14b-11: sku yi tshul gyis spros byas te //
T02TD2014E:14b-12: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa kun //
T02TD2014E:14b-13: bsdus nas bdag la thim par bya //
T02TD2014E:14b-14: gal te bsod nams mchog 'dod na //
T02TD2014E:14b-15: khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can kun //
T02TD2014E:14b-16: 'od zer tshul du bsdus pa ni //
T02TD2014E:14b-17: sangs rgyas kun la thim byas te //
T02TD2014E:14b-18: sku gsum rdo rjer gyur par ni //
T02TD2014E:14b-19: 'dod na gnyis ka'ang lhan cig tu //
T02TD2014E:14b-20: 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2014E:14b-21: yi dam bcas pa rdzogs par bya //
T02TD2014E:14b-22: gal te sgrub par byed pa ste //
T02TD2014E:14b-23: bzlas pa'i grangs la mos pa na //
T02TD2014E:14b-24: rtog ba las gsungs ji bzhin du //
T02TD2014E:14b-25: yi dam bcas pa rdzogs byas pa //
T02TD2014E:14b-26: de nas sgrub la 'jug par bya //
T02TD2014E:14b-27: gal te dus la dga' ba na //
T02TD2014E:14b-28: de bzhin lo grangs ji nus par //
T02TD2014E:14b-29: dam bcas nas ni sgrub la 'jug / gal te sgrub par byed pa ste //
T02TD2014E:14b-30: shin tu brtson dang ldan pa na /
T02TD2014E:14b-31: mtshan ma thob la dam bcas nas //
T02TD2014E:14b-32: ting 'dzin shin tu gsal ba yis //
T02TD2014E:14b-33: mtshan ma thob par gyur pa'am //
T02TD2014E:14b-34: gal te lha yis lung bstan pa //
T02TD2014E:14b-35: rigs pa dang ldan thob pa'am //
T02TD2014E:14b-36: mtshan ma rab 'bring bye brag rnams //
T02TD2014E:14b-37: rtog las gsungs pa ji bzhin du //
T02TD2014E:14b-38: sgrub pa la ni 'jug par bya //
T02TD2014E:14b-39: sngags pas bzlas brjod bya ba'i tshul //
T02TD2014E:14b-40: legs par phye ba bshad zin to //
T02TD2014E:14b-41: de nas las rnams sna tshogs kyi //
T02TD2014E:14b-42: dngos grub cho ga bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:14b-43: thog mar shes rab cho ga ni //
T02TD2014E:14b-44: mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:14b-45: sngags pas bsnyen pa rdzogs byas pas //
T02TD2014E:14b-46: gtsang ma'i gnas su song nas ni //
T02TD2014E:14b-47: ras dkar gtsang ma'i gos byas nas //
T02TD2014E:14b-48: rin chen 'bar 'dra'i gnas la 'dug / khrus kyang legs par byas nas ni //
T02TD2014E:14b-49: mngar gsum ldan pa'i kha zas dang //
T02TD2014E:14b-50: sman dang ldan pa'i mar dag kyang //
T02TD2014E:14b-51: sngags dang ldan pas ci ran bza' //
T02TD2014E:15a-2: snying gar shes rab 'khor lo dag / zla ba 'dra dang shel 'dra dang //
T02TD2014E:15a-3: de bzhin nyi ma 'dra yang rung //
T02TD2014E:15a-4: rtsibs bzhi 'am yang na rtsibs bcu gnyis //
T02TD2014E:15a-5: bcu drug sum cu gnyis kyang rung //
T02TD2014E:15a-6: de la rang gi sa bon ni //
T02TD2014E:15a-7: gsang sngags yi ge sum cu gnyis //
T02TD2014E:15a-8: dkar po cung zad rtsa dmar ba //
T02TD2014E:15a-9: 'od dang ldan pa bsgom par bya /
T02TD2014E:15a-10: a'a lu k'a li phreng ba yang //
T02TD2014E:15a-11: 'khor lo'i tshul du bsgom par bya //
T02TD2014E:15a-12: de yang 'phro dang ga yo ba dang //
T02TD2014E:15a-13: myur du rab tu 'khor ba rnams //
T02TD2014E:15a-14: ci dga' bar ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD2014E:15a-15: de ltar zla drug zla ba gsum//
T02TD2014E:15a-16: gcig dang phyed du bsgom byas nams //
T02TD2014E:15a-17: blo gros rab tu rgyas par 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:15a-18: de nas srung ba'i cho ga yang //
T02TD2014E:15a-19: mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:15a-20: shes rab cho ga ji bzhin du //
T02TD2014E:15a-21: sbyor ba legs par byas pa las //
T02TD2014E:15a-22: yi ge ya dang ni bsal nas //
T02TD2014E:15a-23: lhag ma'i yi ge bsgom par bya //
T02TD2014E:15a-25: mandala byas nas de steng du //
T02TD2014E:15a-26: bum pa lnga ni gzhag par bya //
T02TD2014E:15a-27: de bzhin gsang sngags bzlas pa'i mthar //
T02TD2014E:15a-28: che ge mo zhes bya ba la //
T02TD2014E:15a-30: sv'a h'a ldan pa bzlas pa yi //
T02TD2014E:15a-31: bum pa yis ni spyi bor yang //
T02TD2014E:15a-32: bsrung bar 'dod la dbang bskur bya //
T02TD2014E:15a-33: de ltar lan cig lan gsum mam //
T02TD2014E:15a-34: lan bdun gyis ni srung bar 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:15a-35: de nas bshad par bya ba ni //
T02TD2014E:15a-37: las rnams sna tshogs grub 'gyur ba //
T02TD2014E:15a-38: mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:15a-39: gang zhig dbang du byed 'dod na //
T02TD2014E:15a-40: chu ba gram dag du song nas ni //
T02TD2014E:15a-41: zla ba phyed pa 'dra ba yi //
T02TD2014E:15a-42: kha dog dmar po'i gnas la 'dug / zla ba phyed pa'i dus dag la //
T02TD2014E:15a-43: sngags pas sbyor ba brtsom par bya //
T02TD2014E:15a-44: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02TD2014E:15a-45: de bzhin mchod pa byas nas ni //
T02TD2014E:15a-46: snying gar ya las byung ba yi //
T02TD2014E:15a-47: rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom bya ba //
T02TD2014E:15a-48: kha dog sngo la rtsa dmar po //
T02TD2014E:15a-49: de yi steng du padma ni //
T02TD2014E:15a-50: sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dab ldan pa //
T02TD2014E:15a-51: rtse la ba dan g-yo ba dag / legs par bsam par byas na ni //
T02TD2014E:15a-52: de yi steng du yi ge yang //
T02TD2014E:15a-53: sum cu rtsa gnyis go rims bzhin //
T02TD2014E:15b-0: kha dog dmar skyar bsgom @15b par bya //
T02TD2014E:15b-1: de nas bsgrub bya mdun gnas pa //
T02TD2014E:15b-2: kha dog dmar zhing gos kyang dmar //
T02TD2014E:15b-3: myos bzhin thal mo sbyor byed pa //
T02TD2014E:15b-4: 'di ltar bsam pa byas nas ni //
T02TD2014E:15b-5: de nas rang gi yi ge las //
T02TD2014E:15b-6: me tog la ni grub pa'i mda' //
T02TD2014E:15b-7: rlung gi shugs kyis 'phangs nas ni //
T02TD2014E:15b-8: bsgrub bya'i dpral ba mgul ba dang //
T02TD2014E:15b-9: snying ga lte ba gsang gnas su //
T02TD2014E:15b-10: rgyun mi 'chad par phog par bsam //
T02TD2014E:15b-11: bud med la ni khyad par du //
T02TD2014E:15b-12: gsang ba'i gnas la phog par bsam //
T02TD2014E:15b-13: 'di ltar sbyor ba brtan pa yis //
T02TD2014E:15b-14: brgya byin dbang chen grags pa yang //
T02TD2014E:15b-15: de la dga' zhing dbang du gyur //
T02TD2014E:15b-16: de bzhin lha dang bdud la sogs //
T02TD2014E:15b-17: bram ze rgyal po blon por bcas //
T02TD2014E:15b-18: kun nas dbang du byed par 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:15b-19: lha mo'am ni gnod spyin mo //
T02TD2014E:15b-20: mngon par shes pa ldan pa dag / dbang du bya ba sgrub ba ni //
T02TD2014E:15b-22: mthu chen bsgrub par dka' ba dang //
T02TD2014E:15b-23: rang gi 'dod pa mi ldan dang //
T02TD2014E:15b-24: rags las grub pa'i gzugs can dang //
T02TD2014E:15b-25: mngon par shes pa mi ldan pa //
T02TD2014E:15b-26: dbang du bya bar dka' bar bshad //
T02TD2014E:15b-27: lha mo gnod spyin mo la sogs //
T02TD2014E:15b-28: phra ba'i lus can mngon shes ldan //
T02TD2014E:15b-29: rang gi 'dod pa ldan pa dang //
T02TD2014E:15b-30: mthu che ba yang dbang 'gyur bar ;
T02TD2014E:15b-31: / rab tu dka' ba ma yin no //
T02TD2014E:15b-32: gal te bsgrub par bya ba dag / sngags pas dgug par 'dod pa ni //
T02TD2014E:15b-33: sbyor ba de nyid bsgom byas te //
T02TD2014E:15b-34: lcags kyu rlung dang ldan pa dag / sa bon rnams las nges spros te //
T02TD2014E:15b-35: sgrub par bya ba'i snying gnas //
T02TD2014E:15b-36: drangs te dgug pa'i sbyor ba bya //
T02TD2014E:15b-37: gal te bskrad par 'dod na yang //
T02TD2014E:15b-38: sbyor ba de nyid bsgom byas te //
T02TD2014E:15b-39: rlung dang ldan pa'i rnga mo dag / rab tu gang cing mgyogs pa ni //
T02TD2014E:15b-41: de la bsgrub bya bskyon byas te //
T02TD2014E:15b-42: myur du lho phyogs bda' bar bya //
T02TD2014E:15b-43: gal te dbye bar 'dod pa na //
T02TD2014E:15b-44: sbyor ba de nyid bsgom byas te //
T02TD2014E:15b-45: sbrul dang ne'u le mang po dag / rang gi sa bon gnas las 'thon //
T02TD2014E:15b-46: de dag bsgrub bya gnyi ga yi //
T02TD2014E:15b-47: so sor lus la zhugs par bya //
T02TD2014E:15b-48: de nas sgrub bya de dag kyang //
T02TD2014E:15b-49: sbrul dang sre mo'i rang bzhin du //
T02TD2014E:15b-50: gyur nas phan tshun 'thab par bsam //
T02TD2014E:16a-3: de nas bsgrub par bya ba dag / gnon cing rmongs par byed 'dod na //
T02TD2014E:16a-4: rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa yi //
T02TD2014E:16a-5: snying gar sa yi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2014E:16a-6: gru bzhi ser po ma las byung //
T02TD2014E:16a-7: de steng sna tshogs rdo rje ni ;
T02TD2014E:16a-8: / rtse mo sum cu gnyis dang ldan //
T02TD2014E:16a-9: de la rang gi sa bon yang //
T02TD2014E:16a-10: kha dog ser po ldan pa dag / sum cu rtsa gnyis tshang bar bsgom //
T02TD2014E:16a-11: de nas de 'dra spro bya ste //
T02TD2014E:16a-12: bsgrub bya gang na gnas pa yi //
T02TD2014E:16a-13: steng du yang dang yang mnan na //
T02TD2014E:16a-15: gal te rgyas par byed 'dod na //
T02TD2014E:16a-16: sbyor ba de nyid bsgom pa las //
T02TD2014E:16a-17: de las cung zad mi 'dra ba //
T02TD2014E:16a-18: rdo rje gnas su rin chen bsgom //
T02TD2014E:16a-20: rin chen lta bus 'od zer dag / bsgrub bya la ni thim pa yis //
T02TD2014E:16a-21: bsod nams yongs su rgyas par bya //
T02TD2014E:16a-22: gzhan yang drag po'i sbyor ba la //
T02TD2014E:16a-23: me yi dkyil 'khor ra las byung //
T02TD2014E:16a-25: rang gi yi ges mtshan pa yis //
T02TD2014E:16a-26: rdo rje me ltar 'phro ba dag / gang dang gang du bsams pa der //
T02TD2014E:16a-27: gsad pa'i las la sngags pa yin //
T02TD2014E:16a-28: gzhan yang zhi bar bya 'dod na //
T02TD2014E:16a-29: chu yi dkyil 'khor dza las byung //
T02TD2014E:16a-30: zlum zhing dkar la bum pa ni //
T02TD2014E:16a-31: shel dang 'dra ba nyi shus brgyan //
T02TD2014E:16a-32: de yi nang du yi ge'i tshogs //
T02TD2014E:16a-33: ya ni gsal ba nyi shu bsam //
T02TD2014E:16a-34: yi ge dag la bdud rtsi chu //
T02TD2014E:16a-35: 'dzags pas bum pa gang bar bsam //
T02TD2014E:16a-36: de nas ma rungs pa bgegs la sogs //
T02TD2014E:16a-37: rab tu gdug pa'i sems ldan la //
T02TD2014E:16a-38: de la bdud rtsi 'od zer dag / kun nas thim par gyur pa yis //
T02TD2014E:16a-39: gdug pa'i tshogs ni zhi bar 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:16a-41: ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2014E:16a-42: las kyi sbyor ba gang sgrub pa //
T02TD2014E:16a-43: so sor phye ste bshad pa yin //
T02TD2014E:16a-44: bsgom ba dang ni bzlas ba dag / gal te 'bad nas byas pa yang //
T02TD2014E:16a-45: skal dang mos pa dman pa yis //
T02TD2014E:16a-46: las rnams grub par ma gyur ba'i //
T02TD2014E:16a-47: sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir //
T02TD2014E:16a-48: sbyor ba la ni brten par bshad //
T02TD2014E:16a-49: sangs rgyas bstan la gnod byed pa'i //
T02TD2014E:16b-0: rgyal po ngan ba byung @16b gyur tam //
T02TD2014E:16b-1: blon po la sogs de bzhin te //
T02TD2014E:16b-2: skye bo ngan pa'i tshogs byung nas //
T02TD2014E:16b-3: thabs gzhan dag gis ma dul na //
T02TD2014E:16b-4: bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir //
T02TD2014E:16b-5: sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' bzhin du //
T02TD2014E:16b-6: byang chub sems dang ldan byas te //
T02TD2014E:16b-7: de tshe drag po'i sbyor ba brtsam //
T02TD2014E:16b-8: gdug pa gzhig par bya ba'i thabs //
T02TD2014E:16b-9: drag po'i sbyor ba gang gsungs pa //
T02TD2014E:16b-10: rgyal ba'i bka' nyid bsrung ba'i phyir //
T02TD2014E:16b-11: mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:16b-12: sbu gu rig par bya ba dang //
T02TD2014E:16b-13: gnad kyi gnas rnams gzir ba dang //
T02TD2014E:16b-14: byug dang gtor ba la sogs kyis //
T02TD2014E:16b-15: rul sogs ma rungs bya ba dang //
T02TD2014E:16b-16: bskam zhing sreg pa'i cho ga dang //
T02TD2014E:16b-17: lus kun yongs su gzhom pa dang //
T02TD2014E:16b-18: byad kyis phog par bya ba dang //
T02TD2014E:16b-20: gdug pa brlag par 'gyur ba yi //
T02TD2014E:16b-21: cho ga mdor bsdus 'di zhes bya //
T02TD2014E:16b-22: de la sbu gu rig pa yi //
T02TD2014E:16b-23: cho ga dag kyang bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:16b-24: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom byas te //
T02TD2014E:16b-25: srog dang yi ge gnyis med par //
T02TD2014E:16b-26: kha dog lnga ru gyur byas te //
T02TD2014E:16b-27: sbrang bu tree la'i mchu 'dra ba //
T02TD2014E:16b-28: bdag gi sna nas dbyung bar bya //
T02TD2014E:16b-29: bsgrub bya'i lte ba'i padma las //
T02TD2014E:16b-30: skud pa 'dra ba'i sbu gu nas //
T02TD2014E:16b-31: srog gi yi ge drang bar bya //
T02TD2014E:16b-32: de nas bsgrub bya'i rdul dag dang //
T02TD2014E:16b-33: rjes dang dri ma sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2014E:16b-34: grog mkhar sa sogs sbyar byas te //
T02TD2014E:16b-35: kha sbyar ldan pa'i gzugs brnyan bya //
T02TD2014E:16b-36: gzhan yang chu'am dur khrod dam //
T02TD2014E:16b-37: 'byung po gnas pa'i sa dag las //
T02TD2014E:16b-39: ma mo'i tshogs sam 'byung po dag / kha dog bzhir ldan gzugs byas te //
T02TD2014E:16b-40: rang rang gnas su sbas byas nas //
T02TD2014E:16b-41: chu yi hom dang de bzhin du //
T02TD2014E:16b-42: sa dang me yi hom dag gis //
T02TD2014E:16b-43: tshim par byas nas des gzung 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:16b-44: de la sbu gu rig pa'i thabs kyi cho ga ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2014E:16b-45: thog ma nyid sbu gu rig pa'i cho ga gang gis bsgrub bya klu yis zin par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyi cho ga bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:16b-46: de la dang por sngags pas rdo rje dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms te /
T02TD2014E:17a-0: rang gi snying gar yi ge'i tshogs ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms pa dag srog ces bya ba'i rlung dang 'dres par @17a * //
T02TD2014E:17a-1: gyur bas 'od zer kha dog lnga pa'am bzhi pa sbrang bu tree la'i mchu ltar bcud thams cad 'byin par nus pa rab tu rno ba gdug pa sna'i bu ga gnyis nas byung bar bsam mo //
T02TD2014E:17a-2: de bzhin du dmigs pa byas pas rang gi snas de'i reg pa myong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:17a-3: de nas ting nge 'dzin de dbang du gyur na ni dang por rdzi rno bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:17a-4: de nas dbugs rdub [*rngub?] cing drangs pas gzhan gyi ro dag kyang nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:17a-5: de nas ting nge 'dzin de shin tu dbang du gyur na ni bsgrub bya'i lte ba'i gnas na padma kha sbyor gyi dbus srog gnas pa'i rtsa skud pa 'dra ba 'dus pa'i rtsa na srog gi rang bzhin yi ge aa'i dbyibs su gnas pa ni rtsa kha dog dmar skyar gnas pa zhig yod de //
T02TD2014E:17a-6: de bzhin du gsal bar bsgoms nas de nas bdag gi sna nas dbugs kyi 'od zer rab tu rno ba de dag phyung ste bsgrub bya'i lte ba'i ba sbu'i bu ga nas zhugs nas /
T02TD2014E:17a-7: sbu gu skud pa 'dra ba'i nang du zhugs te srog gi rang bzhin gyi yi ge la zug nas /
T02TD2014E:17a-8: yi ge de dag thams cad gzhibs te /
T02TD2014E:17a-9: yi ge nyid kyang blangs nas drangs pas /
T02TD2014E:17a-10: dper na pags pa rlon pa las byas pa'i snod zhabs nas thon nas slog pa bzhin du srog gi gnas padma kha sbyar te nang phyir bzlog par gyur par byas nas rab tu drangs par byas na sbyor ba de 'ba' zhig gis kyang gang su yang rung ste de 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:17a-11: ting nge 'dzin ma thob pa rnams kyis ni sbyor ba dang bcas pa brtsam par mi bya ste /
T02TD2014E:17a-12: thog ma nyid du ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyang 'bad pas goms par byas nas gsang sngags kyi bzlas brjod kyang byas la /
T02TD2014E:17a-13: de nas bsgrub bya de'i rkang rjes kyi sa dang /
T02TD2014E:17a-14: phyi sa che chung gi rjes dag dang //
T02TD2014E:17a-15: gzhan yang mchil ma dang skra dang gos kyi dum bu dag dang /
T02TD2014E:17a-16: gzhan yang de'i khyim gyi sa dang //
T02TD2014E:17a-17: them pa rtsa'i sa dag ji ltar rnyed pa blangs te /
T02TD2014E:17a-20: sa bzang po gzhan dag dang sbyar te legs par btags nas bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan sor brgyad pa zhig bya'o //
T02TD2014E:17a-22: 'dab ma gang yang rung ba la padma kha sbyor dong tse tsam gyi dbus su //
T02TD2014E:17b-0: aa dmar pos @17b mtshan pa kha dog dmar po zhig bya'o //
T02TD2014E:17b-2: sna bzhi'i skud pa mtho do pa'i tshad bya ste de dag gi rtse mo gcig tu bsgril nas zangs kyi sbu gu sog ma'i mgrin pa tsam zhig byas te /
T02TD2014E:17b-3: de'i nang nas skud pa de dag phyung nas padma kha sbyor gyi snying po'i yi ge aa la phug ste gdags par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:17b-4: de nas padma de bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan gyi lte ba'i dkyil du lus ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:17b-5: zangs kyi spu gu de yang lte ba la zug par gzir bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:17b-6: de nas gzugs brnyan de ba lang gi pags pa zhig tu dril te skud pa de dag phyir phyung nas de cung zad bskam par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:17b-7: de nas bskams par gyur pa dang gzugs brnyan de khyer te bsgrub bya'i khang pa mthong ba'i sa phyogs bsgrub bya'i khang pa la zug pa'i lam yod pa zhig tu dong brkos te de'i nang du sbas nas sa skam pos bkang ste gzhag go //
T02TD2014E:17b-8: de nas rang gi khyim du 'ongs te ting nge 'dzin snga ma bzhin du bsgrub bya'i srog rengs nas gzugs brnyan la thim par bya'o //
