T02TD2014E:49b-23: bkra shis byan rlabs dam pa dag / ji ltar dam tshig bzhes pa bzhin //
T02TD2014E:49b-24: deng 'dir dbang bskur bdag la stsol //
T02TD2014E:49b-26: me tog 'khor lor dor bar bya //
T02TD2014E:49b-27: de nas bdag nyid chen po des //
T02TD2014E:49b-28: rdo rje mngag gzhug bzhengs nas ni //
T02TD2014E:49b-29: bkra shis 'khor lo tham par bsam //
T02TD2014E:49b-30: de nas bkra shis 'khor lo de //
T02TD2014E:49b-31: bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung //
T02TD2014E:49b-32: gang zhig bsrung bar 'dod pa yi //
T02TD2014E:49b-33: spyi bo la ni dbang bskur bya //
T02TD2014E:49b-34: aom sarba mang+ga la si ka lya na ba ra de sv'a h'a /
T02TD2014E:49b-35: zhes pas legs par dbang bskur nas //
T02TD2014E:49b-36: brka shis srung ba'i 'khor lo de //
T02TD2014E:49b-37: legs par dril te rgyas btab nas //
T02TD2014E:49b-38: mgul lam dpung pa dag la gdags //
T02TD2014E:49b-39: de nas rdo rje mdag gzhug kyang //
T02TD2014E:49b-40: de yi lha ru gzung bar bya ;
T02TD2014E:49b-41: /'di yis bgegs rnams thams cad las //
T02TD2014E:49b-42: bsrungs nas bkra shis ldan par bya //
T02TD2014E:49b-43: 'dir sgrub pa po gang zhig bu dang tsha bo la sogs pa rigs rgyud brtan zhing bkra shis par 'dod pa dang /
T02TD2014E:49b-44: skyi dgu gang dag bkra mi shis par gyur pa rnams phyir bkra shis par bya ba dang /
T02TD2014E:50a-0: @50a * // bud med gang dag bu mi 'tsho ba dang /
T02TD2014E:50a-1: gzhan yang gdon gyis dbang byas te mo gsham du gyur pa rnams bkra shis par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje mngag bzhug bsgrub par bya ba'i cho ga bya ste /
T02TD2014E:50a-2: gang gi phyir ji skad dug sungs pa'i rdo rje mngag gzhug 'di lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na bar du gcod pa sel bar bye dpa'i mchog yin te /
T02TD2014E:50a-3: gang dang lhar 'dzin pa de la bkra shis spyin par bya ba yin te //
T02TD2014E:50a-4: de bas na lhag par bkra shis 'dod pa rnams kyis 'di nyi mchog tu bsngags te bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:50a-5: de la 'di tsho ga ni dus bzang po dang ldan pa'i yar gyi ngo'i tshes gcig dang /
T02TD2014E:50a-6: bkra shis gtsang ma'i gnas su mantal khuru do pa zhig byas te /
T02TD2014E:50a-7: de'i dbus su gru gsum rtse mo lhor bstan pa sum brtsegs shig bya'o //
T02TD2014E:50a-8: de la gu gsum dbus ma dmar por bya ste /
T02TD2014E:50a-9: de'i steng du sna tshogs padma'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge nri ljang gu zhig bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:50a-10: yi ge de las 'od rtsa dmar bar 'phro ba 'dra bar bri'o //
T02TD2014E:50a-11: bar ma la sa'i cha dkar por bya ste /
T02TD2014E:50a-12: thod pa skam rlon gyi phreng ba bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:50a-13: tha ma'i sa cha nag por byas te rdo rje'i phreng ba bris la /
T02TD2014E:50a-14: grvar lcags kyi mnga' gzhu kha phyir bstan te bri ba'am gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:50a-15: de'i phyi rol du dur khrod kyi tshul du ji dga' bar bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:50a-16: de nas bkra shis srung ba'i 'khor lo yang sngon du brjod ba bzhin du bris te mandala gyi steng du bla re'i tshul du dgab par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:50a-17: de nas sngags ba bdag nyid gos dkar po gyon te kha lho phyogs su bltas nas /
T02TD2014E:50a-18: sngon du brjod pa'i mchod pa dang /
T02TD2014E:50a-19: gtor ma rnams nye bar bzhag ste /
T02TD2014E:50a-20: bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor bslog par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:50a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi gshegs rje gshegs po spyan drangs te /
T02TD2014E:50a-22: mdun gyi nam mkha' la padma dang nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bsam ste ji skad du smod pa'i mchod pa dang gtor ma rnams kyis sngon du brjod pa bzhin mchod nas de nas de nas de bdag nyid la thim par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:50a-23: de nas rdor je mngag gzhug bsnyen par bya'i phyir //
T02TD2014E:50b-0: bdag gi bsdu'i bu ga thams cad @50b nas 'od zer 'phros te dkyil 'khor gyi gnas thams cad du thim par gyur pas /
T02TD2014E:50b-1: dkyil 'khor de nyid du dur khrod gyi gnas su byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2014E:50b-2: de nas yang 'od zer da dag dkyil 'khor gyi snying por 'dus te /
T02TD2014E:50b-3: yi genri la thim par gyur nas shin tu 'od 'bar ba 'bar gyur te phyogs thams cad du 'phros nas rgyal ba sras dang mngag gzhug tu bcas pa rnams la thim pas 'od du gyur nas /
T02TD2014E:50b-4: slar 'dus te sa bon dang dbyer mad par gyur pa las rdo rje mngag gzhug gi skur gyur te /
T02TD2014E:50b-5: sngon du smos pa lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par bsgom mo //
T02TD2014E:50b-6: de yang snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis rdo rje mngag gzhug gi tshul de nyid dang 'dra ba zhig spyan drangs te bsams pa de nyid dang gnyis su med par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:50b-7: de yang lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo dang gung mo brkyang ste cung zad phyar te g-yon pa khu tshur dkur bzhag nas gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:50b-8: aom ae hye hi bha ga b'a na ma h'a badzra kingka ra dza:h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2014E:50b-9: raksha raksha sa ma ya ho //
T02TD2014E:50b-11: de nas argham la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams rdo rje ma dag gzhug gi snying po nyid dam /
T02TD2014E:50b-12: mchod pa rang rang gi sngags kyis dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:50b-13: de nas rdo rje mngag gzhug gi snying po de nyid bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02TD2014E:50b-14: sngags pa bdag nyid kyi lce dang rdo rje mngag gzhug gi gnas rnams nas /
T02TD2014E:50b-15: gsang sngags kyi 'od zer kha dog dmar po 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa mngag gzhug dang bcas pa rnams la 'phros pas 'od du gyur te /
T02TD2014E:50b-16: slar bsdus nas bkra shis srung ba'i 'khor lo la thi par gyur pas shin tu 'do 'bar bar gyur pa bsam pa bya'o //
T02TD2014E:50b-17: de nas bzlas pa gtong bar 'dod na /
T02TD2014E:50b-18: 'jig rten gsum na mchog gyur pa'i //
T02TD2014E:50b-19: rdo rje mngag gzhug chen po khyod //
T02TD2014E:50b-21: bsrung ba phun sum tshogs par mdzod //
T02TD2014E:50b-23: aargha phul bas rdor je mngag gzhug dur khrod kyi gnas nas bzhengs te /
T02TD2014E:50b-24: bkra shis kyi 'khor lo thim par gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD2014E:51a-0: de nas bdag gis rdo rje lta @51a * //
T02TD2014E:51a-1: bas 'khor lo de la bltas bas /
T02TD2014E:51a-2: bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po'i mthu dang /
T02TD2014E:51a-3: rdo rje mngag gzhug gi mthus sus kyang dbrog par mi nus par gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD2014E:51a-4: bdag gis bsrung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i shugs kyang gtang bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:51a-5: 'di lta bu'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa zla ba gcig gam gsum mam drug tu sbyar nas /
T02TD2014E:51a-6: de nas dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:51a-7: tha ma'ang 'bum phrag gsum bzlas brjod byas te gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:51a-8: de yang bdag nyid bkra shis par 'dod na ni bdag nyid me tog dmar po'i phreng ba thogs te /
T02TD2014E:51a-9: tshigs su bcad pa la brjod pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:51a-10: de nas 'khor lo me tog tu bcas te bdag gi spyi bor bzhag pa bdag nyid la thim par bsam mo //
T02TD2014E:51a-11: de nas 'khor lo de legs par dril te rgyas btab la mgul pa'am dpung par gdags bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:51a-12: de phyin chad rdo rje mdag gzhug nyid kyang bdag gi srung mar bya'o snyam bsams te /
T02TD2014E:51a-13: 'phangs te rtag tu mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:51a-14: rdo rje mngag gzhug dag dga' bar gyur pa'i zangs kyi gtsug can yang bsten par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:51a-15: 'di lta bu'i sbyor ba byas pa'i sngags pa de la ma mo rnams dga' bar gyur te /
T02TD2014E:51a-16: ma mo'i dbang du sngags pa mi 'gyur zhing sngags pa'i dbang du ma mo rnams 'du bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:51a-17: gal te skye dgu gzhan bsrung bar 'dod na gang bsrung bar 'dod pa de nyid dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2014E:51a-18: des snga ma bzhin du me tog dor ba dang /
T02TD2014E:51a-19: 'khor los spyi bor dbang bskur ba 'khor lo lus la bcang ba rnams legs par byas te /
T02TD2014E:51a-20: de dag gi srung mar rdo rje mdag gzhug phog nas /
T02TD2014E:51a-21: de dag gis dus dus su mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:51a-22: 'di lta bu'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i skye dgu de la ;
T02TD2014E:51a-23: bkra mi shis par byed pa'i byis pa'i gdon dang /
T02TD2014E:51a-24: bud med dbang du byed pa'i gdon dang /
T02TD2014E:51a-25: skyes pa'i longs spyod la bar du gcod pa la sogs pa bkra mi shis par byed pa'i gdon thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:51b-0: rdo rje mngag gzhug gi sbyor bas bkra shis @51b bsgrub ba'i cho ga bstan pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2014E:51b-3: 'jam rgyal khro bo chen po la //
T02TD2014E:51b-4: mchod dang bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2014E:51b-5: bya ba sna tshogs grub 'dod pas //
T02TD2014E:51b-6: mchod pa la sogs sbyor ba la //
T02TD2014E:51b-7: gsang sngags gang dag gang sbyor ba //
T02TD2014E:51b-8: mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:51b-9: sku bskyed pa dang sa bon dang //
T02TD2014E:51b-10: yan lag byin gyis brlab pa dang //
T02TD2014E:51b-11: bgegs bsal ba dang rdzas byin brlab //
T02TD2014E:51b-12: spyan drang ba dang gdan bzhugs dang //
T02TD2014E:51b-13: zhal bsil la sogs mchod pa dbul //
T02TD2014E:51b-14: mchod dang gtor ma bsngo ba dang //
T02TD2014E:51b-15: bzlas dang gshegs su gsol ba dang //
T02TD2014E:51b-16: bsrung dang khrus sogs spyod lam la //
T02TD2014E:51b-17: sngags sbyar tshul ni rnam gsum ste //
T02TD2014E:51b-18: gsang sngags gcig gis sbyor ba dang //
T02TD2014E:51b-19: rtsa ba yan lag sngags dag gis //
T02TD2014E:51b-20: sde tshan rnams la sbyar bar bya //
T02TD2014E:51b-21: so so rang rang sngags rnams kyis //
T02TD2014E:51b-22: rang rang las la sbyar bar bya //
T02TD2014E:51b-23: bye brag gsum du shes par bya //
T02TD2014E:51b-24: gal te gcig gis sbyor ba na //
T02TD2014E:51b-25: gang la bzlas pa byed 'dod pa'i //
T02TD2014E:51b-26: sngags de nyid kyis las kun la //
T02TD2014E:51b-27: sbyor yang nyes par mi 'gyur te //
T02TD2014E:51b-29: sde la sbyor bar 'dod pa na //
T02TD2014E:51b-30: rtsa ba'am ni yan lag gam //
T02TD2014E:51b-31: 'on te gnyis kas sa bon bya //
T02TD2014E:51b-32: sku bskyed pa yang de bzhin bya //
T02TD2014E:51b-33: yan lag sngags kyis byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2014E:51b-34: bgegs rnams mtshon cha'i sngags kyis bsal //
T02TD2014E:51b-35: rdzas rnams byin gyis brlab pa dang //
T02TD2014E:51b-36: spyan drang ba dang bzhugs pa dang //
T02TD2014E:51b-37: snying po sngags kyis bya bar bshad //
T02TD2014E:51b-38: me tog la sogs mchod pa ni //
T02TD2014E:51b-39: rtsa ba'i sngags kyis dbul bar bya //
T02TD2014E:51b-40: gtor ma mtshon cha'i sngags kyis bsngo //
T02TD2014E:51b-41: bzlas brjod rtsa ba'am snying po yi //
T02TD2014E:51b-42: sngags kyis lha rnams mnyes par bya //
T02TD2014E:51b-43: snying po'i sngags kyis slar gshegs gsol //
T02TD2014E:51b-44: bsrung ba yan lag lnga pa yi //
T02TD2014E:51b-45: sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya //
T02TD2014E:51b-46: khrus la sogs pa'i spyod lam la //
T02TD2014E:51b-47: ji ltar sbyar ba'ang bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:51b-48: snying po'i sngags kyis khrus rtsi blang //
T02TD2014E:51b-49: mtshon cha'i sngags kyis bgo ba dang //
T02TD2014E:52a-2: spyi gtsug sngags kyis byin brlabs nas //
T02TD2014E:52a-3: rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bkru bar bya //
T02TD2014E:52a-4: mdun du bsams pa'i lha rnams la //
T02TD2014E:52a-5: chu yang rtsa ba'i sngags kyis dbul //
T02TD2014E:52a-6: snying po'i sngags kyis gshegs gsol te /
T02TD2014E:52a-7: yan lag lnga ba'i sngags rnams gyis //
T02TD2014E:52a-8: yan lag legs par 'bar byas te //
T02TD2014E:52a-9: khrus kyi gnas nas byung nas ni //
T02TD2014E:52a-10: sngags kyi khang par zhugs par bya //
T02TD2014E:52a-11: gal te bdag nyid chen po de //
T02TD2014E:52a-12: so so sngags kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2014E:52a-13: rang rang las la sbyor 'dod na //
T02TD2014E:52a-14: rtog pa sna tshogs las gsungs pa'i //
T02TD2014E:52a-15: sa bon yi ge dag las de //
T02TD2014E:52a-16: ming gi sngags kyis sku bzhengs bya //
T02TD2014E:52a-17: byin gyis brlab pa'i gsang sngags kyang //
T02TD2014E:52a-18: rtog las ji ltar gsungs las bya //
T02TD2014E:52a-19: las kun byed pas bgegs bsal te //
T02TD2014E:52a-20: spyan drangs gdan dbul la sogs pa //
T02TD2014E:52a-21: so so ji skad gsungs bzhin bya //
T02TD2014E:52a-22: 'di ni bya ba sna tshogs la //
T02TD2014E:52a-23: sngags sbyar mdor bsdus bshad pa'o //
T02TD2014E:52a-24: de la 'dir bya ba sna tshogs la /
T02TD2014E:52a-25: gsang sngags rnams ji ltar sbyar bar bya ba bstan te /
T02TD2014E:52a-26: de la bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD2014E:52a-27: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang //
T02TD2014E:52a-28: 'jam pa'i khro bo gshin rje gshed gang rung mnyes par bya ba'i sgo nas //
T02TD2014E:52a-29: dngos grub sna tshogs 'dod pa rnams /
T02TD2014E:52a-30: de dag mnyes pa'i cho ga'i yan lag tu gyur pa /
T02TD2014E:52a-31: lha rnams kyi sku bskyed pa'i sa bon gang gis bya ba dang /
T02TD2014E:52a-32: gsang sngags gang gis lha'i sku bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2014E:52a-33: de bzhin du lha'i sku legs par byin gyis brlab ba dang /
T02TD2014E:52a-34: bgegs bsal ba dang mchod pa la sogs pa'i rdzas byin gyi brlab pa dang /
T02TD2014E:52a-36: gdan la bzhugs su gsol ba dang /
T02TD2014E:52a-37: khrus chab gsol ba dang yon chab dbul ba dang /
T02TD2014E:52a-38: me tog la sogs pa mnyes pa'i mchod pa dbul ba dang /
T02TD2014E:52a-41: lha slar gshegs su gsol ba dang /
T02TD2014E:52a-42: bdag nyid bsrung ba rnams la gsang sngags gang dang gang sbyar ba dang gzhan yang khrus la sogs pa'i spyod lam dang /
T02TD2014E:52b-0: sbyor ba'i spyod pa rnams la @52b gsang sngags ji ltar sbyar ba rnams rnal 'byor gyi rgyud spyi'i rjes su 'brangs nas /
T02TD2014E:52b-1: dgos pa bsgrub par 'dod pa'am gal te rgyud gcig gi rjes su 'brang na yang /
T02TD2014E:52b-2: bya ba sna tshogs kyi sbyor ba shes na the tshom med par 'gyur bas /
T02TD2014E:52b-3: 'dir sngags kyi sbyor ba thams cad mdor bsdus te bstan to //
T02TD2014E:52b-4: de la sngags kyi sbyor ba'i tshul yang mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te /
T02TD2014E:52b-5: de la dang po na gang la bzlas pa brjod pa'i gsang sngags de nyid kyis /
T02TD2014E:52b-6: ji skad smos pa'i bya ba thams cad la sbyar ro zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
T02TD2014E:52b-7: gnyis pa ni rtsa ba'i sngags dang snying po la sogs pa'i yan lag gi sngags dag las ji skad du smos pa'i bya ba sde sde la sngags re re sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
T02TD2014E:52b-8: gsum pa ni ji skad du smos pa'i bya ba re re la /
T02TD2014E:52b-9: gsang sngags so sor sbyar bar bya ste /
T02TD2014E:52b-10: chog zhib mo las gsungs pa de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'di yin no //
T02TD2014E:52b-11: de la 'dir bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'am /
T02TD2014E:52b-12: 'jam pa'i khro bo dag gis bya ba sna tshogs la gsang sngags gang dang gang la sbyar ba bstan pa yin te /
T02TD2014E:52b-13: de yang rtsa ba'i sngags dang yan lag gi sngags gnyis su gsungs te /
T02TD2014E:52b-14: de la rtsa ba'i gsang sngags ni /
T02TD2014E:52b-15: rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtha' dag rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2014E:52b-16: gsang sngags kyi lha rnams kyi lus lta bu yin te de bas rtsa ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2014E:52b-17: yan lag ni rnam par thar ba'i sgo re re ston pa'i phyir /
T02TD2014E:52b-18: sngags kyi lha rnams kyi yan lag lta bu yin te /
T02TD2014E:52b-19: de bas na yan lag ces bya'o //
T02TD2014E:52b-20: de yang snying po dang spyi gtsug dang mchog ma dang /
T02TD2014E:52b-22: mtshon cha lta bu ste de la snying po ni snying ga lta bu yin te /
T02TD2014E:52b-23: rtsa ba las bsdus nas phyogs tsam ston pa'i bdag nyid yin no //
T02TD2014E:52b-24: spyi gtsug dang mchog ma ni yan lag gi gtso bo yin te /
T02TD2014E:52b-25: de byin gyis rlob pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2014E:52b-26: go cha ni brang la sogs pa gnad kyi gnas rnams byin gyis rlob cing srung bar byed pas go cha zhes bya'o //
T02TD2014E:53a-0: mtshon cha ni lag pa la sogs par bsams pas 'bar ba'i gzis bgegs rnams bsregs nas 'byer bar byed cing bka' las 'das pa rnams ma rungs @53a * //
T02TD2014E:53a-1: par gyur pa rnams la sogs ba la sbyor bar byed pas mtshon cha zhes bya'o //
T02TD2014E:53a-2: gzhan yang las kyi sngags la sogs pa'ang yang lag tu bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:53a-3: de re zhig 'jam dpal gzon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba'i gsang sngags ni rtog pa phal cher las grags pa yi ge drug pa zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2014E:53a-4: aom a'a g'i shva ri mum /
T02TD2014E:53a-5: gsang sngags 'di yang bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2014E:53a-6: sa bon dang mchod pa dang /
T02TD2014E:53a-8: las la sbyar ba la sogs pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:53a-9: snying po'i sngags ni aom mum zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
T02TD2014E:53a-10: 'di yang snga ma bzhin du thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:53a-11: mchog ma la sogs pa la yang ji ltar rtog pa rnams las gsungs ba bzhin sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:53a-12: 'phags pa su siddhi ka ra la sogs par bstan pas 'dir ched du bstan par ma mdzad de /
T02TD2014E:53a-13: de bas na bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mnyes par bya bar 'dod pas de dag tu gsungs pa'i cho ga nyid sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:53a-14: dpal gshin rje gshed po mnyes par bya bar 'dod pas kyang gal te bya ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'dod pa rnams kyi ni /
T02TD2014E:53a-15: khro bo nyid kyi rtog pa zhib mo las gsungs pa'i yan lag lnga pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:53a-16: rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'dod na ni //
T02TD2014E:53a-17: yan lag de dag gdon mi za bar dgos med de rtsa ba 'am snying po tsam gyis sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:53a-18: gsang sngags kyi bya ba sna tshogs yongs su sbyor ba'i chog bstan pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2014E:53a-20: // / las kyi bya ba sna tshogs la /
T02TD2014E:53a-21: dkyil 'khor dag dang ri mo dang //
T02TD2014E:53a-22: de bzhin brtul zhugs med par yang //
T02TD2014E:53a-23: bya ba bsgrub ba bshad zin to //
T02TD2014E:53a-24: gzhan yang bya ba sna tshogs kyi //
T02TD2014E:53a-25: dngos grub sna tshogs bsgrub pa la //
T02TD2014E:53a-26: dkyil 'khor ri mo brtul zhugs la //
T02TD2014E:53a-27: brten pa'i cho ga bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:53a-28: gal te sngags pa mtshan ma la //
T02TD2014E:53a-29: dga' bas dang po mtshan ma rnams //
T02TD2014E:53a-30: brtag pa'i cho ga bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:53a-31: dngos grub rab dang bar ma dang //
T02TD2014E:53a-32: dman dang phra mo grub 'dod bas //
T02TD2014E:53b-1: / mtshan ma dang po brtag par bya //
T02TD2014E:53b-2: nyi ma 'byor pa bzang po la //
T02TD2014E:53b-3: sngags pas smyung ba byas nas ni //
T02TD2014E:53b-4: ras dkar gtsang ma bgos nas kyang //
T02TD2014E:53b-5: gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs su //
T02TD2014E:53b-6: dkyil 'khor lnga ni dngar te bri //
T02TD2014E:53b-7: de dag ji ltar bri ba yang /
T02TD2014E:53b-8: legs par rab tu bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:53b-9: de dag kun la mtshungs par ni //
T02TD2014E:53b-11: kun nas grub bzhi mdzes par bya //
T02TD2014E:53b-12: de yi dbus su chu'i dkyil 'khor //
T02TD2014E:53b-13: zlum po kun nas dgang bar bya //
T02TD2014E:53b-14: de yi steng du me tog dag / dri zhim mdzes pas dgang bar bya //
T02TD2014E:53b-15: dkyil 'khor dang po'i steng du yang ;
T02TD2014E:53b-16: / dpal ldan rnam par snang mdzad sogs //
T02TD2014E:53b-17: sangs rgyas lnga rnams dgong pa ni //
T02TD2014E:53b-18: gru gsum ae yi steng du bri //
T02TD2014E:53b-19: ji ltar rigs pas bris byas nas //
T02TD2014E:53b-20: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa dag la ni //
T02TD2014E:53b-21: 'jam dpal gzhon nu byams ba dang //
T02TD2014E:53b-22: gzhan yang rgyal sras sna tshogs dag / nyan thos rnams dang bcas pa yang //
T02TD2014E:53b-23: rin chen steng du bri bar bya //
T02TD2014E:53b-24: yang na me tog nyid la ni //
T02TD2014E:53b-25: rang rang sngags kyis byin rlabs te //
T02TD2014E:53b-26: kun nas gnas bar bsam par bya //
T02TD2014E:53b-27: dkyil 'khor gsum pa dag la yang //
T02TD2014E:53b-28: chos kyi 'khor lo bri bya ste //
T02TD2014E:53b-29: rten 'brel sngags kyis byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2014E:53b-30: dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'i dbus dag tu //
T02TD2014E:53b-31: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag / de bzhin dkyil 'khor lnga pa la //
T02TD2014E:53b-32: dkon mchog gsum gyi byin brlabs kyis //
T02TD2014E:53b-33: legs nyes gsal bar ston byed pa //
T02TD2014E:53b-34: kun nas gnas par bsam par bya //
T02TD2014E:53b-35: de ltar legs par bsams nas ni //
T02TD2014E:53b-36: dkyil 'khor lnga pa'i steng du yang //
T02TD2014E:53b-37: me long ma chag ma gas pa //
T02TD2014E:53b-38: bzang po legs par phyis pa gzhag / de nas de dag mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD2014E:53b-39: dkyil 'khor de dag re re yang //
T02TD2014E:53b-40: me tog bdug pa la sogs pa'i //
T02TD2014E:53b-41: mchod pa rnams dang gtor mar bcas //
T02TD2014E:53b-42: re re la yang rdzogs par dbul //
T02TD2014E:53b-43: dang po sangs rgyas thams cad la //
T02TD2014E:53b-45: gsum pa dam chos 'khor lo la //
T02TD2014E:53b-46: bzhi pa rdo rje sems dpa' la //
T02TD2014E:53b-47: lnga pa gsal ston lha mo la //
T02TD2014E:53b-48: mchod pa legs par byas nas ni //
T02TD2014E:53b-49: shar gyi phyogs su kha bltas te //
T02TD2014E:54a-2: me long bzang po de nyid kyang //
T02TD2014E:54a-3: lag ba g-yon pas bzung byas te //
T02TD2014E:54a-4: gsang sngags bzlas pa brtsam par bya //
T02TD2014E:54a-5: ai ni de yi thog ma ste //
T02TD2014E:54a-6: la dad aar ni ldan pa dag / gnyis ba yin par rab tu grags //
T02TD2014E:54a-7: y'a dang au dang aom sbyar ba //
T02TD2014E:54a-8: yi ge gsum sbyar gsum ba ni //
T02TD2014E:54a-9: yi ge gsum po de nyid la //
T02TD2014E:54a-10: ai yi gnas su pi bzhag nas //
T02TD2014E:54a-11: lhag ma snga ma bzhin sbyar nas //
T02TD2014E:54a-12: yi ge drug tu gyur par bya //
T02TD2014E:54a-13: tha mar sv'a h'a ldan byas la //
T02TD2014E:54a-14: thams cad mthong bar byed pa ste //
T02TD2014E:54a-15: lan 'bum sngon du bsnyen pa bya //
T02TD2014E:54a-16: de nas gzhon nu'am gzhon nu ma //
T02TD2014E:54a-17: mtshan ldan gcig gam gnyis sam gsum //
T02TD2014E:54a-18: zas gtsang zos shing khrus byas pa //
T02TD2014E:54a-19: de bzhin gos bzang sa gyon pa dag / dkyil 'khor lnga pa'i shar phyogs nas //
T02TD2014E:54a-20: ku sha'i stan la 'dug nas ni //
T02TD2014E:54a-21: nub tu bltas te mi smra bar //
T02TD2014E:54a-22: kun nas thub par 'dug par bya //
T02TD2014E:54a-23: de nas sngags pa bdag nyid kyang //
T02TD2014E:54a-24: khu tshur dpung par bsnol byas te /
T02TD2014E:54a-25: se gol gdab cing gsang sngags bzlas //
T02TD2014E:54a-26: bkra shis lha mo dkar mo zhig / kun nas nye bar 'ongs nas ni //
T02TD2014E:54a-27: legs nyes ston pa bsam par bya //
T02TD2014E:54a-28: de ltar gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02TD2014E:54a-29: stod rtsa brgyad du bzlas bya zhing //
T02TD2014E:54a-30: gzhon nu rnams la me long bstan //
T02TD2014E:54a-31: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'am //
T02TD2014E:54a-32: sngags kyi bgrang phreng bzang bo dag / bkra shis mtshan ma bzang po rnams //
T02TD2014E:54a-33: mthong bar gyur na dngos grub thob//
T02TD2014E:54a-34: sprul dang sdom dang sdig pa dang //
T02TD2014E:54a-35: de bzhin dmyal ba yi dvags rnams //
T02TD2014E:54a-36: mthong na dngos grub mi thob ste //
T02TD2014E:54a-37: slar yang sngags bsnyen nyid la 'bad //
T02TD2014E:54a-38: cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
T02TD2014E:54a-39: de bzhin gson dang 'chi ba dang //
T02TD2014E:54a-40: stor ba rnyed dang mi rnyed dang //
T02TD2014E:54a-41: phyi mar bde 'gro 'am sdug bsngal dag / ji ltar myong bar 'gyur la sogs//
T02TD2014E:54a-42: bde bar rab tu mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:54a-43: dbab snod la yang nyes pa med //
T02TD2014E:54a-44: de ltar bya ba zin nas ni //
T02TD2014E:54a-45: kha zas bzang po la sogs pas //
T02TD2014E:54a-46: gzhon nu de dag mgu byas te //
T02TD2014E:54a-47: dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol te bsdu //
T02TD2014E:54a-48: de nas dgos pa'i bya ba la //
T02TD2014E:54a-49: gzhug pa'am ni bzlog par bya //
T02TD2014E:54b-0: @54b de la sngon du dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2014E:54b-2: brtul zhugs bzang po dag med par /
T02TD2014E:54b-4: spyin sreg la sogs pa thabs sla ba rnams la brten nas /
T02TD2014E:54b-5: gdug pa can 'dul ba la sogs pa las sna tshogs kyi sbyor ba bshad zin nas /
T02TD2014E:54b-6: da ni dkyil 'khor dang ri mo dang phyi nang gi brtul zhugs bzang po dag la brten nas /
T02TD2014E:54b-7: thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub bzang po rnams bstan par bzhed pas /
T02TD2014E:54b-8: thob mar mtshan ma la dga' ba'i gang zag gzhug pa'i phyir /
T02TD2014E:54b-9: pra se na blta ba zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba thog mar bstan te /
T02TD2014E:54b-10: de bas na thog mar pra se na blta ste grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong na ni bsgrub pa la gzhug bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:54b-11: grub par mi 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma mthong na ni /
T02TD2014E:54b-12: slar bsnyen pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:54b-13: mtshan ma gang yang mthong bar ma gyur na ni pra se na blta ba nyid kyi bsnyen pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:54b-14: de nas yang pra sen blta ba'i sbyor ba bya'o //
T02TD2014E:54b-15: de la 'di'i rim pa ni dang po bsnyen pa byas nas /
T02TD2014E:54b-16: de nas pra se na blta ba'i sbyor ba byas te /
T02TD2014E:54b-17: de yang dus tshod bzang po la gtsang ma'i gnas su song ste /
T02TD2014E:54b-18: mandala khru do pa'i tshad tsam lnga byang nas lhor dngar te byas la /
T02TD2014E:54b-19: de dag kun kyang gzhi gru bzhir byas pa'i dbus su kha khyer zlum por bskor ba'i nang du chu gtsang mas bkang ste /
T02TD2014E:54b-20: de'i steng du me tog dri zhim po sil mas legs par bkang ste gzhag / dkyil 'khor dang po'i dbus su sangs rgyas kyi sa'i phyag rgya ae gru gsum dkar po zhig rdul tshon dang me tog gis bris te /
T02TD2014E:54b-21: de'i steng du dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bde bar gshegs pa lnga rnams lugs ma 'am ri mo'am yi ge 'am yang na me tog la bsngags te bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02TD2014E:54b-22: gnyis ba la byang chub sems dpa' sa'i phyag rgya rin po che bris te /
T02TD2014E:54b-23: de'i steng du 'jam dpal gzhon nu la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02TD2014E:54b-24: 'phags pa koondi n+ya la sogs pa nyan thos chen po'i dge 'dun rnams lugs ma la sogs te snga ma bzhin du bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02TD2014E:54b-25: dkyil 'khor gsum ba la chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bris te /
T02TD2014E:54b-26: rten 'brel la sogs pa'i snying po dgod do //
T02TD2014E:55a-0: @55a * // yang na dkyil 'khor gnyis ba la chos kyi 'khor lo bris te /
T02TD2014E:55a-1: gsum pa la dge 'dun dkon mchog bris nas /
T02TD2014E:55a-2: dkon mchog spyi'i lugs dang mthun pas de ltar bris /
T02TD2014E:55a-3: bzhi pa la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyal po byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid dpal rdo rje sems dpa' lugs ma la sogs ba gzhag / lnga pa la 'phags pa thams cad kyi thugs rje'i byin gyi rlabs mtshan ma nye bar ston pa'i lha mo /
T02TD2014E:55a-4: tshig dbang bkra shis dkar mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2014E:55a-5: ri mo la sogs par gzhag pa'am /
T02TD2014E:55a-7: / dkyil 'khor de dag re re la yang aargham dang /
T02TD2014E:55a-8: me tog la sogs pa nye ba'i mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang gtor ma dang bcas pa yang gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:55a-9: de nas sngags pa bdag nyid khrus legs par byas nas /
T02TD2014E:55a-10: smyung ba la gnas par byas nas /
T02TD2014E:55a-11: gos dkar po gtsang ma bgos te dkyil 'khor gyi nub phyogs su rtsva ku sha'i stan la kha shar phyogs su bltas te 'dug par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:55a-12: me long bzang po skyon med pa zhig kyang legs par phyis te dkyil 'khor lnga pa'i steng du gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:55a-13: de nas sngags pa bdag nyid rang gi lha'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te mchod pa'i rdzas dang dkyil 'khor rnams la /
T02TD2014E:55a-14: ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'i gsang sngags bzlas pa'i chus gtor te rnam par dag par bsams nas /
T02TD2014E:55a-15: de nas dkyil 'khor dang por sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs nas legs par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:55a-16: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor 'og ma rnams la yang /
T02TD2014E:55a-17: ji ltar bkod pa'i lha rnams spyan drangs te de bzhin du mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:55a-18: de nas gtor ma rnams kyang spyir 'gro ba rnams la bsngos te thams cad dga' bar byas nas lha rnams la bzod pa gsol te bzlas pa la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:55a-19: de'i tshe lag pa g-yon pas me long bzung ste bsam pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis /
T02TD2014E:55a-20: lha mo'i tshig dbang bkra shis ma bdag la nye bar dgongs shing //
T02TD2014E:55a-21: legs nyes thams cad ston par dmigs te bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:55a-22: de la gsang sngags ni yi ge brgyad pa ste /
T02TD2014E:55a-23: de la dang po ni a'i zhes bya'o //
T02TD2014E:55b-0: @55b gnyis pa ni la dang a'a gnyis sbyar ba ste l'a zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2014E:55b-1: gsum pa ni ya dang a'u aam rnams gcig tu sbyar ba ste y'um zhes bya'o //
T02TD2014E:55b-2: de la yi ge gzhan rnams ni snga ma'i yi ge nyid la ai gsal te pi'i yi ge gzhag pa ni yi ge brgyad pa ste /
T02TD2014E:55b-3: pra se na thams cad mthong bar byed pa yin //
T02TD2014E:55b-4: gsang sngags 'di ltar ci nus pa bzlas te /
T02TD2014E:55b-5: de nas skyo bar gyur na lha rnams la bzod pa gsol te gshegs su gsol nas dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas langs te cung zad ngal gso bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:55b-6: de nas yang phyi de nyin par me tog rnying pa rnams bsal te /
T02TD2014E:55b-7: me tog gsar pa'i mandala legs par byas te yang mchod pa dang gtor ma de bzhin du phul te bzlas pa la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:55b-8: de lta bu zhag lnga'am bdun nam 'bum phrag gcig thon par 'gyur te /
T02TD2014E:55b-9: de ltar bsnyen pa byas nas pra se na blta ba'i phyir yang dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du legs par bya ste /
T02TD2014E:55b-10: byis pa gzhon nu 'am gzhon nu ma /
T02TD2014E:55b-11: khyim gyi chos kyis sma ma bab pa lus la skyon med pa rigs bzang ba gcig gam gnyis sam gsum zhig btsal te /
T02TD2014E:55b-13: khrus legs par byas par gos gtsang ma bskon te dkyil 'khor lnga pa'i shar phyogs su ku sha'i stan la kha nub tu bltas te mi smra bar 'dug tu gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:55b-14: bdag nyid kyang nub phyogs su ku sha'i stan la snga ma bzhin du 'dug ste /
T02TD2014E:55b-15: lag pa rdo rje khu tshur dpung bar bsnol bas se gol gyi sgras 'phags pa rnams la bskul zhing bsam pa snga ma dang ldan pas bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad dam stong rtsa brgyad byas te /
T02TD2014E:55b-16: gzhon nu'am gzhon nu ma rnams la bstan na /
T02TD2014E:55b-17: de'i tshe sangs rgyas sam byang chub sems dpa'am /
T02TD2014E:55b-18: nor bu rin po che'am bgrang phreng bzang po lta bu bkra shis pa'i mtshan ma bzang po mthong na ni yid la bsam pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:55b-19: gal te sprul dang sdig pa dang /
T02TD2014E:55b-20: sems can dmyal ba dang yi dvags dag mthong na ni dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur bas /
T02TD2014E:55b-21: slar bsnyen pa la 'bad par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:56a-0: sbyor ba'i 'dis ni dngos grub thob pa dang mi thob pa 'ba' zhig @56a * //
T02TD2014E:56a-1: tu ma zad kyi bya ba sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2014E:56a-2: de dag kyang re zhig 'dir bdag gis zhar la brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:56a-3: de la nad pa lta bu 'chi 'am gson par gyur pa blta bar 'dod na cho ga snga ma bzhin du byas te /
T02TD2014E:56a-4: de 'chi ba 'am gson par gyur pa blta ba yid la byed bas 'phags pas de bzhin du dmod btsugs te /
T02TD2014E:56a-5: gzhon nu rnams la bstan na gang zla ba drug gi bar du 'chi bar 'gyur ba de ni der mgo chad par snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:56a-6: de ltar mi 'gyur na ni mgo dang ldan par snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:56a-7: de ltar mi 'gyur na gzhan yang bdag gam gzhan dag skye ba phyi mar bde 'gror 'gyur ba'am ngan 'gror 'gyur ba blta bar 'dod na yang /
T02TD2014E:56a-8: cho ga thams cad snga ma bzhin du byas te /
T02TD2014E:56a-9: skye ba phyi ma blta bar gyur pa'i bsam pas 'phangs pa'i yid la byed pas dmod btsugs te /
T02TD2014E:56a-10: bltas na gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de'i gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:56a-11: gal te ngan 'gro'i gzugs brnyan mthong na des bsod nams bskyed pa'i las la myur du 'bad par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:56a-12: gzhan yang bdag gam gzhan gyi nor chen po dag stor nas rkun mo blta bar 'dod na /
T02TD2014E:56a-13: cho ga thams cad de bzhin du byas nas rkun ma blta ba la dmigs nas bzlas brjod byas pa'i me long de bzhin du bstan na rkun ma gang yin pa de nyid kyi gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:56a-14: gal te bdag gam gzhan la gnod pa'i gdon dag blta bar 'dod na /
T02TD2014E:56a-15: yang cho ga thams cad de bzhin du byas te /
T02TD2014E:56a-16: gdon blta ba'i yid la byed bas bstan na gdon gang yin pa de mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:56a-17: cho ga 'di ni me long 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi thig le bzang po dang ral gri bzang po dang /
T02TD2014E:56a-18: snod gtsang ma bzang por blugs pa'i chu dag gis kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:56a-19: gzhan yang bdag nyid kyis khrus legs par byas te cho ga gzhan snga ma bzhin du byas nas /
T02TD2014E:56a-20: dri bzang po dang sbyar ba'i chu la sngags kyis btab ste /
T02TD2014E:56a-21: lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe bong bkrus nas /
T02TD2014E:56a-22: rgya skyegs kyi khu ba ska sla ran ba phun sum tshogs pas /
T02TD2014E:56a-23: rim pa mang du bsku zhing gsang sngags bzlas la /
T02TD2014E:56b-0: yang @56b shel sgong la sogs pa legs par phyis te /
T02TD2014E:56b-1: gzugs brnyan mngon par gyur par byas nas cho ga gzhan snga ma bzhin byas te gzhon nu rnams la bstan na srid pa gsum mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:56b-2: 'di dag ni zhar la bshad pa ste /
T02TD2014E:56b-3: 'dir ni dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod pas bsnyen pa byas nas sgrub pa la 'jug pa'i tshe pra se na bltas te dngos grub bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba byas nas 'dun pa skye bar dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2014E:56b-4: thob par mi 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma mthong na yang /
T02TD2014E:56b-5: slar bsnyen pa la sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2014E:56b-6: dngos grub kyi mtshan ma brtag pa'i sbyor ba bstan pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2014E:56b-8: // / da ni brtul zhugs bzang po yis //
T02TD2014E:56b-9: dngos grub bzang po 'dod pa la //
T02TD2014E:56b-10: gzhon nu brtul zhugs gang yin pa //
T02TD2014E:56b-11: thog mar rab tu bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:56b-12: sngags pas bsnyen pa byas nas ni //
T02TD2014E:56b-13: gzhon nu brtul zhugs brtsam bar bya //
T02TD2014E:56b-14: de nas sgrub la 'jug par bya //
T02TD2014E:56b-15: ji ltar lha sras gzhon nu dag / de bzhin rig 'dzin gzhon nu ltar //
T02TD2014E:56b-16: gos dkar rab tu gtsang ma'am //
T02TD2014E:56b-17: yang na khra bo gtsang ma'am //
T02TD2014E:56b-18: gzhon nu'i tshul du bgo bar bya //
T02TD2014E:56b-19: gtsug phud gsum mam de bzhin lnga //
T02TD2014E:56b-20: legs par brgyan te gdags par bya //
T02TD2014E:56b-21: me tog mdzes pa'i thod dag dang //
T02TD2014E:56b-22: rna cha mgul rgyan dpung rgyan dang //
T02TD2014E:56b-23: legs par gser gyis spras par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:56b-24: dpral bar mtshal gyi thig le ni //
T02TD2014E:56b-25: shin tu mdzes pa zhig kyang bri //
T02TD2014E:56b-26: gzhon nu'i rgyan du 'os pa dag / ci rigs mdzes par byas nas ni //
T02TD2014E:56b-28: ri mo bkram ste mchod par bya //
T02TD2014E:56b-29: de ltar zla gsum zla drug tu //
T02TD2014E:56b-30: brtul zhugs brtan par byas nas ni //
T02TD2014E:56b-31: sgrub pa dag la zhugs pa na //
T02TD2014E:56b-32: dngos grub rab tu thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:56b-33: de yi dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid kyang //
T02TD2014E:56b-34: legs par 'dir ni bstan par bya //
T02TD2014E:56b-35: khru gang yang na de yi tshad //
T02TD2014E:56b-36: tha mar rin chen 'bar bas bskor //
T02TD2014E:56b-37: ba yi rnam lngas legs byugs shing //
T02TD2014E:56b-38: dri yi chus kyang byug par bya //
T02TD2014E:56b-39: de la phye ma dkar po sogs //
T02TD2014E:56b-40: tshon sna gcig gis bri bya ba //
T02TD2014E:56b-41: padma bzang po mdzes pa ni //
T02TD2014E:57a-0: ze ba bcas shing ge sar @57a * //
T02TD2014E:57a-2: snying po aom gyis mtshan pa bri //
T02TD2014E:57a-3: de yi steng du gzhag bya ba'i //
T02TD2014E:57a-4: ri mo mtshan nyid bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:57a-5: ras phran khru gang tsam po ni //
T02TD2014E:57a-6: gtsang mas bkal zhing btags pa las //
T02TD2014E:57a-7: kha tshar dag kyang ma nyams pa /
T02TD2014E:57a-8: lhag pa'i rin gyis nyos byas pa'i //
T02TD2014E:57a-9: skyon med shin tu gtsang ba la //
T02TD2014E:57a-10: tshon rtsi bzang po skyon med pas //
T02TD2014E:57a-11: gzhon nu'i tshul can mdzes pa'i sku //
T02TD2014E:57a-12: sha tshugs ldan zhing mtshan nyid rdzogs //
T02TD2014E:57a-13: btso ma gser dang 'dra ba'i mdog / yang na dung dang kunda 'dra //
T02TD2014E:57a-14: autpala sngon po mdzes pa ni //
T02TD2014E:57a-15: g-yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa ste //
T02TD2014E:57a-16: g-yas pa mchog spyin phyag rgya mdzad //
T02TD2014E:57a-17: gtsug phud lnga ldan me tog mdzes //
T02TD2014E:57a-18: thams cad rgyan gyis brgyan byas pa //
T02TD2014E:57a-19: dge ba'i lag pas bri bar bya //
T02TD2014E:57a-20: kun nas me tog gtor ba dang //
T02TD2014E:57a-21: rin chen ri phug na gnas shing //
T02TD2014E:57a-22: lha sras gzhon nus mchod par bri //
T02TD2014E:57a-23: sngags pa gzhon nu'i brtul zhugs can //
T02TD2014E:57a-24: spyan sngar kun nas 'dud par bri //
T02TD2014E:57a-25: nyin re bzhin du sku gzugs de //
T02TD2014E:57a-26: dkyil 'khor steng du bkram nas ni //
T02TD2014E:57a-27: gtsang ma'i mchod pas mchod bya zhing //
T02TD2014E:57a-28: brtul zhugs ldan pas bzlas pa tsam //
T02TD2014E:57a-29: w'a g'i shva ri mum zhes pa /
T02TD2014E:57a-30: thog mar aom dang ldan pa dag / lha dang yig 'bru ma gtogs pa'i //
T02TD2014E:57a-31: rtog pa sna tshogs rab spangs nas //
T02TD2014E:57a-32: bzlas la 'bad nas grub par bya //
T02TD2014E:57a-33: sngags pa bdag nyid yan lag lngas //
T02TD2014E:57a-34: legs par byin gyis brlabs byas nas //
T02TD2014E:57a-35: mchod dang bzlas pa brtsam par bya ;
T02TD2014E:57a-36: / de ltar brtul zhugs spyad nas ni //
T02TD2014E:57a-37: gtong ba'i dus tshod shes pa na //
T02TD2014E:57a-38: bzlas pa lha la phul bya ste //
T02TD2014E:57a-39: gshegs su gsol nas lha rnams dang //
T02TD2014E:57a-40: gnas sogs bsrungs nas gnas par bya //
T02TD2014E:57a-41: de ltar brtul zhugs spyad nas ni //
T02TD2014E:57a-42: de nas sgrub la 'jug par bya //
T02TD2014E:57a-43: gal te sngags pa skal ldan pa //
T02TD2014E:57a-44: de tshe bsgrub pa yod kyang srid //
T02TD2014E:57a-45: bsgrub pa'i cho ga bsdus pa dag / legs par rab tu bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:57a-46: ral gri tri sh'ul la sogs pa //
T02TD2014E:57a-47: mtshon cha bzang po bsgrub 'dod dam //
T02TD2014E:57a-48: ldong ros mig sman la sogs pa'i //
T02TD2014E:57a-49: rdzas rnams sna tshogs bsgrub 'dod pas //
T02TD2014E:57b-0: tshes @57b grangs bzang po dag la yang //
T02TD2014E:57b-1: bkra shis gtsang ma'i gnas dag tu //
T02TD2014E:57b-2: dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris te //
T02TD2014E:57b-3: dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs gtso bo ni //
T02TD2014E:57b-4: legs par rab tu mchod par bya //
T02TD2014E:57b-5: ral gri la sogs mtshan ma la //
T02TD2014E:57b-6: me tog yang na bdug pa yi //
T02TD2014E:57b-7: brgya stong dag tu spyin sreg bya ;
T02TD2014E:57b-8: / mtshon cha bsgrub par gyur na ni //
T02TD2014E:57b-9: lag pa g-yas pas bzung bar bya //
T02TD2014E:57b-10: ldong ros la sogs rdzas rnams dag / gal te bsgrub par 'dod pa na //
T02TD2014E:57b-11: bzang po'i snod dang ldan byas te //
T02TD2014E:57b-12: lag pa g-yon pas dgab par bya //
T02TD2014E:57b-13: de ltar rab tu 'bad par bya //
T02TD2014E:57b-14: de tshe nam gyi tha ma la ;
T02TD2014E:57b-16: sangs rgyas zhing yang mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:57b-18: gal te du ba byung gyur na //
T02TD2014E:57b-19: de yis lus ni sbed par 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:57b-20: gal te dro bar gyur na yang //
T02TD2014E:57b-21: rkang mgyogs stobs dang ldan pa 'grub //
T02TD2014E:57b-22: de tshe 'grub par ma gyur kyang //
T02TD2014E:57b-24: bkra shis phun sum tshogs 'gyur zhing //
T02TD2014E:57b-25: mya ngan 'das pa'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD2014E:57b-27: gal te sgrub pa dman pa yis //
T02TD2014E:57b-28: de dag bsgrub par mi nus na //
T02TD2014E:57b-29: 'o ma sgrub pa brtsam par bya ;
T02TD2014E:57b-30: sngags pa brtul zhugs spyad pa yis //
T02TD2014E:57b-31: zla ba gza' yis zin pa'i tshe //
T02TD2014E:57b-32: ba bzang dag las byung ba yi //
T02TD2014E:57b-33: 'o ma snod bzang ldan pa dag //
T02TD2014E:57b-34: lag pa g-yon pas bkab nas ni //
T02TD2014E:57b-35: ma btang bar du bzlas par bya //
T02TD2014E:57b-36: zla ba gza' yis ma btang bar //
T02TD2014E:57b-37: de tshe zho ru gyur na ni //
T02TD2014E:57b-38: 'thungs pas shes rab dngos grub thob //
T02TD2014E:57b-39: gal te zho ru ma gyur kyang //
T02TD2014E:57b-41: gzhon nu brtul zhugs ldan pa yis //
T02TD2014E:57b-42: dngos grub bzang po grub pa dag / kun nas sbyor ba bshad zin to //
T02TD2014E:57b-43: 'di ni gzhon nu brtul zhugs dang //
T02TD2014E:57b-44: ri mo dang dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas dngos grub sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad pa yin te /
T02TD2014E:57b-45: 'phags pa su siddhi ka ra la sogs pa las rgya cher bshad pa'i cho ga mdo tsam bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:58a-0: re zhig 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'bru drug pa zhes bya ba legs par mnos @58a * //
T02TD2014E:58a-1: shing gnang ba thob pas khrus kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2014E:58a-2: mchod pa dang bzlas brjod kyi sgo nas bsnyen pa byas pas dkyil 'khor dang sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar brtul zhugs brtsams pas ral gri dang tri sh'u la dang /
T02TD2014E:58a-3: be con la sogs pas mtshon cha'i dngos grub la sbyor ba dang ;
T02TD2014E:58a-4: ldong ros dang aanydza na dang ri lu la sogs pa rdzas kyi dngos grub la sbyor ba'i tshe /
T02TD2014E:58a-5: bdag bsam pa'i rim pa dang /
T02TD2014E:58a-6: lha bsam pa'i rim pa dang /
T02TD2014E:58a-7: de dag gi sngags dag dang /
T02TD2014E:58a-8: khrus la sogs pa'i bya ba la sbyor ba'i gsang sngags dag gsal bar ma bstan pas de dag brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:58a-9: dang por phyi nang gi khrus byas nas sngags kyi khang par zhugs te /
T02TD2014E:58a-10: stan la mtshon cha'i sngags kyis btab la 'dug ste /
T02TD2014E:58a-11: dang por chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis dag par bsam mo //
T02TD2014E:58a-12: de nas snying rje chen po'i blos bskyed de /
T02TD2014E:58a-13: rang gi snying gar snying po'i gsang sngags gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:58a-16: de nas mtshog mar mtshog ma'i gsang sngags gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD2014E:58a-18: zhes bya ba ni gsang sngags so //
T02TD2014E:58a-19: de bzhin du spyi gtsug tu /
T02TD2014E:58a-21: zhes bya ba gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:58a-24: mgrin pa dang dpral ba rnams su /
T02TD2014E:58a-26: zhes bya ba'i go cha'i gsang sngags 'di dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:58a-27: de nas lag pa dang mig dag tu /
T02TD2014E:58a-29: zhes bya ba mtshon cha'i sngags 'di gzhag par bya ste /
T02TD2014E:58a-30: yi ge 'di dag kyang 'od 'bar bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:58a-31: des bdag 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid du gyur pa yin par nga rgyal bya ste /
T02TD2014E:58a-32: de nas bdag gi mdun du yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su padma de nyid yi ge aom las 'dab ma stong dang ldan zhing 'od 'bar ba'i steng du /
T02TD2014E:58a-34: zhes bya ba las 'jam dpal gzhon nu gser bcom lta bu autpala dang mchog spyin can bskyed par bya ste /
T02TD2014E:58a-35: de nas snying gal sogs par snying po la sogs pa'i yan lag lnga pa'i gsang sngags dag kyang bdag nyid la bkod pa bzhin du 'dir yang dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:58a-37: aom w'a g'i shva ri mum /
T02TD2014E:58a-38: zhes bya ba rtsa ba'i gsang sngags las kyang /
T02TD2014E:58b-0: @58b 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sku dung dang //
T02TD2014E:58b-1: me tog kunda'i kha dog lta bu zhig bskyed par bya ste /
T02TD2014E:58b-2: de nas snying po'i sngags kyis spyan drang ba byas nas bskyed pa'i rim pa bzhin du mchod par bya ste /
T02TD2014E:58b-3: mtshon cha'i sngags kyis nor bu blangs nas rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2014E:58b-4: de yang mi myur mi bul zhing lha dang gsang sngags la sems pa ma gtogs par /
T02TD2014E:58b-5: yid la byed pa thams cad spangs te /
T02TD2014E:58b-6: ji srid yid mi skyo ba'i bar du bzlas nas gtong bar 'dod pa na /
T02TD2014E:58b-7: bzlas pa de yang grangs kyi rnam pa yid la byed pas lha la phul te snying po'i sngags kyis gshegs su gsol /
T02TD2014E:58b-8: bdag nyid yan lag lnga pa'i sngags kyis bsrungs nas cung zad dbugs phyung ste bsod nams kyi las gzhan dag bya'o //
T02TD2014E:58b-9: 'di ni re zhig gzhon nu brtul zhugs kyi sgo nas dngos grub bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2014E:58b-10: gang dag bzlas pa la mi dga' zhing sgom pa la mos pa rnams kyis 'khor lo bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2014E:58b-11: 'di yang gzhan du rgya cher bshad pas rtsa ba'i 'khor lo 'ga' zhig bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:58b-12: de la 'khor lo bsgom par 'dod pas mchod pa byas pa'i rjes la /
T02TD2014E:58b-13: snying gar zla ba lta bu'i 'khor lo lang zhing srab la dang zhing chung ba /
T02TD2014E:58b-14: rtsibs brgyad pa snying po brtsegs pa lta bu khor yug kun nas zlum pa zhig bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:58b-15: 'khor lo'i phyogs bzhir dag thams cad kyi rtsa ba yi ge 'bru bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:58b-16: 'di ltar aom aam aim aum rnams bsam mo //
T02TD2014E:58b-17: mtshams bzhir w'a g'i shva ra zhes bya bsams te /
T02TD2014E:58b-18: de ltar rtsibs brgyad la yi ge 'bru brgyad kha dog dkar zhing 'od gsal ba ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa blos dus gcig tu gsal bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:58b-19: snying po la ni yi ge mu rab tu 'od 'bar ba bsams te /
T02TD2014E:58b-20: de'i 'od zer gyis yi ge dang 'khor lo dang bdag gi lus thams cad gsal ba /
T02TD2014E:58b-21: nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad kyang dag cing gsal bar ji ltar nus pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:58b-22: gtong bar 'dod pa na chos thams cad kyang rang gi sems snang ba tsam ste sems ni shes rab kyi 'khor lor gyur cing snang la ji ltar 'khor lo dang zhing gsal la zhi ba bzhin du /
T02TD2014E:59a-1: thams cad kyang spros pa rab tu zhi zhing rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal te mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad dang bral bar bsams te /
T02TD2014E:59a-2: de bzhin du bsam par gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:59a-3: de las ldang bar 'dod na snying rje'i sems skyes par bsam ste /
T02TD2014E:59a-4: 'gro ba'i don bya ba'i bsam pas langs te spyod lam dag 'tsham par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:59a-5: gzhon nu'i brtul zhugs la brten pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs sgrub pa'i thabs bstan pa 'jam dpal gyi rtog pa rgya che ba dag las mdor bsdus te bstan pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2014E:59a-7: // / de nas 'jam rgyal khro bo yi //
T02TD2014E:59a-8: brtul zhugs la sogs bstan par bya //
T02TD2014E:59a-9: bsnyen pa legs byas de 'og tu //
T02TD2014E:59a-10: khro bo'i brtul zhugs brtsam par bya //
T02TD2014E:59a-11: skra ni lhug par bshig byas shing //
T02TD2014E:59a-12: bzhin yang rnam par bsgyur byas te //
T02TD2014E:59a-13: be con ral gri tri sh'ul sogs //
T02TD2014E:59a-14: lag pa g-yas kyis gzung bar bya //
T02TD2014E:59a-15: sdigs mdzub dag dang ldan par bya //
T02TD2014E:59a-16: smyung ba la yang gnas bzhin du //
T02TD2014E:59a-17: khro bo yid la dran byed cing //
T02TD2014E:59a-18: gsang sngags rgyal po bzla bar bya //
T02TD2014E:59a-19: gtam gzhan smra bar mi bya ste //
T02TD2014E:59a-20: khro bo dran pa ma gtogs pa //
T02TD2014E:59a-21: 'jigs dang chags pa spang bar bya //
T02TD2014E:59a-22: tha mal mi dang mi 'grogs par //
T02TD2014E:59a-23: gcig pu khyad par lam nas rgyu //
T02TD2014E:59a-24: 'di ltar zla drug spyad nas ni //
T02TD2014E:59a-25: sgrub pa la ni 'jug par bya //
T02TD2014E:59a-26: dur khrod dben pa la sogs par //
T02TD2014E:59a-27: dkyil 'khor bzang po khyad par can //
T02TD2014E:59a-28: dur khrod thal ba'am de ldan par //
T02TD2014E:59a-29: legs par bri bar bya ba ni //
T02TD2014E:59a-30: sgo bzhir ldan zhing grva bzhir ldan ;
T02TD2014E:59a-31: / snying po re mig dgu pa la //
T02TD2014E:59a-32: yi ge bcu bdun legs par dgod //
T02TD2014E:59a-33: de yi dbus su gshin rje gshed //
T02TD2014E:59a-34: dur khrod ras la bris pa ni //
T02TD2014E:59a-35: mi bzad rab tu 'bar ba gzhag / de yi mdun du be con dang //
T02TD2014E:59a-36: ral gri tri sh'ul la sogs pa //
T02TD2014E:59a-37: ji ltar sngon du brjod pa bzhin //
T02TD2014E:59a-38: legs par brgyan te gzhag par bya //
T02TD2014E:59a-39: sngags pa lha yi 'byor ldan pas //
T02TD2014E:59a-40: gshin rje gshed po spyan drangs te //
T02TD2014E:59a-41: mchod pa'i cho gas mnyes byas nas //
T02TD2014E:59a-42: de nas bzlas la 'bad par bya //
T02TD2014E:59a-43: grub pa'i mtshan ma thob gyur na //
T02TD2014E:59a-44: dngos grub sngon dang mtshungs par 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:59b-0: de dag phyi rol @59b brtul zhugs kyi //
T02TD2014E:59b-1: sbyor bar bcas pa bshad pa yin //
T02TD2014E:59b-2: de nas bshad par bya ba ni //
T02TD2014E:59b-3: de las mchog tu gyur pa ste //
T02TD2014E:59b-4: smyung bdag kyang bya mi dgos //
T02TD2014E:59b-5: kha zas dag kyang sdom mi dgos //
T02TD2014E:59b-6: phyag rgya sngags dang bsam pa dag / snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs nas ni //
T02TD2014E:59b-7: sha chen za zhing khrag chen 'thung //
T02TD2014E:59b-8: ba lang khyi sha de bzhin te //
T02TD2014E:59b-9: rta dang glang po la sogs pa'i //
T02TD2014E:59b-10: sha rnams rjen par bza' bar bya //
T02TD2014E:59b-11: khrag dang chang du sbyar ba yi //
T02TD2014E:59b-12: de bzhin bag dang ldan par btung //
T02TD2014E:59b-13: bshang gci khrag la sogs pa yi //
T02TD2014E:59b-14: bdud rtsi lnga po za byed cing //
T02TD2014E:59b-15: de bzhin lus kyang byug par bya ;
T02TD2014E:59b-16: / skye bo med pa'i sa phyogs su //
T02TD2014E:59b-17: khro bo'i gad mo drag por dgod //
T02TD2014E:59b-18: kun la sdigs shing nyam nga med //
T02TD2014E:59b-19: 'di ltar zla drug bsgrubs nas ni //
T02TD2014E:59b-20: sgrub pa la ni 'jug par bya //
T02TD2014E:59b-21: mtshan mo dur khrod dben par ni //
T02TD2014E:59b-22: dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris te //
T02TD2014E:59b-23: de bzhin sku gzugs gzhag par bya //
T02TD2014E:59b-24: mtshon cha la sogs de bzhin te //
T02TD2014E:59b-25: ci dga' ba dag bzhag nas ni //
T02TD2014E:59b-26: bdag nyid rnal 'byor ldan pa yis //
T02TD2014E:59b-27: gshin rje gshed po spyan drangs te //
T02TD2014E:59b-28: sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi yis //
T02TD2014E:59b-29: nyin re rtag tu mchod byas nas //
T02TD2014E:59b-30: bzlas pa la ni rnam par 'bad //
T02TD2014E:59b-31: de ltar rab tu brtson pa la ;
T02TD2014E:59b-33: ma nyams bzlas la 'bad par bya //
T02TD2014E:59b-34: de la gshin rje gshed po nyid //
T02TD2014E:59b-35: dgod cing dngos grub stsol bar byed //
T02TD2014E:59b-36: yang na mtshon cha 'bar ba dang //
T02TD2014E:59b-38: gal te grub par ma gyur yang //
T02TD2014E:59b-39: las rnams grub pa gdon mi za //
T02TD2014E:59b-40: 'di ni brtul zhugs mchog ldan pas //
T02TD2014E:59b-41: dngos grub sgrub bar byed pa la //
T02TD2014E:59b-42: dpa' bo rnams kyis bsgrub bya ba //
T02TD2014E:59b-43: thun mong min pa bshad pa yin //
T02TD2014E:59b-44: 'dir bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po'i brtul zhugs spyad pas //
T02TD2014E:59b-45: dngos grub chen po rnams bsgrub par bstan pa las /
T02TD2014E:59b-46: brtul zhugs kyang rnam pa gnyis gsungs te /
T02TD2014E:59b-47: 'di ltar phyi rol dang nang gi'o //
T02TD2014E:59b-48: de la phyi rol ni smyung ba dang bcas shing phyi rol gyi bya ba srung ba dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2014E:59b-49: nang gi phyi rol gyi smyung ba la gnas pa dang srung ba phra mo dag med de /
T02TD2014E:60a-1: rdzas mi la sogs pa'i sha rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2014E:60a-2: bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga la rol cing phyi rol gyi bya ba la nyam nga ba med pa'i spyod pa'o //
T02TD2014E:60a-3: de gnyis ka'i thun mong lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas lha'i cha lugs 'dzin cing /
T02TD2014E:60a-4: gsang sngags kyi bzlas pa dang lha yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dag ni mtshungs par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:60a-5: de la re zhig lus kyi spyod pa ni gos med pa'am yang na stag gi bags pa la sogs pa'am dur khrod kyi thal ba'am khrag lta bus bsgos pa'i ras gyon pa dang /
T02TD2014E:60a-8: lus dur khrod kyi sol ba 'am thal ba la sogs pas byugs pa'am /
T02TD2014E:60a-9: bzhin rnam par bsgyur ba dang /
T02TD2014E:60a-11: lag pa g-yas par mtshon cha be con dang /
T02TD2014E:60a-12: ral gri dang tri sh'ul la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i mtshon cha thogs pa dang /
T02TD2014E:60a-13: g-yon pa'i sdigs mdzub dang ldan pas dung chen po la sogs pa'i phreng ba thogs pa dang /
T02TD2014E:60a-14: skye bo med pa'i lam du rgyu zhing phrad pa dag la yang lam mi 'dzur zhing phyag mi 'tshal ba dang /
T02TD2014E:60a-15: mtshan mo yang dur khrod la sogs pa byis pa rnams nyam nga ba'i gnas su gnas shing rgyu bar byed pa ni khro bo chen po lus kyi brtul zhugs so //
T02TD2014E:60a-16: rtag tu gsang sngags zlos shing tshig tha mal pa dag mi smra ba dang /
T02TD2014E:60a-17: gal te bdud kyi rigs dag yid du 'ong ba'am mi 'ong ba dag sprul nas /
T02TD2014E:60a-18: spro ba'i tshig dag gis dbugs 'byin tam ma rungs pa'i tshig gis skrag par byed kyang lan smra bar mi byed pa ni ngag gi brtul zhugs so //
T02TD2014E:60a-19: rtag tu bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po 'ba' zhig sems par byed cing /
T02TD2014E:60a-20: rtog pa gzhan yongs su 'dor ba dang /
T02TD2014E:60a-21: rang gi lha ma gtogs pa gzhan gang la yang ma chags shing /
T02TD2014E:60a-22: rtag tu rang gi lha la sems dang ba dang /
T02TD2014E:60a-23: gzugs mi sdug pa dag snang bar gyur cing /
T02TD2014E:60a-24: sgra mi snyan pa dag thos kyang sems nyam nga ba med cing ;
T02TD2014E:60a-25: de bzhin du yid du 'ong ba'i yul dag snang bar gyur kyang /
T02TD2014E:60a-26: g-yeng zhing chags par mi 'gyur bar blo rab tu brtan par gnas pa ni yid kyi brtul zhugs so //
T02TD2014E:60a-27: brtul zhugs rnam pa 'di gsum dang ldan par spyad pa ni phyi dang nang gnyis ka la thun mong du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:60b-0: de la khyad par ni 'di yin @60b te phyi rol gyi brtul zhugs 'dzin pas ni kha zas mi za bar smyung ba la gnas pas dus gsum du khrus bya'o //
T02TD2014E:60b-1: ltogs par gyur na yang ba lang gi lci ba bza'o //
T02TD2014E:60b-2: des lus gnas par ma nus na ba'i 'o ma dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:60b-3: yang na ba'i rnam pa lnga legs par sbyar te btung par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:60b-4: de la legs par sbyar ba'i cho ga ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2014E:60b-5: dang po ba lang gi lci ba dang ba'i gcin du sbyar te /
T02TD2014E:60b-6: legs par mnyes nas cung zad cig gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:60b-7: de nas steng gi dangs ma dang zhabs kyi snyigs ma gnyis bzhag ste /
T02TD2014E:60b-8: cha bar ma ska sla ran par blangs te der ba'i 'o ma dang ba'i mar dang ba'i kha chu rnams dang sbyar te legs par gdus nas dus dus su btung bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:60b-9: gal te de ltar mi nus pa dag gis kyang dkar gsum la sogs te /
T02TD2014E:60b-10: zas gtsang zhing bsngags pa zos nas khrus legs par byas te brtul zhugs spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:60b-11: de la dus kyi dus chen po gsum ni nang par langs ma thag dang /
T02TD2014E:60b-12: nyi ma gung dang dgongs nyal ka rnam pa gsum yin no //
T02TD2014E:60b-13: lhag ma'i dus ni sa chen po byas ba'i dus su lus thams cad bkru bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:60b-14: sa chung ngu dang snabs 'dor ba dag la ni kha dang lag pa gnyis bkru bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:60b-15: stod smad kyi dbugs ngan pa brgyud pa dang /
T02TD2014E:60b-18: zos pa'i rjes rnams su ni kha tsam bkru bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:60b-19: gzhan yang bag bya bar 'os pa sangs rgyas kyis ma gnang ba ngag kyang bsrung bar bya ste /
T02TD2014E:60b-20: 'di ni phyi rol gyi brtul zhugs kyi mtshan nyid thun mong ma yin pa'o //
T02TD2014E:60b-21: de la nang gi brtul zhugs thun mong ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na /
T02TD2014E:60b-22: smyung ba la gnas pa med cing khrus med pa /
T02TD2014E:60b-23: kha zas bsdams pa med cing gtsang sme med par bza' ba dang /
T02TD2014E:60b-24: dam tshig gi zas su gyur pa mi dang /
T02TD2014E:60b-28: khyi sha rnams rjen par za ba dang /
T02TD2014E:60b-33: sha chen po zhes bya ba bdud rtsi lnga po rnams za zhing las bya ba gang la yang 'dzem pa dang mi 'dzem pa zhes bya ba gnyis kyi bsam pa dang /
T02TD2014E:61a-0: spyod pa dang bral bas gnas par byed cing brtul @61a * //
T02TD2014E:61a-1: zhugs spyod par byed pa ni nang gi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2014E:61a-2: de ltar brtul zhugs zla ba drug spyad nas sgrub pa la 'jug par gsungs te /
T02TD2014E:61a-3: brtul zhugs spyod pa'i sngon rol du ni dus des pa dang /
T02TD2014E:61a-5: mtshan ma thob pa zhes bya ba'i bsnyen pa rnam pa gsum gang yang rung ba la sbyar dgos so zhes shes par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:61a-6: de ltar bsnyen pa dang brtul zhugs dang ldan pas sgrub pa la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD2014E:61a-7: re zhig 'byor ba bzang po la dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas su song ste /
T02TD2014E:61a-8: dur khrod kyi thal bas ji skad gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor mtshan mo bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:61a-9: de la 'dir re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa ni /
T02TD2014E:61a-10: snying po'i dkyil 'khor re'u mig dgu dang ldan pa sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa /
T02TD2014E:61a-11: de'i steng du sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad dam bcu drug gam brgya'am stong la sogs pa ci dga' ba bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:61a-12: snying po'i dkyil 'khor de'i phyi rol du grva bzhi dang /
T02TD2014E:61a-13: sgo bzhi dang rta babs dang bcas pa yang bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:61a-14: de'i phyi rol 'khor yug tu 'khor lo rtsibs brgya stong gi rtse mo la rdo rje 'bar bas bskor ba las me 'bar ba 'phro bar bri'o //
T02TD2014E:61a-15: dbus dang phyogs mtshams dang sgo rnams su yang /
T02TD2014E:61a-16: ji ltar sngon du rang gi snying gar 'khor lo bsgom pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02TD2014E:61a-17: nyi ma dang zla ba'i gnas la yi ge bcu bdun dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:61a-18: me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa dang gtor ma la sogs pa rnams ni /
T02TD2014E:61a-19: phyi nang gnyis ka la bye brag med par khrag gis gtor ba'i me tog dang sha chen po'i bdug pa dang /
T02TD2014E:61a-20: til chen po'i mar me'i phreng ba dang /
T02TD2014E:61a-21: sha sna tshogs 'di ltar sha rnam pa lnga la sogs pa srog chags thams cad kyi sha rnams dang rjen pa dang /
T02TD2014E:61a-22: btsos pa rnams dang bsregs pa dang /
T02TD2014E:61a-23: skam po rnams dang ldan pa'i bshos dang gtor ma yang dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:61a-24: de la re zhig 'di'i cho ga ni dkyil 'khor legs par bri ste /
T02TD2014E:61a-25: mchod pa'i rdzas kyang bsog ste sku gzugs bzang po yang dkyil 'khor du bkram nas /
T02TD2014E:61a-26: ji skad du smos pa'i be con la sogs pa'i mtshon cha rus pa'i rgyan dang me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan te /
T02TD2014E:61a-27: bdug pas bdugs te bcom ldan 'das dang /
T02TD2014E:61b-0: @61b bdag nyid kyi mdun du legs par btsugs te gzhag go //
T02TD2014E:61b-1: gal te rdzas las bsgrub pa zhig na mtshon cha'i gnas su ldong ros sam /
T02TD2014E:61b-2: aanytsa na la sogs pa snod bzang po'i nang du gzhug go //
T02TD2014E:61b-3: de nas bdag nyid lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed por bsams te /
T02TD2014E:61b-4: ji ltar sngon du brjod pa bzhin du der spyan drang ba dang mchod pa'i cho ga legs par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:61b-5: mtshon cha la yang mchod pa bya ste /
T02TD2014E:61b-6: de nyid la me tog dang bdug pa'i spyin sreg byas nas /
T02TD2014E:61b-7: lag pa g-yas pas bzung ste bzlas brjod la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:61b-8: de yang ji srid du mtshon cha de me ltar 'bar bar ma gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya ba'am /
T02TD2014E:61b-9: yang na zla ba drug gi bar du bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:61b-10: de'i tshe mtshon cha de dag ji lta ba bzhin du 'bar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma byung na dang po lha la gus pas btud de /
T02TD2014E:61b-11: bdag nyid phul nas dngos grub kyi rdzas de dag kyang bdag nyid dang lha dang slob dpon dang /
T02TD2014E:61b-12: grogs rnams la ci rigs su bsgo bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:61b-13: gal te grub par ma gyur na yang slar spogs pa'i cho ga dag brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:61b-14: gal te grub pa las nyams par gyur na dngos grub slar dbrog pa'i cho ga dag bya'o //
T02TD2014E:61b-15: gal te dus ma yin par mtshan ma byung na srung ba byas te dus su bslang bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:61b-16: gal te grub par ma gyur na yang bgo ba la sogs pa de bzhin du byas te /
T02TD2014E:61b-17: legs par bsrungs te bzhag na dngos grub 'bring po thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:61b-18: de la slar spogs pa'i cho ga ni dang por sgrub pa nyid dang 'dra ste /
T02TD2014E:61b-19: zla ba drug tu sgrub pa'i cho ga de nyid slar bskyang bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:61b-20: des grub par ma gyur na cho ga gnyis pa ni thabs de nyid zla ba gnyis su bskyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:61b-21: des grub par ma gyur na yang thabs gsum pa la yang cho ga de nyid zla ba gnyis su bskyar ba yin no //
T02TD2014E:61b-22: de ltar spogs pa'i cho ga lan gsum du bsgrubs kyang sngon gyi las dang ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD2014E:61b-23: dad pa'i bye brag gis dngos grub kyi snod du cung zad ma gyur pa srid pas de nas drag shul gyi sbyor bas zhag bdun bsgrub par bya ste /
T02TD2014E:61b-24: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las sbrul pa'i khro bo chen po lag na lcags kyu thogs pa zhig dang /
T02TD2014E:61b-25: rdo rje thogs pa zhig sprul te /
T02TD2014E:62a-0: lcags kyu can gyis ye shes kyi lha'i thugs @62a * //
T02TD2014E:62a-2: rdo rje can gyis rgyab nas brdeg cing phul te dbang med par bkug nas /
T02TD2014E:62a-3: sngon du smos pa'i dngos grub kyi rten rnams la thim par bsam zhing tshig 'dis yang bskul bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:62a-4: sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor bas //
T02TD2014E:62a-5: sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson //
T02TD2014E:62a-6: nga ni dpal ldan ral gri 'chang //
T02TD2014E:62a-7: bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor bas //
T02TD2014E:62a-8: gal te dam las 'gal gyur cing //
T02TD2014E:62a-9: grub pa tshul bzhin ma stsal na //
T02TD2014E:62a-10: sangs rgyas sku gsung las byung ba'ang //
T02TD2014E:62a-12: zhig par gyur par gdon mi za //
T02TD2014E:62a-13: zhes bya ba'i tshig dag gis dam tshig rab tu bskul zhing /
T02TD2014E:62a-14: zhag bdun du bar chad med par lha gzir ba'i cho ga byas pas gdon mi za bar 'grub par bshad do //
T02TD2014E:62a-15: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i khro bo'i phyi nang brtul zhugs rnam pa gnyis 'dzin pas dngos grub chen po'i sgrub pa'i khyad par bstan pa ste /
T02TD2014E:62a-16: cho ga 'di dag nyid kyis lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang thod pa dang sdigs mdzub dang /
T02TD2014E:62a-18: mig sman dang ri lu dang bcud kyis len dang /
T02TD2014E:62a-19: rkang pa byug pa la sogs pa rdzas thams cad sgrub pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:62a-20: gal te mchog gi dngos grub chen po bsgrub mi nus pa rnams kyis ni /
T02TD2014E:62a-21: 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang chu gtsang dang rtsab mo la sogs pa las bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:62a-22: de la 'o ma la sogs pa bsgrub pa la ni /
T02TD2014E:62a-23: sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gsum mam zla ba drug tu bsnyen pa byas te bsgrub pa zla ba phyed byas nas tha ma zla ba gzas zin pa'i nub mo dkyil 'khor byas kyang rung ma byas kyang rung ste /
T02TD2014E:62a-24: zla ba gzas ma btang gi bar du mar la sogs pa lag pa g-yon pas bkab ste /
T02TD2014E:62a-25: dngos grub la dmigs nas rtse gcig pas bzlas brjod byas na /
T02TD2014E:62a-26: de zla ba btang bar gyur tsam na mtshan ma byung na ni /
T02TD2014E:62a-27: de dag 'thungs pas shes rab 'phel ba la sogs pa dngos grub 'bring po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:62a-28: mtshan ma ma byung na yang phan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:62a-29: de lta bu dag la yang ni brtul zhugs 'dzin pa med kyang sgrub tu rung ngo //
T02TD2014E:62a-30: 'di ni re zhig zhar la brjod pa ste /
T02TD2014E:62a-31: brtul zhugs dang ri mo dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dang ldan pas dngos grub chen po bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2014E:62b-0: // / @62b dngos grub pa dag gi spyod lam gyi mtshan nyid bya ba sna tshogs dag spyod pa la tshogs chen por 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2014E:62b-1: dngos grub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2014E:62b-2: bgegs la sogs pa'i bar chad du mi 'gyur zhing bkra shis par 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2014E:62b-3: kha na ma tho ba med pas 'gro ba rnams sdud par 'gyur ba'i cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2014E:62b-4: de la spyod lam ni khrus dang /
T02TD2014E:62b-6: tha mal ba'i bya ba la 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02TD2014E:62b-7: nyal ba dang ldang ba'i bya ba dang /
T02TD2014E:62b-8: rnam par g-yeng bar bya ba'i spyod pa dag ste rtsed mo la sogs pa la 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2014E:62b-9: 'di dag thams cad la yang thun mong du ni byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis dang ma bral ba ste /
T02TD2014E:62b-10: 'di chos thams cad skye ba med par rtogs pa dang /
T02TD2014E:62b-11: sgyu ma tsam du snang ba'i 'gro ba rnams la yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir rang gi lha'i ting nge 'dzin mi gtong ba'o //
T02TD2014E:62b-12: bgegs bskrad cing srung ba yang de nyid kyis byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:62b-13: khyad par du ni khrus byed pa'i tshe sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin bdud rtsi'i chu yis dbang bskur bar bsam par bya ste //
T02TD2014E:62b-14: de yang mdun gyi nam mkha' la rang gi ye shes kyi lha bsams te de la yid kyis phyag byas nas /
T02TD2014E:62b-15: ji skad smos pa'i khrus byas pas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i bum pas bdag la spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas sgrib pa'i dri ma thams cad yongs su dag par bsam mo //
T02TD2014E:62b-16: de nas yang bdag nyid kyi snyim pas chu gtsang ma blangs te /
T02TD2014E:62b-17: de yang bdud rtsir bsams nas bde bar gshegs pa rnams la lan gsum du phul te slar gshegs su gsol nas //
T02TD2014E:62b-18: de nas bdag nyid ldang bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:62b-19: de nas srung ba dang yang ldan par bya ste //
T02TD2014E:62b-20: 'di ni re zhig khrus kyi cho ga bstan pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin mdor bsdus pa'o //
T02TD2014E:62b-21: kha zas za ba'i cho ga ni phyi rol dang nang gi bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD2014E:62b-22: de la phyi rol gyi ni sred cing chags pas longs spyad pa'i phyir ma yin gyi ;
T02TD2014E:62b-23: phung po gnas pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir tshogs chen po ba skyed par bya'o snyam du bsams te /
T02TD2014E:62b-24: kha na ma tho ba med pa ci ngan du za'o //
T02TD2014E:62b-25: nang gi dam tshig bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs pa'i sbyor bas thams cad mchod pa ste //
T02TD2014E:63a-0: de la re zhig 'di'i cho ga ni kha zas kyi snod ni @63a * //
T02TD2014E:63a-1: padma'i snod du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:63a-2: kha zas ni mi la sogs pa dam tshig gi sha rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2014E:63a-3: snang mdzad la sogs pa dam tshig gi bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin du brtags te /
T02TD2014E:63a-4: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid dang ldan pa 'dod pa'i yon tan sna tshogs 'byung ba yon tan dang ldan par byin gyis brlab bo //
T02TD2014E:63a-5: yang na bza' ba'i bye brag rnams ni bde bar gshegs pa rnams 'od du zhu ba las gyur pa'i kha zas su bsam mo //
T02TD2014E:63a-6: btung ba'i bye brag rnams ni yul rnams 'od du zhu ba las gyur pa'i bdud rtsi btung bar bsam mo //
T02TD2014E:63a-7: de ltar yab yum gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po'i ros thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i mthu dang ldan par byin gyis brlab bo //
T02TD2014E:63a-8: de la bdag nyid kyi lus lha'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs te lce dang lag pa dag kyang sbrul pa'i lus kyis mchod pa byed pa'i bdag nyid du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:63a-9: yang na lag pa'i sor mo lnga ni rigs lnga'i bdag nyid lag mthil kyi dkyil 'khor ni sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs pa'i pho brang /
T02TD2014E:63a-10: kha zas rnams lag tu blangs pa ni tshogs chen po la rol cing spyod pa ste mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang po'o //
T02TD2014E:63a-11: de nas kha ni rnam par thar pa'i gzhal yas khang /
T02TD2014E:63a-12: lce ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i ye shes /
T02TD2014E:63a-13: kha zas zos pa ni byang chub kyi sems rnam par mi rtog pa'i ro myong ba'i mtshan nyid la rol pa'i mchod pa ste /
T02TD2014E:63a-14: de bzhin du mchod pa gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2014E:63a-15: de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i khog pa ni rang gi lha'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2014E:63a-16: kha zas kyis tshim par byas pa ni rang gi lha'i dkyil 'khor rgyun du mchod pa /
T02TD2014E:63a-17: zhu zhing mi snang bar gyur pas chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i dang du rnam par dag pa ste /
T02TD2014E:63a-18: 'di ltar kham gyi zas kyi rdul phra rab gcig gis kyang mchod pa gsum byas par 'gyur la /
T02TD2014E:63a-19: mchod pa gcig kyang byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis dang ldan pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don du 'gyur zhing /
T02TD2014E:63a-20: bsod nams dang ye shes dag kyang rdzogs pa ste 'di ni rgya che ba bla na med pa'i mchod pa zhes bshad do //
T02TD2014E:63a-21: za ba'i ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs dag kyang 'dir 'dus par dgongs so //
T02TD2014E:63a-22: de la kha zas za ba'i tshe phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi yin te /
T02TD2014E:63a-23: nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgyas dug sbyangs shing bdud rtsir byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD2014E:63a-24: spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgyas tshogs kyi 'khor lor sangs rgyas rnams spyan drangs pa dang /
T02TD2014E:63a-25: padma'i phyag rgyas tshogs kyi 'khor lo longs spyod pa dang /
T02TD2014E:63b-0: slar gshegs @63b su gsol ba'i phyag rgyas mchod pa zin nas sangs rgyas rnams rang gi gnas su gshegs par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:63b-1: de la nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgya ni /
T02TD2014E:63b-2: mthe bong dang srin lag rtse sprad de nam mkha' lding gi mchu ltar byas lhag ma rnams sbrul mgo ltar brkyang ba 'di ni dug thams cad 'byin par byed cing /
T02TD2014E:63b-3: bdud rtsi spyin par byed pa'i nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgya zhas bya ba ste /
T02TD2014E:63b-4: 'dir ni zas kyi steng du bzhag nas rang gi lha'i gsang sngags yang rung ba'am /
T02TD2014E:63b-5: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i gsang sngags sam /
T02TD2014E:63b-7: ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'i sngags sam /
T02TD2014E:63b-8: rdo rje mkha' lding rang gi gsang sngags kyis bzlas nas byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:63b-9: yang na lha thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi snying po bsdus par gyur pa aom a'a:h'um zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyis thams cad byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:63b-10: de la nam mkha' lding gi snying po ni /
T02TD2014E:63b-11: aom badzra ga ru da aa mri te h'um phat /
T02TD2014E:63b-13: de la spyan 'dren pa'i phyag ni lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo g-yab pa'i tshul gyis snying gar mkhrig ma bsnol te /
T02TD2014E:63b-14: se gol lan gsum brdabs nas de nas zhi ba'i thal mo brdab pa'o //
T02TD2014E:63b-15: padma'i phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis rtid pa sprad de /
T02TD2014E:63b-16: mthe bo dang mthe'u chung ngos sbyar nas lhag ma padma kha bye ba ltar byas te /
T02TD2014E:63b-17: 'dis kha zas kyi snod bzung ste bza' zhing spyin par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:63b-18: slar gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis sor mo'i rgyab kyis phyir g-yab pa ste /
T02TD2014E:63b-19: 'dis lha rnams slar gshegs su gsol ba byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:63b-20: phyi rol gyi dgos pa'i bya ba sna tshogs la 'jug pa'i tshe ni rang gi lha'i ting nge 'dzin gyis gzhan gyi don spyod pa'i phyag rgya ni nyid mi gtong ba tsam yin no //
T02TD2014E:63b-21: nyal ba'i dus na ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yid la byed pa yin no //
T02TD2014E:63b-22: ldang ba'i tshe na ni snying rje chen po'i stobs bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2014E:63b-23: rtsed mo la sogs pa'i rnam par g-yeng ba'i tshe na yang /
T02TD2014E:63b-24: dang po byang chub sems kyi shugs ma btang ba nyid kyis nyams par mi 'gyur zhes bshad do //
T02TD2014E:63b-25: 'di dag tu srung ba thams cad la yang /
T02TD2014E:63b-26: bsrung ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa tsam dang /
T02TD2014E:63b-27: sngags dang phyag rgya dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD2014E:63b-28: gzhan yang mig bltas pa dang /
T02TD2014E:63b-30: thal mo drag tu brdabs pa dag gis kyang bgegs bskrad cing srung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:63b-32: dam pa'i chos klog pa'i tshe na yang snying rje'i stobs kyis bdag dang gzhan gyi don bsgrub pa'i phyir /
T02TD2014E:64a-0: dge ba 'di spyad par bya'o snyam du @64a * //
T02TD2014E:64a-1: byas pa'i yid la byed pas 'phags te bya'o //
T02TD2014E:64a-2: spyod lam bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba nye bar bstan pa'i mtshan nyid rdzogs so /
T02TD2014E:64a-4: // / nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas klas rab 'byam du //
T02TD2014E:64a-5: 'jig rten dag na 'jigs byed ji snyed cig / bdud dang srin po gnod spyin la sogs pa //
T02TD2014E:64a-6: de dag kun las gshin rje gcig mi bzad //
T02TD2014E:64a-7: rig pa'i rgyal po khro bo gcig pu yang //
T02TD2014E:64a-8: gshin rje stong pas lhag par rab tu 'jigs //
T02TD2014E:64a-9: shin tu mi bzad khro rgyal gshin rje gshed //
T02TD2014E:64a-10: mthong ba tsam gyis khro bo thams cad kyi //
T02TD2014E:64a-11: mthu nyams sba bkod rang gi lag cha shor //
T02TD2014E:64a-12: de phyir sangs rgyas zhing khams thams cad na /
T02TD2014E:64a-13: 'jigs byed rab 'jigs zhig gi rdul snyed kyang //
T02TD2014E:64a-14: gshin rje gshed dang mtshungs pa 'ga' ma mchis //
T02TD2014E:64a-15: de phyir rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di nyid las //
T02TD2014E:64a-16: gang bshad de ni cho ga kun gyi gtso //
T02TD2014E:64a-17: lha 'am bdud dam de bzhin gshegs kun la //
T02TD2014E:64a-18: log 'dren mu stegs skye bo ngan pa rnams //
T02TD2014E:64a-19: kun nas 'dus kyang bar du gcod mi nus //
T02TD2014E:64a-20: shes rab ting 'dzin dad pa dman pas kyang //
T02TD2014E:64a-21: rang gar 'dod pa'i bya ba sna tshogs byed //
T02TD2014E:64a-22: gang dag dad brtson phun sum tshogs pa yis //
T02TD2014E:64a-23: dngos grub kun la sbyor ba smos ci dgos //
T02TD2014E:64a-24: 'on kyang sangs rgyas dgongs pa mi rtogs shing //
T02TD2014E:64a-25: lus ngag spyod pa lam du mthong ba dag / ma rungs gzhom dang dman pa la sogs pa'i //
T02TD2014E:64a-26: tshar gcad las kyis gdul ba'i cho ga la ;
T02TD2014E:64a-27: / byang chub sems dang bral zhes rtog pa byed //
T02TD2014E:64a-28: de lta'i rgyud ldan 'gro ba dman pa yis //
T02TD2014E:64a-29: thos nas skrag gam gal te bcings gyur kyang //
T02TD2014E:64a-30: zab mo don chen snying po mi mthong bas //
T02TD2014E:64a-31: dad pas byang chub sems bskyed bral ba dang //
T02TD2014E:64a-32: grub dang bka' la the tshom za 'gyur te //
T02TD2014E:64a-33: kha cig skur pas ltung ba'i rgyur 'gyur bas //
T02TD2014E:64a-34: 'gro ba dman 'gyur de lta gzung ba'i phyir //
T02TD2014E:64a-35: sangs rgyas mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid ci 'dra dang //
T02TD2014E:64a-36: rnal 'byor lam chen gang gis 'grub 'gyur ba //
T02TD2014E:64a-37: de dag mdor bsdus cung zad bshad par bya //
T02TD2014E:64a-38: phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas ji snyed cig /'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs 'byung 'gyur ba //
T02TD2014E:64a-39: de dag dka' ba sna tshogs ci spyod kyang //
T02TD2014E:64a-40: mnyam nyid snying rje thob bar ma gyur bar //
T02TD2014E:64a-41: byang chub mchog thob gang yang yod ma yin //
T02TD2014E:64a-42: mnyam nyid de yang chos kun skye med cing //
T02TD2014E:64a-43: 'gag pa med cing rtag pa chad pa med //
T02TD2014E:64a-44: de bzhin 'gro dang 'ong ba'i bya ba dang //
T02TD2014E:64a-45: de bzhin tha dad don dang don gcig sogs //
T02TD2014E:64a-46: 'khrul pa'i blo la ji ltar snang 'gyur zhing //
T02TD2014E:64a-47: mtshan ma ming gi brjod 'gyur thams cad kun //
T02TD2014E:64b-0: de la @64b de yi rang bzhin de mi dmigs //
T02TD2014E:64b-1: rang bzhin shes bya gzhan gyis ma byas shing //
T02TD2014E:64b-2: brten pa med cing 'gyur ba med pa ste //
T02TD2014E:64b-3: skye ba'i chos la rang bzhin de lta bu //
T02TD2014E:64b-4: yod na skye ba nyid du ga la 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:64b-5: des na rtag pa'i ngo bo 'ga' yang med //
T02TD2014E:64b-6: dngos po skye ba tsam du snang ba yang //
T02TD2014E:64b-7: skad cig gcig gis skye ba'ang mi rdzogs la //
T02TD2014E:64b-8: skad cig gzhan du skye ba'ang zhig pa'i phyir //
T02TD2014E:64b-9: sgyu ma tsam du skye bar snang ba de //
T02TD2014E:64b-10: blo yis brtag tu rung ba'i rten med de //
T02TD2014E:64b-11: de phyir skye ba'i chos cam yod ma yin //
T02TD2014E:64b-12: gang la skye ba dngos por ma grub pa //
T02TD2014E:64b-13: de la 'gag pa 'grub par ga la 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:64b-14: des na chos rnams 'di dag thams cad kun //
T02TD2014E:64b-15: rtag dang chad pa grub par mi 'gyur te //
T02TD2014E:64b-16: skye ba med na rtag ba ci las byung //
T02TD2014E:64b-17: 'gag pa med na chad pa de bzhin te //
T02TD2014E:64b-18: chos rnams blo yis gzhig tu rung ba'i phyir //
T02TD2014E:64b-19: don gcig pa yang 'grub par mi 'gyur la //
T02TD2014E:64b-20: gcig la yongs su brten par ma gyur pa'i //
T02TD2014E:64b-21: du ma de yang gang gi dbang gis gzhag / gcig dang du ma grub par ma gyur pa'i //
T02TD2014E:64b-22: chos la 'gro 'ong bya ba ga la yod //
T02TD2014E:64b-23: 'gro 'ong med na thar dang mthar zhes //
T02TD2014E:64b-24: 'phags dang skye bor bzhag pa mi 'grub la //
T02TD2014E:64b-25: kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang ba zhes //
T02TD2014E:64b-26: de yi lam du bzhag pa ga la 'grub //
T02TD2014E:64b-27: gal te don dam kun rdzob gnyis dbang gis //
T02TD2014E:64b-28: kun rdzob dbang la khyad par yod ce na //
T02TD2014E:64b-29: kun rdzob rnam par gzhag pa'i tshad gang zhig / ji ltar snang ba'i de tsam kun rdzob bam ;
T02TD2014E:64b-30: /'on te mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa dag / kun rdzob ces bya'i tshad du brtag grang na //
T02TD2014E:64b-31: snang ba tsam nyid kun rdzob yin gyur na //
T02TD2014E:64b-32: sems can kun la bdag lta yod pa'i phyir //
T02TD2014E:64b-33: bdag ces bya ba kun rdzob yin par 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:64b-34: de ltar gyur na kun rdzob bden pa la //
T02TD2014E:64b-35: lta ba mtho dman bye brag med par 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:64b-36: gal te snang ba'i chos kyi mtshan nyid zhig / kun rdzob bden par rnam par gzhag grang na //
T02TD2014E:64b-37: mtshan nyid blo yis phye ba yin pa'i phyir //
T02TD2014E:64b-38: de la mtha' dang tshad yod ma yin no //
T02TD2014E:64b-39: dngos gzhi tshad med pa la chos gzhig pa //
T02TD2014E:64b-40: byis pa mkha' la rtsod dang de 'dra mod //
T02TD2014E:64b-41: kun rdzob tsam du kun rdzob mi rnyed na //
T02TD2014E:64b-42: yang dag don du kun rdzob gal rnyed //
T02TD2014E:64b-43: de ltar kun rdzob rnyed par ma gyur na //
T02TD2014E:64b-44: don dam de yang rnyed par mi 'gyur te //
T02TD2014E:64b-45: phan tshun ltos te rnam par gzhag pa kun //
T02TD2014E:64b-46: gang tshe ltos gzhi grub par ma gyur pa //
T02TD2014E:64b-47: de tshe de la ltos pa ma grub zin //
T02TD2014E:64b-48: de phyir chos rnams sna tshogs snang ba kun //
T02TD2014E:64b-49: rnam par gzhag tu rung ba gang ma mthong //
T02TD2014E:64b-50: gang ma mthong bas gang la mi zhen cing //
T02TD2014E:65a-2: mnyam nyid byang chub sems zhes de la brjod //
T02TD2014E:65a-3: 'di ma rtogs par dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD2014E:65a-4: gang zhig 'byung ba sangs rgyas kyis ma gsungs //
T02TD2014E:65a-5: bsam pa 'di dang ldan zhing 'dir mos pas //
T02TD2014E:65a-6: sgo gsum spyod pa'i mtshan nyid nyes med do //
T02TD2014E:65a-7: sems can mang po yun du bder 'gyur zhing //
T02TD2014E:65a-8: bsgrub bya rang la yul du phan 'dogs na //
T02TD2014E:65a-9: 'phral du sbyor ba rtsub par snang ba yang //
T02TD2014E:65a-10: sangs rgyas mdzad par sangs rgyas kyis gsung ste //
T02TD2014E:65a-11: rnal 'byor lam yang de las gud na med //
T02TD2014E:65a-12: de phyir rgyal ba'i theg pa mchog 'di ni //
T02TD2014E:65a-13: shes rab snying rje ldan pas bsgrub 'gyur na //
T02TD2014E:65a-14: spyin sogs lam gyi chos lam brten par //
T02TD2014E:65a-15: 'di nyid dam ni pha rol dag tu yang //
T02TD2014E:65a-16: bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kun //
T02TD2014E:65a-17: rang gi lha mnyes byas pa tsam gyis 'grub //
T02TD2014E:65a-18: mya ngan 'das mchog phun sum tshogs 'gyur ba'i //
T02TD2014E:65a-19: chos kyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2014E:65a-20: thabs 'di nyid kyis myur du 'grub 'gyur na //
T02TD2014E:65a-21: shes rab ldan pa ci phyir 'dir mi rten //
T02TD2014E:65a-22: theg chen mdzad spyod rmad du byung ba las //
T02TD2014E:65a-23: nor bu rin chen rin thang med pa bzhin //
T02TD2014E:65a-24: sems can mang po'i bsam pa sgrub byed cing //
T02TD2014E:65a-25: tshar gcad phan 'dogs bya ba ston pa la //
T02TD2014E:65a-26: 'gro ba blo dman dngos lta can rnams kyis //
T02TD2014E:65a-27: sangs rgyas mdzad dang de yi lam yin par //
T02TD2014E:65a-28: blos ma mthong bas gol sa gnyis su 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:65a-29: kha cig skur pas ltung ba'i gnas su 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:65a-30: kha cig mos kyang lam du ma mthong ste //
T02TD2014E:65a-31: 'di ched tsam gyis cho ga mthong 'gyur bas //
T02TD2014E:65a-32: mos pas zhugs kyang don chen dag la ring //
T02TD2014E:65a-33: de bas tshul bzhin 'dzin pa dag gis kyang //
T02TD2014E:65a-34: shes rab zhen zhing mos pa ldan pa la //
T02TD2014E:65a-35: gdams ngag thabs kyis legs par zin par bya//
T02TD2014E:65a-36: gal te gdams ngag bral ba'i 'gro ba yis //
T02TD2014E:65a-37: glegs bam mthong bas skur bar mi bya ste //
T02TD2014E:65a-38: legs par bsams te brtag pa rnam gnyis bya //
T02TD2014E:65a-39: gal te don ldan skur ba yin yang srid //
T02TD2014E:65a-40: de la skur 'gyur ltung ba thob par nges //
T02TD2014E:65a-41: gal te don chen ldan pa ma yin na //
T02TD2014E:65a-42: btang snyoms bzhag pas sdig pa 'phel mi 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:65a-43: blo dang gdams ngag gnyis kas ma zin yang //
T02TD2014E:65a-44: rtag par 'di ltar sgro skur bral bar gyis //
