T02TD2014E:65a-46: dad dang brtson 'grus shes rab gsum ldan zhing //
T02TD2014E:65a-47: sngon chad man ngag brtan par 'chang ba yi //
T02TD2014E:65a-48: ngang tshul ldan na man ngag gzhag pa'i snod //
T02TD2014E:65a-49: mos pa brtan na shes rab mi ldan yang //
T02TD2014E:65b-0: bka' bzhin @65b byed pa man ngag snod du gzhag /'jam dbyangs rgyud rgyal rgya mtsho lta bu ni //
T02TD2014E:65b-1: dngos grub rin chen sna tshogs 'byung khungs gnas //
T02TD2014E:65b-2: rang dang rgyud tsam 'tsho bar 'gyur ba yi //
T02TD2014E:65b-3: rin chen mchog bsdus sor bzhi za ma tog / rdo rje rab 'byed tshul las cher bsdus te //
T02TD2014E:65b-4: gang du rang gnas lus la 'chang ba tsam //
T02TD2014E:65b-5: tshul 'di sgeg pa'i rdo rjes bsdus pa yin //
T02TD2014E:65b-6: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtogs pa thams cad bsdus pa rdo rje rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga zhib mo rin po che'i rgya mtsho lta bu las 'di dang /
T02TD2014E:65b-7: gzhan du myur du spyad par bya ba'i cho ga rin po che mchog bsdus pa /
T02TD2014E:65b-8: sor bzhi pa'i tshad kyi za ma tog gang tsam zhig bsdus te /
T02TD2014E:65b-9: rang gi lus la bcangs nas rang dang rang la brten pa rnams la phan gdags pa'i thabs slob dpon chen po dpal ldan sgeg pa'i rdo rjes kun nas bsdus pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2014E:65b-11: // / sprin med nyi ma shar ba las //
T02TD2014E:65b-12: lam rnams kun du gsal 'gyur yang //
T02TD2014E:65b-13: 'gro ba ma goms pa rnams kyis //
T02TD2014E:65b-14: bsgribs pa bzhin du bgrod mi shes //
T02TD2014E:65b-15: de lta'i sgrib pa bsal ba'i phyir //
T02TD2014E:65b-16: phyi ma 'di ni bdag gis byas //
T02TD2014E:65b-17: mtha' dag don rnams dpyad pa ni //
T02TD2014E:65b-18: mkhan po bzhed bzhin ma shes phyir //
T02TD2014E:65b-19: de ni bdag gis nus ma yin //
T02TD2014E:65b-21: phra mo'i lam sgo bstan par bya //
T02TD2014E:65b-22: de la rtogs pa 'dir las phra mo'i dngos grub sna tshogs bsgrub ba dang /
T02TD2014E:65b-23: dngos grub chen po dang bla na med pa'i byang chub nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i thabs su gyur pa cho ga zhib mo bstan pa las /
T02TD2014E:65b-24: sngags pas 'jug par bya ba'i go rims ji ltar 'jug par bya ba dang /
T02TD2014E:65b-25: go rims kyi don gyi mtshan nyid dag legs par shes pas 'jug nus par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'di bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2014E:65b-26: de la dang por bya ba'i cho ga ni sbyor ba la 'jug par rtogs pa legs par brtags pa'i bla ma las rang gi lha dang sngags dag mnos nas de nas dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2014E:65b-27: las bya ba'i cho ga dag legs par bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:65b-28: de'i 'od tu dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga la zhugs de 'bad par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:65b-29: de'i 'og tu grub pa thob par gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung ste /
T02TD2014E:65b-30: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa nye bar bzung nas las sna tshogs kyis sems can gyi don yang sgrub cing /
T02TD2014E:65b-31: mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas byang chub chen po bsgrub pa yang gtang bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2014E:66a-0: de la sngon du spyad pa'i cho ga legs par spyad pa'i @66a * //
T02TD2014E:66a-2: lha bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i phyir gnas bde zhing dben par song la /
T02TD2014E:66a-3: der lha mchod pa'i gzhir gyur pa mandala legs par byi dor byas te /
T02TD2014E:66a-4: der lugs ma'am ri mo la sogs pa mchod pa'i rten gyi phyir bzhugs par bya ba dang /
T02TD2014E:66a-5: me tog la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad kyi phyir bsags te /
T02TD2014E:66a-6: rig pas bsgrub par 'os pa thams cad tshogs par byas nas /
T02TD2014E:66a-7: 'dir spyad par bya ba ni lhur blangs te spyad par bya ba dang /
T02TD2014E:66a-8: grogs kyi dge ba dang ngo bo nyid dang ldan pa'i spyod lam ste /
T02TD2014E:66a-9: de la lhur blang ba'i bya ba ni bsgom pa dang /
T02TD2014E:66a-10: mchod par bya ba dang bzlas brjod do //
T02TD2014E:66a-11: grogs kyi dge ba ni dbugs 'byin pa'i tshe dam pa'i chos bklag pa dang mchod rten gdab pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2014E:66a-12: spyod lam ni mi rnams kyi chos lugs khrus byed pa dang /
T02TD2014E:66a-13: kha zas zab la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2014E:66a-14: de la lhur len pa'i spyod pa de dag kyang sbyor ba dang gzhug pa'i bya ba dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD2014E:66a-15: de la sbyor ba ni sngom pa gso zhing gzung ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2014E:66a-16: gzhug pa ni bzod par gsol ba dang slar gshegs su gsol ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2014E:66a-17: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te dang po nyid ni nang par sdar langs te /
T02TD2014E:66a-18: sems can gyi don bya'o snyam du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:66a-19: de nas cung zad cig legs par spyad pa dang nyes par spyad pa bsams te /
T02TD2014E:66a-20: nyes pa rnams dgag cing legs pa rnams bstan par bya'o snyam du dam bcas nas langs te /
T02TD2014E:66a-21: khrus phra mo byas nas bdug pa bsreg cing me tog thogs te /
T02TD2014E:66a-22: sku gzugs la sogs pa la gtor nas /
T02TD2014E:66a-23: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod cing dge ba'i tshes 'di dag rgyud la bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:66a-24: 'jam rgyal rdo rje la sogs pa'i //
T02TD2014E:66a-25: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la //
T02TD2014E:66a-26: lus dang ngag yid gus ldan pas //
T02TD2014E:66a-27: kun nas btud de phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2014E:66a-28: sangs rgyas zhing du gang bsngags pa //
T02TD2014E:66a-29: 'jig rten dag na mchog gyur pa'i //
T02TD2014E:66a-30: rin chen me tog bdug spos sogs //
T02TD2014E:66a-31: kun nas sprul te mchod par bgyi //
T02TD2014E:66a-32: bdag gis sngon chad byas pa'i sdig / kun nas bsags par gyur pa rnams //
T02TD2014E:66a-33: rang bzhin med dang yod tshul gyis //
T02TD2014E:66a-34: rgyal ba rnams kyi spyan sngar bshags //
T02TD2014E:66a-35: mgon po kun gyi bsod nams dang //
T02TD2014E:66a-36: dman pa'i dge ba thams cad la //
T02TD2014E:66a-37: de bzhin mthun par lta sems kyis //
T02TD2014E:66b-0: dad bas rjes su @66b yi rang ngo //
T02TD2014E:66b-1: bde gshegs byang chub mchog brnyes nas //
T02TD2014E:66b-2: 'gro ba thugs rjes gdul slad du //
T02TD2014E:66b-3: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la //
T02TD2014E:66b-4: tshangs pa bzhin du gsol ba 'debs //
T02TD2014E:66b-5: mya ngan 'das bzhed de dag la //
T02TD2014E:66b-6: 'gro kun yun du bde ba'i phyir //
T02TD2014E:66b-7: ji srid 'khor ba de srid du //
T02TD2014E:66b-8: mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2014E:66b-9: ji srid 'khor ba ma zad par //
T02TD2014E:66b-10: bdag gi dge ba'ang de bzhin du //
T02TD2014E:66b-11: kun nas zad par ma gyur par //
T02TD2014E:66b-12: sems can yongs su smin par shog / bdag kyang dus 'di phan chad nas //
T02TD2014E:66b-13: byang chub snying po'i bar du ni //
T02TD2014E:66b-15: thugs rjes yongs su gzung bar mdzod //
T02TD2014E:66b-16: dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni //
T02TD2014E:66b-17: mgon po khyod kyi bka' bzhin du //
T02TD2014E:66b-18: sems can kun don bsgrub lags kyi //
T02TD2014E:66b-19: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2014E:66b-20: zhes tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis rang gi rgyud la dge ba'i chos bskyed nas /
T02TD2014E:66b-21: de nyid kyi tshe rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom pa la 'jug pa'am /
T02TD2014E:66b-22: yang na de nas langs te dam pa'i chos bklag pa dang /
T02TD2014E:66b-23: kha zas bza' ba byas te phyi rol gyis la sogs pa legs par byas nas khrus chen po yang byas te /
T02TD2014E:66b-24: de nas rang gi stan la legs par 'dug nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:66b-25: de'i cho ga ni sngon nyid du legs par bstan pa de nyid 'dir sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:66b-26: de ltar bsgoms te mchod pa'i las la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:66b-27: de dag gi gsang sngags ni lung sngon du bstan kyang /
T02TD2014E:66b-28: de dag gi ngo bo ma bstan pas de bdag gis cung zad sbyar bar bya ste /
T02TD2014E:66b-29: de la rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyis spyan 'dren par 'dod na ni /
T02TD2014E:66b-30: de nyid kyi rjes su dza:h'um bam ho: zhes bya ba 'di nyid sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:66b-31: gdan dbul ba yang de dag gi rjes su sa ma ya stam /
T02TD2014E:66b-33: me tog la sogs pa mchod pa rnams la yang rtsa ba'i sngags kyi rjes su ma h'a p'u dza sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2014E:66b-35: de bzhin du slar gshegs su gsol ba ni bi sa r'a dza ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2014E:66b-37: yang na sngags so so la sbyar bar 'dod na spyan drang ba dang /
T02TD2014E:66b-40: slar gshegs su gsol ba rnams la aom ya m'anta ka h'um phat /
T02TD2014E:66b-41: ces bya ba 'di nyid sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:66b-42: gzhan dbul ba ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags nyid bskul ba med par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:67a-1: gtor ma bsngo ba la ni aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um phat /
T02TD2014E:67a-2: ces bya ba sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:67a-3: 'di dag ni kun nas bsdus pa la dga' ba'i cho ga yin te /
T02TD2014E:67a-4: rnam par spros pa la dga' ba rnams la ni /
T02TD2014E:67a-5: lhung lhung 'degs kyi ngag gis mdzes par byas pa'i tshigs su bcad pas spyan drang ba dang /
T02TD2014E:67a-6: mchod pa la sogs pa bya ba rnams byas te /
T02TD2014E:67a-7: bsam pas rgyud la chos bskyed la /
T02TD2014E:67a-8: sngags dang phyag rgyas de dag gus par byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:67a-9: de la lhung lhung 'degs kyi ngag ni lha'i bu rnams kyi ngag yin te ha cang mi bul ha cang me myur /
T02TD2014E:67a-10: lha yis sprul ba'i chu yis khrus gsol bzhin //
T02TD2014E:67a-11: deng 'dir phyag zhabs kun nas bcabs par mdzod //
T02TD2014E:67a-13: rnam par dag pa'i gsang sngags ci dga' bar brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2014E:67a-14: dag par bsams nas dang por mchod yon dbul ba la sbyar bar bya ba ni /
T02TD2014E:67a-15: 'jig rten dag na mchod pa ji snyed pa'i //
T02TD2014E:67a-16: sngon du bdud rtsi zil dang ra dam pa 'gro //
T02TD2014E:67a-17: de phul nas ni mchod pa thams cad kyang //
T02TD2014E:67a-18: nges par phyag rgyas rab tu gdab par 'gyur //
T02TD2014E:67a-20: mchod yon gyi sngags la ci dga' bar sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:67a-21: de nas 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi sgor gyur pa me tog la sogs pa nye bar sogs nas /
T02TD2014E:67a-22: 'dod ldan dang por mthong bas dgar 'gyur ba'i //
T02TD2014E:67a-23: kha dogs dbyibs legs rnams las me tog mchog / sgra snyan yid 'ong rnam pa sna tshogs kyang //
T02TD2014E:67a-24: kun las khyad par 'phags pa tshangs pa'i ngag / yid 'ong dri ngad kun nas ldang ba yang //
T02TD2014E:67a-25: lha rdzas autpala ngad dang gang mi mtshungs //
T02TD2014E:67a-26: ror ldan kha zas sna tshogs mchog rnams las //
T02TD2014E:67a-27: tshangs pa'i zil dang ra ro dang gang mi mnyam //
T02TD2014E:67a-28: bde zhing spyad du bzod pa'i reg pa kun //
T02TD2014E:67a-29: lha yi bu mo'i reg pa lta bu med ;
T02TD2014E:67a-30: / de phyir 'dod pa'i mchog tu rab bsngags pa //
T02TD2014E:67a-31: gang gis de 'drar byin gyis brlabs byas nas //
T02TD2014E:67a-32: bsod nams zhing 'gyur byed la dbul bar bgyi /
T02TD2014E:67a-33: aom badzra pushpama h'a p'u dza sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2014E:67a-34: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid snang ba'i bdag nyid /
T02TD2014E:67a-35: aom a'a:h'um zhes bya ba nyid dam /
T02TD2014E:67a-36: yang na 'di dag dang mchod pa rang rang gi ming gi gsang sngags dang /
T02TD2014E:67a-37: byin gyis rlob pa dang bcas pa spel bar bya ste /
T02TD2014E:67a-38: 'di ltar aom a'a: badzra pushpa ma h'a p'u dza sa ma ye h'um zhes bya bas me tog gi mchod pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:67a-39: de bzhin du badzra dh'u pa /
T02TD2014E:67a-42: badzra nee wi dya zhes pas snga ma bzhin du spel bas /
T02TD2014E:67a-43: bdug pa dang mar me dang byug pa dang /
T02TD2014E:67b-0: bshos gtsang @67b rnams la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:67b-1: de dag dang mchod pa gzhan rnams la yang thun mong du byin gyis rlob pa mchod pa'i sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rig pa chen po 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:67b-2: aom aa nutta ra sarba p'u dza me gha spha ra na ma h'a sa ma ye sv'ah'a /
T02TD2014E:67b-3: zhes bya ba 'di thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:67b-4: rdo rje dril bu la sogs te sil snyan gyi mchod pa thams cad la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gsang sngags sgra thams cad zab mo'i chos su byin gyis rlob par byed pa'i rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:67b-5: aom badzra ghande ra ni pra ra na sam pra ra na sarba ta th'a ga ta buddha kshe tam pra tsa la ye pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a sva bh'a be h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD2014E:67b-6: zhes bya ba sgra thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:67b-7: de ltar mchod pa zin nas de bzhin du gtor ma bsngo ba yang hr'i:shtri:la sogs pa'i gsang sngags kyis ci dga' bar bsngos te /
T02TD2014E:67b-8: gsang sngags de nyid kyi sngags kyis nor bu blangs te /
T02TD2014E:67b-9: ri mo'am sku gzugs la mngon par phyogs par 'dug nas cung zad sems mnyam par bzhag ste /
T02TD2014E:67b-10: bzlas brjod kyi cho ga sngon du bstan pa lta bu ci nus zhig bya'o //
T02TD2014E:67b-11: de nas gtong bar 'dod pa na yang mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:67b-12: mchod pa mi nus na me tog mngon par gtor bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:67b-13: de nas thal mo sbyar ba btud nas ri mo la mngon par phyogs te /
T02TD2014E:67b-14: chos mchog mi g-yo bla med rab brnyes shing //
T02TD2014E:67b-15: yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med tshogs mnga' yang //
T02TD2014E:67b-16: 'gro ba kun la thugs rje snyoms mdzad pa /
T02TD2014E:67b-17: 'jam mgon khyod kyi zhabs la rtag tu 'dud //
T02TD2014E:67b-18: rgyal ba mnyes phyir bzlas brjod rin po che //
T02TD2014E:67b-19: dang bas spyan sngar rtag tu mtshon bgyi ba //
T02TD2014E:67b-20: lus ngag dub dang bsam pa g-yeng ba yis //
T02TD2014E:67b-21: cung zad bde bar gnas 'tshal bzod pa bzhes //
T02TD2014E:67b-22: dang bas bskyed pa'i bsod nams phra mo yang //
T02TD2014E:67b-23: 'ga' yang chud zos mi 'gyur don 'gyur phyir //
T02TD2014E:67b-24: gsang sngags rin chen rnam grangs 'di tsam zhig / mgon po mchog nyid la ni gdams par bgyi //
T02TD2014E:67b-25: nad dang sdug bsngal dgra bgegs la sogs te //
T02TD2014E:67b-26: 'khor ba rgya mtsho gnod pa sna tshogs dag /
T02TD2014E:67b-27: 'di dang pha rol rtag tu gar byung yang //
T02TD2014E:67b-28: gsang sngags rin chen 'bras bu der mchis mdzod //
T02TD2014E:67b-29: deng 'der bdag gi dgos pa bsgrub legs kyis //
T02TD2014E:67b-30: thugs rje mnga' bdag sras dang bcas pa kun //
T02TD2014E:67b-31: bde ldan nyid kyi gnas su gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2014E:67b-32: slar yang 'gro ba'i don du gshegs par mdzod //
T02TD2014E:67b-33: aom a'a:h'um mu:zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:68a-0: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'jam @68a * //
T02TD2014E:68a-1: pa'i rdo rje la rgyal ba'i dbang por bstod pa dang /
T02TD2014E:68a-2: bzlas pa gtang bar bzod par gsol ba dang /
T02TD2014E:68a-3: don yod par bya ba'i phyir gsang sngags rgyal ba nyid la gdams pa dang /
T02TD2014E:68a-4: dgos pa'i bya ba la dus bzhin du spyad pa'i mthu yod pa'i phyir /
T02TD2014E:68a-5: dus su thob par gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02TD2014E:68a-6: bdag nyid dbugs 'byin cing [?] g-yeng ba la zhugs pa'i tshe rang gi lha gnas dang dus ma yin par bzhugs par rigs pa ma yin pas /
T02TD2014E:68a-7: slar gshegs su gsol bar bya ba rnams rdzogs par byas nas /
T02TD2014E:68a-11: yo byad rnams man ngag tu brjod pa bzhin du bsrungs nas /
T02TD2014E:68a-12: dbugs 'byung zhing spyod lam dag bya'o //
T02TD2014E:68a-13: 'di ltar nyin zhag re re la dus bzhi'am gsum mam /
T02TD2014E:68a-14: re re rgyun ma chad par ji srid du dam bcas pa /
T02TD2014E:68a-16: mtshan ma ma thob kyi bar du de bzhin du spyod pa ni bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2014E:68a-17: de nas brtul zhugs dang bcas kyang rung /
T02TD2014E:68a-18: brtul zhugs med kyang rung ste /
T02TD2014E:68a-20: rdzas sna tshogs las dngos grub sgrub pa'i cho ga ste /
T02TD2014E:68a-21: 'di la ni bsnyen pa'am brtson 'grus bskyed par bya ba lhag par spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:68a-22: de dag thams cad kyang dngos grub sgrub pa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2014E:68a-23: de nas grub pa'i spyod par gsungs pa zhi ba la sogs pa las sna tshogs kyi bya ba la ni /
T02TD2014E:68a-24: bsgom pa dang mchod pa dang /
T02TD2014E:68a-25: bzlas brjod rnams ni 'dir yang snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2014E:68a-26: bye brag tu ni ting nge 'dzin bye brag dang /
T02TD2014E:68a-27: gsang sngags bskul ba dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2014E:68a-28: phyi rol gyi sbyor ba'i bya ba rnams ni /
T02TD2014E:68a-29: las kyi cho ga zhib mo nyid du sngon du bstan pa bzhin du so so rang rang gi las la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2014E:68a-30: de ltar bya ba rnam pa gsum gyis bsdus pa 'di ni sngags 'chang rnams kyi spyod pa ste /
T02TD2014E:68a-31: 'di dag kho na tsam gyis sngags 'chang rnams kyi dgos pa grub par byed de /
T02TD2014E:68a-32: de la sngags mchog tu gyur pa rnams ni /
T02TD2014E:68a-33: thabs 'di nyid kyis mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub thob par byas te /
T02TD2014E:68a-34: lha dang mi'i skal ba bzang po rnams la yang longs spyod cing /
T02TD2014E:68a-35: bya ba sna tshogs la mthu phun sum tshogs pa thob pa nyid kyis sems can rnams kyang yongs su sdud /
T02TD2014E:68a-36: sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs na byang chub sems dpa''am rdo rje 'chang rnams byang chub kyi spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa rnams blta ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2014E:68a-37: zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2014E:68b-0: mchod pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas zhing sna tshogs su @68b zhugs shing de dag dang rtse zhing longs spyod nas kyang /
T02TD2014E:68b-1: dngos grub de dag las nyams pa med par ting nge 'dzin mchog la yang snyoms par 'jug cing /
T02TD2014E:68b-2: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang tshe 'di nyid la sbyor bar byed pa dag kyang yod do //
T02TD2014E:68b-3: kha cig ni tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub thob par byas te /
T02TD2014E:68b-4: de tshe bskal ba gcig gam de las lhag par yang rung ste /
T02TD2014E:68b-5: de tsam du bsod nams dang ldan pa'i lha dang /
T02TD2014E:68b-6: lha ma yin la sogs pa dam pa rnams kyis bkur zhing /
T02TD2014E:68b-7: lha dang lha ma yin dang /
T02TD2014E:68b-9: rig sngags 'chang gi bu mo khyad par du 'phags pa rnams la yang longs spyad de /
T02TD2014E:68b-10: de nas tshe 'phos nas ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhig tu 'khor 'dus pa dang por 'gyur ba'i skye ba blangs te /
T02TD2014E:68b-11: der rab tu phyung nas chos kyi mig dag par gyur te byang chub sems dpar gyur nas /
T02TD2014E:68b-12: de nas 'og min gyi gnas na gnas pa rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ste /
T02TD2014E:68b-13: de nas bla na med pa'i byang chub chen po thob par byed pa dag kyang yod do //
T02TD2014E:68b-14: kha cig tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub phra mo thob ste /
T02TD2014E:68b-15: lo brgya'am stong gnam stong phrag du ma dag tu 'tsho zhing rdzu 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa dag dang yang ldan nas /
T02TD2014E:68b-16: mthong ba'i chos la bde bar 'tsho zhing longs spyad nas /
T02TD2014E:68b-17: gzhan du sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad kyang rung ma phrad kyang rung ste /
T02TD2014E:68b-18: skal ba bzang po la sbyar nas rim gyis byang chub thob par byed pa yod do //
T02TD2014E:68b-19: dngos grub thob pa de dag kyang kha cig ni dngos grub thob pa las kyang ma nyams par skal ba bzang po'i sgo nas bar chad med par byang chub la sbyor bar byed do //
T02TD2014E:68b-20: kha cig ni dngos grub thob nas 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi sred pa la longs spyod pas te /
T02TD2014E:68b-21: dngos grub thob pa las nyams nas bar chad med par sbyor mi nus te /
T02TD2014E:68b-22: bar chad dang bcas pas byang chub sgrub par byed pa yang yod do //
T02TD2014E:68b-23: kha cig ni skye ba 'di la dngos grub grub par ma gyur par shi 'phos te bar ma do'i srid par mngon par grub nas der dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba yang yod do //
T02TD2014E:68b-24: kha cig ni skye ba phyi ma yongs su grub nas skyes ma thag gam cung zad cig na dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba yang yod do //
T02TD2014E:68b-25: kha cig ni 'di'i las kyi mtshams sbyar nas /
T02TD2014E:68b-26: phyi ma'i srid pa la skal ba dang ldan pa'i sprul pa po mngon par brtson pa can du gyur te /
T02TD2014E:68b-27: der dngos grub can du 'gyur ba'am /
T02TD2014E:69a-0: de bzhin du skye ba gnyis @69a * //
T02TD2014E:69a-1: dang gsum pa la sogs pa du mas dngos grub can du 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do //
T02TD2014E:69a-2: gzhan yang sgrub pa po rtsol ba mthu chung bar gyur pas /
T02TD2014E:69a-3: skye ba gzhan du rkyen sna tshogs kyi dbang du gyur pa dag kyang yod la /
T02TD2014E:69a-4: gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems kyis zin par ma gyur pas sred pa'i dbang gis sngon du skal ba dman pa la sbyor bar byed pa dag kyang yod de /
T02TD2014E:69a-5: de ltar dman zhing mnyam par gyur kyang thar pa'i sa bon ma bzhag pa yang ma yin no //
T02TD2014E:69a-6: de bas na sgo 'dir zhugs pa rnams kyis lam 'ba' zhig la brten par bya zhing /
T02TD2014E:69a-7: byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:69a-8: gang zhig mthong ba'i chos la bya ba phra mo bsgrub par 'dod pa rnams kyi gang zag gis kyang shes rab dang snying rje'i stobs bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2014E:69a-9: de'i mthus bya ba rnams kyang 'grub par 'gyur zhing yun du bde ba yang de'i stobs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:69a-10: gang dag dngos grub grub par gyur pa las nyams par gyur cing rkyen gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur te /
T02TD2014E:69a-11: thar pa'i bar chad du gyur pa'i chos rnams kyang byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis kyi stobs chung ba'i dbang las gyur pa yin te /
T02TD2014E:69a-12: de bas na gtsor bsams pa 'dis 'phangs te spyad na bya ba thams cad kyang yongs su gtsang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2014E:69a-13: bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro zhes rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs shing bla mas kyang legs par gdams pa'o //
T02TD2014E:69a-14: 'gro ba'i mgon gyur 'jam mchog gang yin des //
T02TD2014E:69a-15: rig pa'i gnas mchog rgya cher bstan pa las //
T02TD2014E:69a-16: gsang ba'i mtshan ldan sgeg pa zhes bya ba //
T02TD2014E:69a-17: 'gro ba sgrol 'gyur bya ba gang yin des ;
T02TD2014E:69a-18: / thabs mchog cho ga zhib mo legs bstan mdzad //
T02TD2014E:69a-19: lam der 'jug pa'i dka' tshigs phra mo tsam //
T02TD2014E:69a-20: rigs pa bzang pos dman la phan phyir byas //
T02TD2014E:69a-21: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtog pa thams cad bsdus par gyur pa /
T02TD2014E:69a-22: rdo rje rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga zhib mo las /
T02TD2014E:69a-23: slob dpon dpal ldan sgeg pa'i rdo rjes /
T02TD2014E:69a-24: las dang dngos grub kyi cho ga zhib mo slob dpon rigs pa bzang pos de la phan pa'i le'u gcig mdzad pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2014E:69a-26: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal au p'a ya shr'i mi tra dang /
T02TD2014E:69a-27: rong zom chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur te gtan la phab pa /
